"Now, I know you're feeling strange right now, and I can tell you why. It's a natural part of growing up and is a most wonderful thing! Now, you know how I always entertain ladies?"

"You mean womanize!" Sango shouted up at him.

"Ignore her." He said simply. "Well, I do that because I want to--"

Miroku explained his wants to Shippo.

"And now you're feeling the same way! Understand?"

"You mean, I'm going to walk around asking woman to bear my children?"

Everyone except Shippo and Miroku slapped their foreheads.

"Ummm....Not exactly...."

"Try explaining differently!" Kagome yelled up to him.

"Okay, lets see....Oh! Those feelings you feel will go away if you--"

Miroku explained urges and how to get rid of them.

"Ohhh...But I'm too big to do that with anyone." Shippo said, somewhat sadly.

"Don't worry. All you have to do is get the shards out of you and you'll return to normal." Miroku said.

Before they could do anything else
1121222111112211122.title: Miroku and the Talk

choices: The girl did NOT take too kindly to that!!
11212221111122111221.content:
Inuyasha struggles getting the stuck sutra off his mouth when... he felt something poke his back! The tiny little poke caused in to freeze in paralysis! He falls to the ground motionless!

The poke came from the finger of a giant demon... a female demon with a powerful dark aura flowing through her body! The demoness was of a giant little girl with grey skin, long blue hair, shining blue eyes, two little antannaes sticking out her forehead, and wearing an oriental robe.

Kagome stares up to her in sheer terror, "Um... w... who....who's that?!!"

Miroku looks at her in fear, "I dont know... but Im sensing a powerful aura around this... THING!"

Speaking of which, the demoness looks down at Miroku... and smiles, "Oh... such a cute little human!" She reaches for Miroku... he tries to run... but too late!!

She picks him up and brings him to eye level. She tilts her head and stares at him in pure curiousity while he struggles to break free!!!

"S...SHIPPO!!! HELP ME!!!!" he screams!
Kagome and Sango just stare, while Myoga looks up and tries not to laugh, "Heheh... guess he DOES have a way with the ladies!"

Shippo on the other hand, rushes to his aid, "HEY!! LET THE MONK..... go...." Shippo then stares at the demoness... strangely...

The young demoness stares back at him strangely... and drops Miroku!
"WWWHHHHHAAAAA-OFF!"

Shippo starts blushing, "Um... h...hi!"
The girl smiles at him, "Hi! Havent seen a fellow giant demon in a while... what's your name, stranger?"

Shaking in excitement (the PUBERTY thing!), Shippo decides to approach her like the man that he has now become! He stands straight, looks her straight in the eye and says, "Im Shippo the fox-demon! ...Would you be as kind as to bare my children???"

The gang slaps their heads yet AGAIN, however Miroku just cheers Shippo on, "YEAH! GO FOR IT, BUD!"
11212221111122111221.title: Now for the ULTIMATE Test...

choices: The demon girl finds another giant demon boy and Shippo gets jealous
The girl watches to see if Shippo is telling the truth...
112122211111221112211.content:
The demoness's smile instantly dissapears. Shippo keeps grinning cheesily, thinking he was doing exactly the right thing. She looked down, her hands clenched and trembling.

"You...you...you...PERVERT!!!!!"

The girl pulls back and slaps Shippo in the face. Shippo falls to the ground, grabbing his throbbing face.

"What did I do?" Shippo asked hurt.

The girl was blushing as she said, "Do you know how old we are?!?!!? We're just kids! We can't even do that!"

"Maybe you can't, but I CAN!" Shippo said, folding his arms.

"Yeah right!" The girl said, turning her back on Shippo and folding her arms.

"I can so!" Shippo yelled standing up.

"Prove it!" She said, turning around.

Shippo blushed a little himself now. Miroku had explained it well enough. But he didn't want to do it with so many people watching...Or with this demon girl!

"I...don't have to prove anything to you!" He said.

The demon girl stuck her tongue out and said, "Knew it!"

Shippo glared at the girl as she stalked off, maybe looking for other giant demons to hang out with.

"I knew we shouldn't have let Miroku talk to him." Sango said, eyes narrowed at Miroku.

"Well, not everyone can charm the ladies like me." Miroku said, nodding sagely.

Sango picked up her boomerang and slammed it down ontop of his big toe. He yelped and jumped up, grabbing his foot.

No seemed to be paying any attention to the paralyzed, sutra-ed Inuyasha.
112122211111221112211.title: Smooth Move Shippo....

choices: His name's on the book! YAY!!!!!
It's not in the book.... NOOOOOO!!!!!
1121222111112211122111.content:
Shippo start squeezing his fist and gritting his teeth in anger! "I'll...I'll show her!! She'll be sorry she passed me up!!!"

Meanwhile, the girl seems to be chatting with another demon boy.. the boy sorta resembles a human form with fire-red hair, bloodred eyes, wearing a slick white little preacher-boy uniform! By the looks of him, he'll probably be a teen-dream to the ladies (human OR demon) in a couple of years!

Upon seeing this, Shippo dashes to the two!! "Wha... wha... who's HE??!!" Shippo points to the boy! The demoness just snickers, "Oh, he's my friend, Sadri. A REAL gentleman!"

Sadri turns to the girl and says in an irresistable British accent, "Is THIS the pervert that's been pestering you, Miss Chronos?" She just shakes her head, "It's ok. Maybe he's just a little stupid.."

"STUPID??!!" Shippo jumps, "I'll have you know I am a true gentlemen!! Im ten times a gentlemen then that Sadri guy!!"
Sadri turns his head to Shippo, "I believe it's time you leave Lady Chronos alone now. Fine another... someone just as immature!"

"Or else what, pretty boy?!" Shippo stares him straight in the eye. Sadri just looks back at him unphased, "I am not a huge fan of fighting..." but raises his hand... and it catches on fire! He grins wickedly, "...but I'll be more than happy to defend my lady's honor!"

***

As for Inuyasha... he wakes up... and notices he's not in that forest anymore!

"Wha? Where am I?" he looks around... clouds are everywhere... in front of him is a HUGE golden gate... uh oh!

Standing by the gate is a very tall woman with long blonde hair, blue pupils, wearing a thick black robe, and reading a book...

Her eyes lift up and out of the book and stare at dog-boy. "...Your name?"

"Uh...Inuyasha." he tells her, "Um... am I in.."

"No." she tells him, "Not yet anyway. I have to see whether youre in the book... if so, Welcome to Heaven!"

"...And if Im not?" he asks her.

She just grins, "Then you better hope that fire-rat suit of yours is HELLFIRE-proof!"

And with that... she looks in her book...
1121222111112211122111.title: Uh oh! The Charming Rival!

11212221111122111221111.content:
"Before you decide my fate," Inuyasha said. "Could you tell me how I died?"

The woman frowned slightly. "I'm sorry. But only those granted access can have their questions answered."

"Come on! Just this one!"

The woman sighed and turned a few pages in the book She turned it around and Inuyasha saw a beautiful ink drawing of Shippo. To his surprise, it began to move! Inuyasha watched as Shippo clenched his fists in anger then ran off the page.

"What's that supposed to mean?" Inuyasha asked, eyes narrowed.

The woman tapped the picture, near the bottom. Inuyasha leaned closer and saw an ink drawing of himself, with X's for eyes and laying flat in a giant foot print.

"WHAT?!?!?!? HE STEPPED ON ME?!?!?!?!? WHY THAT NO GOOD--"

"ANYWAY!" The woman interupted, turning the book back around. "You're dead and that's all that matters. Now what is your name?"

"Inuyasha."

"Hmm...A demon eh? Usually we just send demons to hell, but you're a strange case. Half demon...performed good deeds...slain hundreds of demons...hmmm...Yes it looks like you've been accepted."

The woman turned to the giant gates and inserted a key into a small keyhole near the center. The gates swung open with a melodius chime and the woman held out her arm.

"Welcome tired soul. Your resting place awaits."

Inuyasha frowned and stood fast.

"Look, I'm flattered that you're letting me in, but I can't die yet. We still haven't found the last jewel shard and I haven't gotten revenge on Naraku yet!"

The woman's arm dropped and she said, "I see. Many innocents may die if Naraku isn't stopped...Very well. Consider this a near death experience. You won't remember anything you've seen here when you return to earth."

The woman closed the large book and said, "Farewell Inuyasha. Keep to the right path and I will see you again."

She flung out her hand and Inuyasha felt a sudden deep sleep come over him. His soul rushed down from the gates and back into his body on earth. He slowly opened his eyes and groaned. The sutra was off of his mouth and his body was no longer paralyzed. He looked around and saw Shippo getting ready to fight with a strange demon boy. A cursory glance at the ground and he saw Kagome and Sango, held by Miroku, running towards the fight.
11212221111122111221111.title: Not His Time

112122211111221112211112.content:
Clueless of what happened, Inuyasha just follows the rest of the gang... "Uh...just what happened while I was out?" he asked.
"Oh, Shippo's found himself a little crush," Miroku tells him.

"Unfortunately, Shippo said the wrong words," Sango glared at Miroku, "and the next thing you know, she found another... a MUCH better catch!"

"Yikes," was all Inuyasha could say, "that must suck!"

"Yeah.." Miroku tells him, "and now the two are fighting! We gotta stop them!"

"No...NO ONE gets in the way of my beloveds!!!!"

The gang turns around... it's the little demoness... frowing at them! "They are fighting for my sake! I will NOT give them up! NOT TO ANYONE!!"

Inuyasha just bends down and tries talking to her, "Ok, young lady. You've had your little fun and all, but we really gotta take Shippo away now! Hope you understand."

She just pinches Inuyasha's hand... and he instantly falls to the ground... DEAD! (some kind of touch of Death, perhaps?) She turns to the others and smiles, "Who else would like to talk?" They just slowly back away...

***

Inuyasha wakes up... he's back in front of the gates of Heaven... the guard up front just stares at him... with an angry frown on her face!

"Uh...where am-"
"Youre REALLY starting to push it!!" she interrupts him! "I have given you another chance, only to waste it so fast!!"
"Wait... I was here before?" he obviously doesnt remember his FIRST trip to Heaven!

"Yes you were," she sighs, "the little fox-demon stomped on your unconcious body, breaking every bone of your body... now youre sent back after a touch of death???!!"
"Yeah um.. sorry about that. Can you please send me back now?"

"WHAT??! NO!!" she yells furiously, "No one gets a THIRD chance!!! Naraku or no Naraku, rules are rules!"

"AW C'MON!!" he pleads, "I'll do anything you want! Just please send me back!!!"

She just looks at him... with a strange look in her eye, "...ANYTHING, huh?"

Inuyasha just looks back at her with a worried look on his face!

She smiles, "Well... there is ONE thing..."
112122211111221112211112.title: Seems like a touch (a touch too much!)

choices: "No way! Can't I do something else!?"
1121222111112211122111121.content:
"...Take my place for a while!" the guardian said. Inuyasha jumped back in surprise, "WHAT!?" he shrieked.

"You heard me! This job gets tiresome after having to keep people in check for over 1,000 years! I need a break! But I can't leave the gates of heaven unattended, so either you take my place for say half an hour? Or you stay dead!" the woman said shrewdly.

Inuyasha gave it some thought...
1121222111112211122111121.title: A tough decision

11212221111122111221111211.content:
It didnt take his tiny flea-ridden brain long to think about it. If he didnt do it, he'd stay dead, and the little bitch that manipulated Shippo would get away with it! Revenge is ALWAYS the best solution! Much better than common sense!

"Sigh... fine," Inuyasha shrugged, "I'll do it." The blonde buxom gatekeeper smiled and sighed in relief at his answer, "Oh that's great! Finally... I get a break from all this mess!"
Not only does the angel hand him her book, she also gives him a clipboard and notepad as well. "Before I forget, the Big Man upstairs wants you to make a census of every single person that reaches the Gates. Be sure to include their name, age, cause of death, and whether or not they get accepted into Heaven."

Inuyasha nods, "No problem. Leave it to me!"
But then the angel stares him deep in his eyes with a serious look on her face, "Remember: make sure you get the entries EXACTLY right. If theyre in the book, they go in! If theyre not, they dont! If the book says they go to Heaven, do NOT tell them they go to Hell! And vice-versa! Punishment for breaking this rule is eternal damnation! Got that?"

"Yeah, sure. Got it." the dog-boy answered.
"Good! Now if you'll excuse me..." with a snap of her finger, her black robe instantly changed into a nurse's uniform with the nametag reading 'Cassie', "..Ive got a certain irritable rich-boy to mess with!" and with another snap, she was gone!

And so there he was. All alone in front of the Gates as the temporary Gate-keeper. "Ok... shouldnt be too tough," Inuyasha said to himself as he waited patiently for the first soul to arrive. It didnt take too long before the first appeared before him.

"Welcome to HeeeUUUGGHH?!" he stopped in mid-sentence at the tiny figure just below his feet. Apparently, the giant-effect even works in the afterlife! But that's not the biggest thing that intrigued Inuyasha... it was who this soul was. It just so happened to be his most hated of ally!

"K...Koga?" He bent over to look down at him, "is that you?"
"M...m..m...MUTT?!" Koga's jaw dropped at the sight of him, "What are YOU doing here?!"
"I'M the Gate-Keeper, wolf!" he grinned at that tiny wolf-demon in front of him, "It's my job to decide whether you get to go to Heaven... or have your soul suffer for AAAALLLLL eternity!" Oh, this was just awesome! TOO awesome for words! Inuyasha got such a great opportunity at his hands. Little Koga was at his mercy! This was indeed 'Heaven'!

"Ugh...great..." the little wolf shrugged, "just great..."
"So how'd ya die?" Inuyasha asked with a smile, "ya trip over your own shit?"
"Not that it's any of your business, mutt," Koga replied unwary of how wrong he was, "but that giant fox-brat that's always with you got so thirsty from fighting some red-headed brat with an accent that he took a drink from a lake... THAT I WAS STILL BATHING IN!!"

Dog-boy tried his best to hold back his laughter! "Bummer! Now let's see if your senseless death was worth anything!" He took out the pen from the clipboard and began writing Koga's info... at least in HIS opinion!
"Name: Koga
Age: Probably twice as old as the middleschool girl he's chasing but will never get!
Cause of Death: Being too...heh... delicous! HAHAHA!"

Koga was not liking what he was hearing one bit... not like he could really do a damn thing about it! However, Inuyasha had to be honest with his response of whether the wolf-boy would go to Heaven or Hell... otherwise....EEEEEEE.

"Now," dog-boy opened up the book and looked through it, "will little wolfie get to go beyond the Gates?" and then wrote, "Acceptance to Heaven........"
11212221111122111221111211.title: This is HEAVEN, after all!

choices: Inuyasha keeps Koga from getting in
112122211111221112211112111.content:
".....granted?!" Inuyasha said quietly, his jaw dropped. "Well what does it say mutt!? Do I get in or what!?" Koga asked impatiently. "Um......" he said still not believing that this mongrel was getting in. Then a wicked thought ran through his mind, what if he just sorta....lied to him? "Well he did once slaughter an entire village of people and god knows what else he's done...." But then he remembered the woman's words, "ETERNAL DAMNATION!" ran through his mind.

"Sigh....I guess this idiot isn't worth going to hell for.." he thought. "YO! Mutt!!!" Koga screamed to get Inuyasha' attention. Inuyasha sneered down at the wolf person....guy at his feet. "Then again...." he thought smiling wickedly. As if on cue the words "ETERNAL DAMNATION" ran through his mind again.

"Sigh.....Okay Koga, looks like you've been accepted." Inuyasha said defeated. Instantly a key (this one large enough to accomidate his enourmous hand) appeared and Inuyasha unlocked the large shiny gates behind him. The gates opened with a melodious chime that made Inuyasha's eye twitch, "Yeah yeah rub it in..." he groaned. "Ahem!" Koga said from below. Inuyasha turned back around and looked down at him, "Yeah what is it!? You've been accepted already go in!" he snarled.

"Well I would if you'd move your big stinking foot out of my way!" Koga yelled back. Inuyasha's right foot was blocking Koga's way. Suddenly Inuyasha got an idea, "Hmm....I wonder if it counts if I just...sorta keep him here?" Inuyasha thought smiling evilly.
112122211111221112211112111.title: Heaven Awaits

1121222111112211122111121112.content:
"Well, are you gonna move your huge foot?" Kouga yelled at Inuyasha. The hanyou had an idea. It WAS lonely here and Kouga would have the rest of eternity to be in Heaven, why not just keep him here for a while?

"BUT, there is an exception Kouga," Inuyasha grinned at the wolf.

"What do you mean? Just let me in," Kouga said, frustrated.

"Well, the book also says that since you weren't a perfectly nice guy when you were alive, before you enter Heaven, you have to do something".

Kouga couldn't believe this. Why was everything so complicated these days?

"So what do I have to do?" the wold demon asked.

"Whatever I want," Inuyasha said, trying not to grin too much.

"That's insane," Kouga yelled.

"Not really, now, get to rubbing my foot" Inuyasha said, as he sat down in front of Kouga.

Does Kouga do it?
1121222111112211122111121112.title: Inuyasha keeps Koga from getting in

choices: Koga meets the man in charge of Hell
Koga chickens out and tries to run away
112122211111221112211112112.content:
"REJECTED!!" Inuyasha gleefully reported.

"WHAT?!?!?" Koga screamed. "WHY?!?!?!?"

"Well lets see..." Inuyasha slowly turned through the book and found Koga's deeds in life. "You've murdered innocent people, stolen, lied, lusted after Kagome, had wrathful thoughts of revenge, attempted murder, made a promise you never intended to keep, etc. the list goes on."

Well, it sucked to be Koga. There was absolutely nothing he could do as he watched Inuyasha write under his name, "Final Place of Rest: Hell."

As soon as those fateful words were written, the clouds under Koga's feet disappeared and he fell from the sky. He fell unnaturally fast, like he had a weight tied to his legs, and he saw Earth appear before him before he hit the ground and passed through it. His eyes were obscured by darkness and an incredible heat suddenly was around him like he'd fallen in an oven. Finally, he came to a stop on some hard surface. Slowly light returned to him and he saw he was in some kind of office. There was only one light and it glowed red, covering everything in an unnatural crimson glow. Koga looked down and realized he was on some kind of desk. Suddenly, a voice came from behind him and said, "Name?"

Koga whipped around and saw a huge man, much the same size as Inuyasha and Cassie the Gatekeeper. He had short cut black hair with two horns just visible poking through his hair, his irises were a strange yellow color and he was dressed in a red and black robe much like Cassie. He wasn't really paying too much attention to Koga. He was leaning back in his chair and reading from a book, a pencil tapping behind his head. Koga didn't know exactly what was going on but he said, "Koga."

The strange man wrote down his name and said, "Now please hand me the report on your worldly deeds."

"My what?"

The man looked down at Koga for the first time and said, "Your report of worldly deeds. You know, what you did on Earth to deserve eternal damnation in the bowels of Hell."

"This is Hell?" Koga said, looking around the office. "It doesn't look so bad."

"Technically this is just Hell's Waiting Room." The man grinned showing sharp pointed teeth. "Depending on how bad you were in Life will determine which of the Seven Circles of Hell you'll be sent to."

"Well I didn't get any report." Koga said, starting to get annoyed.

The man leaned back again and rubbed his eyes. He sighed and said, "Look, I know all the tricks you mortals try to pull to get out of going "downstairs" but it's going to happen anyway. Do you want to make it worse for yourself by angering the Higher Ups?"

"But I'm telling the truth!" Koga insisted.

"I've been at this desk since time began and never once has Cassandra ever neglected to bring in a report." The man said.

"Well, she wasn't at the Gates when I got there. Inuyasha was."

"Really? Oh, so she went off again to cause some kind of mischief on Earth. Lucky her. We demons down here don't get to travel to Earth as decreed by the Goddess herself."

"Goddess? I thought God was a guy." Koga said.

"Common misconception. It is a male dominated world up there. But all of Heaven is run by Goddesses and the big kahuna is Washu. There's not a single guy up there running the show. When Washu sent the You Know Who "downstairs" she decided we all had to go. Since she can go to Earth she can be with as many guys as she wants. In fact, she always seems to be going back to the same house in Tokyo..."

"This is great and everything but what am I supposed to do now?" Koga asked.

"Well...I'm not sure." the man said. "Usually whenever Cassie goes out she tells the Temp what to do. I suppose I'm going to have to send you to the guy in charge down here. He'll be able to work things out."

Koga gulped. He didn't like where this was going. The last thing he wanted to do was see whoever was in charge down here. But the man was already drawing something on the desk. When he was done, a button popped out of the desk and he pressed it. It sank back into the desk and the back wall opened revealing a staircase leading down.

"That is Hell's Staircase. Just go down as far as it goes. There will be seven doors on the stairway but don't go in any of them. Each one leads to a different circle of Hell and once you go in, you don't come back out. By the way, I'm Christopher, Hell's Gatekeeper. Just call me Chris."

And with that, Chris flicked Koga off the desk and down the stairs. As soon as Koga hit the stairs, the door slammed closed behind him, leaving him in almost total darkness. Feeling his way down the stairs it didn't take as long as he thought it would to reach the last door at the bottom of the staircase. He hadn't even felt the other doors. He made absolutely sure he was at the bottom of the staircase before knocking on the door. A voice said, "Enter."

The door slowly opened and Koga walked in, feeling extremely nervous.
112122211111221112211112112.title: Hell's Waiting Room

choices: Inuyasha has no idea what paperwork Koenma's talking about
Inuyasha manages to figure out what the report of worldly deeds is
1121222111112211122111121121.content:
Koga entered the ominous door trying to see what lay ahead in the darkness. As soon as he was clear of it, the door slammed shut. Koga's tail had nearly been crushed, it closed to fast. He took a few steps forward and was suddenly blinded by a bright light. He looked down and saw he was standing on another desk. He slowly looked up and met the eyes of the ruler of Hell.

And he was a baby.

Koga didn't know quite what to think. But there was no mistaking that he was standing before a huge baby boy. He was sucking on a pacifier and everything. He was wearing a purple robe and a tall hat that had Jr. stamped on it. His hands were folded and he said, "So what can I do for you?"

Koga said the first thing that came to his head, "Who are you supposed to be?"

The baby's eye twitched and he said, "I'm the ruler of Hell, Koenma. I was sent down here by Washu after we had a falling out. I'm also the ruler of the afterlife in a different Universe, but in the end every person comes to the same place, either Heaven or Hell, no matter what Universe they're from and I'm here in Hell, while Washu is in Heaven. I can make an appearance on Earth only in the Universe where I rule the afterlife. But I digress. What are you here for?"

"How did you and this Washu person have a falling out?" Koga asked.

Koenma sighed and said, "We just both had different ideas on how things should be run in Heaven, some names were called, some injuries were incurred and I was sent down here with all the other men in Heaven. But we've adapted and it's our job to punish those who were evil in life. So what can I do for you?"

"You didn't have a relationship with her did you?" Koga asked slyly.

"WHAT IS WITH ALL THESE QUESTIONS ABOUT MY PERSONAL LIFE!!!" Koenma yelled, slamming his fists against his desk. "WASHU SENT ME DOWN HERE AND THAT'S ALL THAT MATTERS! IT DOESN'T MATTER IF I I DIDN'T DESERVE IT!!! NOW WHAT DO YOU WANT?!?!?!?"

Koga was slightly shaken by this angry response but said, "I don't have my report of worldly deeds."

"Is that all?" Koenma said, settling down. "Cassandra must be slipping. She never forgets things like that."

"She has a replacement right now." Koga said.

"Oh, well that explains it. Alright then I guess I'll have to make a call to this new Gatekeeper and have him send the report down to Chris." Koenma put his hand down over the right side of his desk and a phone appeared in it. He dialed a number and waited for someone to answer.
1121222111112211122111121121.title: Hell is Ruled by a Baby?

choices: Koenma figures out what the problem is
Inuyasha finally figures out how to use the phone
11212221111122111221111211211.content:
Inuyasha was lounging about waiting for the next soul to arrive when he heard a strange ringing sound. He looked around and spotted a strange device with buttons on it, and it seemed to be shaking. (This phone was just the right size for his massive hands) The ringing sound was coming from this strange object, Inuyasha walked over to it and cocked his head in intrigue. Being from Fuedal Japan he hadn't the slightest idea what a telephone was. "What the hell is this thing?" he said banging on it with his fist trying to get it to shut up.

Koenma was getting impatient, "What the heck is with this guy!? Cassie would've picked up the phone instantly!" Koenma said annoyed. Koga hadn't the slightest idea what this weird device was either, and if it wasn't for his big mouth Koenma would've never figured out what the problem was. "Um....I hate to interrupt but.....what the hell is that thing?" Koga said pointing at the telephone. Koenma just stared at him. "What do you mean what the hell is this thing? This is a telephone you moron!" he said not one for stupid questions. Koga just continued to stare. "What have you never seen a telephone before!?" Koenma said annoyed.

Koga just shook his head, "Whats a tel-e-phone?" Koga said clueless.

Koenma was getting impatient not only with Inuyasha but with Koga and his barrage of stupid questions.
11212221111122111221111211211.title: What the hell is a telephone!?

choices: Another soul arrives at the Gates
112122211111221112211112112112.content:
The thingy just kept making this annoying ringing sound and Inuyasha had no idea what to do. He seemed to remember seeing something like this once before but for the life of him he couldn't remember where. He grabbed one end of a springy rope and pulled on it to see what happened. The top part of the machine fell off and the ringing stopped. Suddenly, a voice began to issue from one end of the top half that had fallen off. Inuyasha grabbed it and held it up to his ear.

"What the hell took you so long you idiot?!?! Didn't Cassie explain ANYTHING before she left?!?!?" Koenma screamed.

"Who are you?" Inuyasha asked in completle confusion.

Koenma slapped his forehead and sighed in frustration. He took a deep breath, held it, and let it out. "I'm the ruler of Hell. You recently sent down a wolf demon without his report of wordly deeds and we can't place him in one of the circles of Hell without it. Where is is?"

Inuyasha looked around but didn't know exactly what a report was. Kagome was always going on about them, and how she never had time to write a decent one, but all Inuyasha had ever seen was a bunch of papers. And there was nothing like that around here.

"I don't know where it is." Inuyasha said. "There's nothing up here except the Gate."

'Cassie really picked an awful replacement this time. I swear that woman would let a dog guard the gate if it meant time on Earth.' Koenma thought bitterly. 'Always making my job harder than it has to be...'

Koenma shifted the phone to his other ear and said, "Alright, she should have a desk somewhere up there. Just find it and look through it until you find some papers with the name..." He covered the mouth piece and asked, "What's your name again?"

"Koga." Koga said simply.

"Koga." Koenma said back into the phone. "It should be in there somewhere. When you get it, send it down here to me." Koenman hung up the phone.

"Wait how am I supposed to do that?!?!?" Inuyasha asked desperately. But no voice came through. Only a dead buzzing sound. "Dammit. How the hell am I supposed to find anything up here? That Gatekeeper is going to get a chewing out when she gets back here!"
112122211111221112211112112112.title: I'm Surrounded By Idiots

choices: Inuyasha tries to talk to 'the big man...er.....woman' in charge
1121222111112211122111121121122.content:
Inuyasha began wandering around trying to search for Cassie's desk when another soul arrived. He turned around and groaned, "Dammit!" he thought as he ran over to the woman. Grabbing the clipboard and pen he quickly ran to her out of breath. "Hey...*pant*.....whats.....*pant*.....your name?" he asked. "Um....Mary.....hey am I dead?" she asked looking around. "Yep, now I need your age and um....." he said forgetting what else he needed from her. "Um........oh yeah and cause of death.....yeah thats it." he said hoping he didn't forget anything.

"I'm 35, and I don't know how I died. One minute I'm walking out of my house and poof, here I am." she said. Inuyasha slapped his forehead, "Great more problems..." he thought.

Koenma was getting very impatient, "Whats taking him so long!" he shouted out loud. Koga snickered, "Inuyasha is a dipshit mutt, he hasn't a clue what he's doing ya know that? I could be here all day!" Koenma however was not amused, "Okay first of all there aren't any days or nights in Hell, second: no.....I'll have you checked in and out of my hair if I have to go up there and get your report myself!" Koenma snarled.
1121222111112211122111121121122.title: No wonder Cassie wanted a break!

choices: Koga is sentenced to one of the Circles of Hell
Inuyasha demands to be sent back to Earth having fulfilled his end of the deal
11212221111122111221111211211222.content:
Inuyasha was losing his patience as fast as Koenma. He couldn't find the desk, he didn't have time to deal with this woman who didn't even know how she died, and he didn't want to spend anymore time being the Gatekeeper to Heaven. Just as he was about to lose it, another woman appeared next to the first one. Inuyasha bent down to talk to her, and saw that it was Cassandra! About damn time too! She was laughing about something and said, "Oh, playing with that guy never gets old! How easily he's hospitilized too!"

She looked up at Inuyasha and said, "Oh right. I should return to my normal size."

Within the blink of an eye, she was back to Inuyasha's size and in her robes. Inuyasha opened his mouth ready to let loose a stream of curses and insults about his ordeal but Cassie merely held up a hand and said, "Whatever your problem is, it doesn't matter anymore does it? Be glad I was only gone an hour!"

"But that's impossible!" Inuyasha said. "You've only been gone for twenty minutes at most!"

"Well, time moves differently on Earth." She said in a tone of voice one uses when one is talking with a fool. "Now what seems to be the hold up here?"

Inuyasha explained his problems with the woman not knowning the cause of her death, Koga's need to have a report of worldly deeds, and Koenma's impatience. Cassie sighed and said, "Leave it to a temp to ruin everything! Step aside and watch me work!"

She sat down in midair and instantly a desk appeared, her clothes changing to those of a secretary. She pushed up rimless glasses that had suddenly appeared on her face and opened up a drawer. She pulled out a sheaf of papers and stapled them together before dropping them in a box labeled Down, which was below another box labeled Up.

"That takes care of the report!" She said, pulling a pencil from behind her ear. "Now on to you." She pointed at the woman. "What's your deal?"

The woman explained herself and how she couldn't remember how she died. Cassie nodded at her words then opened another drawer. She pulled out what appeared to be a car antennae attached to a calculator. She passed the antennae over the woman. It made a faint whirring sound which gave way to a loud beep from the calculator. She typed something in and said, "You were killed by a gas explosion near your house. A manhole cover was sent skyrocketing towards you and took your head clean off." She dropped the strange equipment back into the drawer and pulled the book towards her. She flipped through it and said, "And congrats! You've been accepted into Heaven! Enjoy!"

She unlocked the gates with a large key and they swung open with an angelic chime. The woman greatfully stepped through the gates and Cassie pulled them closed again.

As all this was going on, Koenma had recieved the report and was flipping through it.

"Dear, dear..." He tutted. "You're not exactly a model citizen are you?"

He ran his finger down a list and muttered, "This is bad enough to get you to the Second Circle, this one to the Third...the Fourth..."

Koga's heart sank with each passing second. Apparently his deeds were heinous enough to land him deep within the torturous bowels of Hell. Finally Koenma dropped the report into a drawer and turned to Koga. Koga braced himself for judgement.
11212221111122111221111211211222.title: Cassandra's Back!

choices: Meanwhile, Inuyasha asks Cassandra if he can return to Earth
Koga is teased by a naked Kagome for all eternity
112122211111221112211112112112221.content:
"Having read all the crimes you've comitted; I have finally decided the circle of hell you shall be in." Koenma tells the Wolf youkai as he closes the book. "It has been decided that you will be put into the second circle of hell for your lusting a women who did not love you. And for betraying the girl you vowed to married."

"Damn it! I don't deserve to go to hell for loving Kagome!" Shouted the Wolf Demon angrily at the baby. He'd clawed his way out of hell just to live.

"Well pity you. We've also taken into account your kind eating humans. Normally we don't judge you for something like that since demons are higher on the food chain than humans. But if you take joy in eating humans like humans stuff themselves for fun by eating innocent animals that it is considered a sin." Explained Koenma to him. "And be thankful that you changed your ways. Being in the second circle is far better than the third, or fourth, or fifth, etc., etc." Tapping his desk, a button appeared underneath his desk. "Now it's time for you to be punished until the end of time." Koenma then pressed the button.

"As if! I'll escape from here and unleash my wrath upon you!" Koga said angrily as he jumped towards Koenma, his claws ready to slice through him.

"Koenma sir!" Many of the men workers said as they ignored their damned souls after seeing Koenma about to meet his end. But Koenma sat there calmly, unafraid.

That's when a elevator magically erupted from the ground. It landed right behind Koenma and proceeded to open. FLUSH! Like the sound of a toilet, thousands of rotten fish fell out. But as if they had a will they moved around Koenma and slammed into Koga, causing him to fall face first into Koenma's desk. The entire desk split in half as koga collapsed under thousand of dead rotting fish. "That was slower than usual." Koenma breathed deeply "And it seems like I need to get a new desk to boot. Good Job Prinnies! You just earned yourself a 2 cent raise!" Koenma smiled as he gave a thumbs up to his exploding slaves.

Exiting the Elevator was about twelve blue penguins. They had tiny purple demon wings, pouches filled with anvils, nuclear bombs, the Wii, amongst other things, and they had Peg legs. Not to mention that their bodies were stitched up like some ripped up doll. "Doods! We just earn 2 pennies! Now we'll make 7 cents per hour!" One of the Prinnies shouted happily. "All right Doods!" All of them screamed with joy at earn two extra pennies.

But as they jumped for joy, Koga had dug his head from beneath the rotten fish and looked up to see....blue birds? "What the hell are those things?" Koga asked as he saw the Prinnies.

"Those are my exploding slaves. We call them Prinnies. Basically their human souls who have earned a chance at being reincarnated. So they act as slave labor and for all most nothing!" Koenma laughed wickedly as he explained everything about his slaves. "They are also good footstools amongst other things. In fact, if you ever feel that your in a life threatening situation then all you need to do is grab one and toss it at your enemies. Then BOOM! Course that's also why all the men were kicked out of heaven cept for the Angels since the angelic men are outnumbered 100 to one by angel women('And they need a angel man by them to release their daily need for sex since any other guy will end up with a limb missing.' Koenma thought as he spoke) and the souls of mortals who have earned a place in Heaven." And thinking of why angel women need a angel man only reminded him of that time in Holy Vegas 'Brrr! I am never going to have a threesome with angel women again, their scary when they have sex!'

"Exploding birds? And their humans?" Koga was just confused as he was when he came down here. Only now it was about expodable humans. And didn't he say all the men in heaven were kicked out before?

"Yes. And just so you know, Angel men weren't created until after we were kicked out of Heaven for tossing Prinnies at Washu and the rest of the women. After all, every women especially Washu needs a man to help her with their daily 'needs'." Koenma giggled as he remembered how every one of the women in Heaven were transformed into anything amusing from a pig, a weiner dog, to Michael Jackson during the final battle. This Koga reminded him of his last good times before him and the rest of the men were replaced by those male angels. 'Good times. Good Times' Koenma thought as he held back his laughter, he ws afraid his body was gonna break from the laughter.

"Anyways, back to your sin." Koenma said as the Prinnies surrounded Koga. "And don't try to fight them. Your level is currently 58 while theirs is 4800." That only got Koga even more confused. "Normally in the second circle you are tossed about by a storm unable to touch the one you desire. But in this case we'll simply make naked versions of her appear around you teasing you for all eternity. And to make it even funnier, we'll have clouds of smoke surround their private area. Now take this fool away!" Koenma commanded the Prinnies. Saluting their master, the Prinnies grabbed chains from their pouches and attached them to Koga, carrying him off to the elevator to be carried down to the second circle of hell.
112122211111221112211112112112221.title: To the wondeful Second Circle of Hell!

choices: Inuyasha meets Washu and she explains The Dark Ages of the Multiverse
Koenma gets wind of what's going on
1121222111112211122111121121122211.content:
As Koga was sentenced to his eternal damnation, Inuyasha was standing by as Cassandra sent soul after soul on to Heaven or down to Hell. He was getting annoyed that she was just ignoring him as she went about her business, filing reports, answering phone calls, opening the gate, pushing the button to Hell. Finally he shouted, "HEY!!!"

She looked up and said, "What are you still here?"

Inuyasha face faulted and shouted, "Of course I'm still here! You haven't done a damn thing to bring me back to life yet!"

"Oh! How silly of me!" She said, standing up from behind her desk and changing back into her robes. She clapped her hands, rolled back her sleeves and pulled out what appeared to be a silver base ball bat.

"What are you going to do with that thing?" Inuyasha asked with some trepidation. He didn't have his Testsusaiga with him and this woman had proved to be mighty tricky.

"I'm going to use this bat to erase your memories of this place until it's your time to die. It will also send you back down to Earth in your Universe. Enjoy!"

She pulled back and was just about to swing when a sudden surge of souls appeared in a line in front of the gate. She faltered and looked as the line got longer, stretching away into the distance. She dropped her bat with a look of shock and said, "This can't be! Death like this hasn't been seen since the Dark Ages of the Multiverse."

"What are you talking about now?" Inuyasha asked with exasperation.

"I-I just can't believe it!" Cassandra said, ignoring Inuyasha's question. "It was always said that this day would come again! But...Washu will know what to do."

With new purpose, Cassandra reached to an empty space on her desk and grabbed the phone that appeared under her hand. She dialed a number and put the reciever to her ear. She paused for a few seconds then said, "This is Cassandra, Boss. It looks like the time has come again. Yes, the line is stretching beyond my sight. Yes, deaths from every Universe. What do you mean 'The Prophecy'? Yes, I have someone here with me...Really? He doesn't seem like he would be up to doing something like that. What? Of course not! No, I--Yes. Yes. Who else? Oh dear, this might be difficult...Of course. He'll be right there."

She hung up the phone and turned back to Inuyasha. She said, "Washu wishes to speak with you. All I can say is be polite and take whatever she says to heart. This is important."

Inuyasha was surprised at this sudden change in Cassandra's behavoir. He nodded and said, "How to do I get up there?"

For an answer, Cassandra drew something on her desk that caused a button to appear. She pressed it, sinking the button back into the woodwork. The Gates swung open but instead of revealing Heaven a tightly spiraling staircase was revealed.

"Just take the stairs as high as you can go. But don't get distracted by anything. She's expecting you so don't keep her waiting." Cassandra said, sitting down and pulling a huge book towards her. She opened it and started to write something occasionally stopping to talk to a soul. Inuyasha turned towards the staircase and started up. Cassandra was right. It was distracting. After only three minutes of climbing upward the spiral twisted off and Inuyasha was left with dozens of staircases leading to impossible places. Staircases that were upside down hung over his head and trailed down walls. A few staircases even appeared to start nowhere and end nowhere, just kind of hovering in space with no apparent purpose. Inuyasha closed his eyes to block out the dizzying choices and continued on his path upward. Before long, he slammed into a door. Opening his eyes he saw a plain wooden door that stated: Washu's Office.

"Well, here goes nothing." Inuyasha said as he knocked on the door.

"Come in!" A voice called from within.

Inuyasha opened the door and stepped into the office of the most powerful being in the Universe.
1121222111112211122111121121122211.title: Bigger Problems

choices: Inuyasha meets the six warriors from the other Universes (Different animes)
Meanwhile, the new evil seven start coming together (Again, different animes)
11212221111122111221111211211222111.content:
Inuyasha looked around and was surprised to see a ver plain, simple office. A desk was in the middle of it and there were pictures covering every wall, each of a different man. Below each picture was a small caption that had a name, age, and date on it. Inuyasha looked up and saw even more pictures covering the ceiling. One that caught his eye in particular had a huge X over it. It appeared to be of a young man with brown hair, the word Jr stamped across his forehead, and with what appeared to be a pacifier in his mouth. Inuyasha didn't know quite what to think of this. Suddenly, a voice said, "You know, it's rude to ignore someone."

His eyes snapped down and he saw a small girl with violently pink hair staring at him. She pointed at the foot of her desk and a chair appeared out of nowhere. Inuyasha took the hint and sat down. The girl kept staring at him for awhile then said, "So you're Inuyasha."

"Yeah, and?" Inuyasha said rudely.

Washu laughed and said, "Not many people talk back to the Goddess of the Universe. But then again, ignorance is bliss I suppose."

Inuyasha didn't say anything. He just glowered at her. Washu raised and eyebrow and said, "But we don't really have time for this do we? No." She said before Inuyasha could reply. "I allowed you up here because of what Cassie told me. A long line of souls, stretching beyond sight is one of the signs of Armageddon."

"You mean the end of the world?" Inuyasha said surprised. "How?"

"This throws back all the way to the Dark Ages of the Multiverse." Washu said cryptically.

"Okay, so what the hell is the Dark Ages of the Multiverse?" Inuyasha asked, annoyed.

Washu folded her hands and said, "This is going to take awhile, so get comfortable. Now let's see...the Dark Ages of the Multiverse began when all the men were kicked into Hell. The disorder that caused weakened the barriers that seperate the Universes causing untold destruction and death. Then, with the Universes in total chaos, a cabinet of evil was formed. All the most ruthless humans, demons, and monsters banded together with seven of the most evil at their head. Together, they sought to control all Universes, to bend them to their will. They succeeded somewhat, but before things could get too out of hand, a group of seven rose to oppose them. I was, of course, at the head. Unfortunately, I needed that two timing bastard Koenma's help, so he was there too. You can imagine my fury at having to ask for his help after imprisoning him in Hell not two days earlier. Anyway, we managed to overthrow them after a harrowing battle. We fought across the Universes, our size flucuating, our strength changing, our forms fluid. It was crazy I can you tell you that! Finally, we managed to defeat them and fix the barriers around the Universes. Life continued on, the Universes were safe, and we all thought we'd seen the last of major troubles. But a prophecy was made that no one but me knew about that was made a few weeks after the crisis was averted. The prophecy mentioned a strange occurence that would signal the end of all Universes. That was the arrival of a demon in Heaven that would be loyal enough to guard the Gates. Having imprisoned all demons in Hell, I didn't think I had anything to worry about. But now you've shown up. A demon. Who stayed to guard the Gates."

"Hey, I didn't exactly have a choice!" Inuyasha said angrily. "That Gatekeeper of yours said she could bring me back to life if I guarded the Gates for an hour! It's not like I planned on making it a permenant job!"

"That's irrevelant now. The first sign of the prophecy has been fullfilled and the rest will surely come true. Now, until it happens, I can't tell anyone what the signs are, but I can assemble another team to block the coming threat. I've already got Cassandra working on bringing them in from the different Universes. You'll meet them down at the Gates with this message from me: In order to save the Universes, you must travel through the seven chosen lands. Only then can you defeat your adversaries and find the means to avert catastrophe. That's it. Good luck! I'll be in contact!"

Before Inuyasha could say anything else, Washu pressed a button and sent Inuyasha hurtling backwards, back down to the Gates.
11212221111122111221111211211222111.title: Dark Days Ahead

choices: Inuyasha arrives at the gates to meet the seven Anime Heroes
The evil villains began to formulate a plan of attack across the universes
112122211111221112211112112112221112.content:
Meanwhile as Inuyasha was being told the story of how Seven Heroes defeated Seven Evils. A new evil group had begun to gather under the name of that which the greatest of evils took. These seven evil warriors would begin a campaign for multiversal destruction and would be known as the First Seven were known as. COOKIE: The darkest and most feared force in existance. More evil than LOVE or BUNNY ever were when they existed.

In the dark corner of existance a great table existed within the shadows. Seven chairs were seated around the table. Each adorned with a jewel that will allow only its chosen owner to sit upon it. And from these shadows, the first member of COOKIE appeared. "Aha! I knew that I the most perfect creature to ever exist wold be the first to arrive amongst COOKIE!" Called forth the evil android Cell in his perfect form. He sat down in the Emerald black chair. Villain from=Dragon Ball Z

"That only shows that you are a weakling you fool! A being like me who is a God am far more worthy than you insect." Called forth the bishounen boy Bakura. He was wearing the milleniums ring and was currently controlled by the evil of the ring known only as the God Zorc. "This vessel will be my voice amongst this group." Possessed Bakura said as he sat down in the Ruby black Chair. Villain from=Yugioh

"Bah! Before I! The great good boy Tobi None of you can withstand my sharingan or the tailed beasts that I have gathered." Called forth the Orange Masked True leader of Akatsuki. And one of the three surviving members of the Uchiha clan. He sat down in the Black Sapphire chair. Villain from=Naruto(BIG BIG SPOILERS IF YOU HAVEN'T READ CHAPTER 363-5 at Onemanga.com!)

"Fools! None of you could even survive my tremendous power if I decided to consume you and your planet whole!" Called forth the fourth member. The evil Unicron. Who was apparently speaking through a small robot designed to sit within one of the chairs. And so he sat down upon the Black Moonstone chair. Villain from= Transformers

"You are all dark souls who seek nothing but pain and suffering. But In order for the one I care most to be happy, I must become a villain amongst you." Called forth the 17th Angel of Free Will. Known also as Kaoru Nagisa. The albino boy sat down in the Lapis Lazuli Chair. Villain from(Well he really isn't evil. I just adore him to much)= Neon Genesis Evangelion.

"As if any of you can do anything right! As a representative of this organization I show you all the power of the Seven Warlords of the Sea." Called forth Mihawk, one of the Seven Warlords. He sat down in the Opal Black chair.

"BWAHAHAHAHAHA! All fear me! For I am evil amongst evil! Villain amongst villains! Overlords of Overlords!" All of them cept Kaoru covered their ears to hide the pain of his evil laugh as none other than Overlord Laharl sat down in the Black Diamond chair.

The Seven Darkest villains looked at a Black Crystal Ball that a mysterious shadowy pair of eyes emerged from. "Welcome the Dark Seven. Commanders of the Eternal Armies of Darkness." Called the voice, a voice that sounded no louder than a Twelve year old. "If you have a question about your comrades please answer away."

"I understand why many of these villains are here. But I must know why I, a boy who is actually a hero is amongst this group." Kaoru asked calmly as he sat there. Many of the others looked at one another and nodded. Why was a ANGEL who sacrificed himself out of love be a villain?

"You are to act in Naraku's place. Since the Seven Generals are supposed to lead the armies upon the battlefield, Naraku would not join the group. For he is a manipulator and a master of traps. He has no desire to fight on the battlefield, even though his power is equal to all of you who sit here upon this table. Naraku IS a part of this group. But he is the 8th Unofficial Member and shall be known simply as the black hole crystal." The child-like voice replied.

"I see. So instead of placing a weaker villain amongst this group, you decided to place a strong hero who would make this group strong instead of placing a weaker villain who would make this group have holes in its defense. That and I am dedicated to rescuing my father no matter the cost." Kaoru replied calmly.

"Correct." Stated The mysterious child.

"But there are other villains that could take my place. Ones from non-anime universes such as Albedo, Sephiroth, Darth Vader, or Even Voldemort." Kaoru replied.

"That is true. But they are BOOK, VIDEO GAMES, AND MOVIE villains. While this new COOKIE is made up of Anime Villains only. They shall be considered minor leaders amongst this group. But only because they are not Anime villains. If they were Anime villains, then several of you would have been replaced by them. Unless they are pieces of crap like the Power Puff Girl Z's Mojo Jojo who is no better than the original" The voice told them. All of the villains nodded and began to formulate their own plans for unifying the endless armies into one.
112122211111221112211112112112221112.title: Creators Other Ominous Kreatures Into Evil(COOKIE)

choices: Washu and Koenma send them off to their first world
Meanwhile, the evil seven prepare for war!
1121222111112211122111121121122211121.content:
As the wicked anime villains began formulating a plan under their evil mysterious leader, Inuyasha was walking back down the confusing stairway to the Gates of Heaven. It didn't take long and as soon as he got there, Cassandra jumped up from her desk and said, "Follow me."

Inuyasha followed her back up the stairs, but they took a different path then the one that led to Washu's office. It didn't take long to reach another door which Cassandra promptly threw open. She pushed him inside and said, "The others will be here shortly. Once this door closes, you will shrink down to your normal size and the room will contract to fit you. I'm sorry I have to be so blunt, but there's a major line up out there."

And with that, the door closed. Inuyasha didn't feel any different but he must've shrunk along with the room. He looked around and saw he was in a rather large room with a white screen against the far wall as well as a table in the center of the room. Inuyasha sat down in a red chair and waited for the others. He noticed a strange machine that was placed on the table. It looked like someone attached a telescope to a black box of some sort. A wheel with different picture pieces stuck in it could be spun around. Inuyasha was wondering what it was for, when the door opened and Cassandra shoved another person in. He was rather tall with spiky black hair and wearing matching orange pants and shirt. Cassandra said, "Sit down, don't ask any questions, the others will be here shortly."

The door slammed shut again and the man looked around. Finally, he sat down in an orange chair across from Inuyasha.

"Who are you?" Inuyasha asked.

"I'm Goku." The man said. "Do you know what's going on here? I was on my way home with grocercies Chi-Chi asked me to buy, but then I was suddenly in front of these gates and that woman led me here."

"I'm not even really sure what's going on!" Inuyasha said. "Let's just say we have to save the Universe."

Before Goku could ask anymore questions, the door opened again and Cassandra was shoving a kid with spiky blond hair into the room. Like Goku, he was dressed in orange and had these wierd whisker lines down his cheeks. He turned around and shouted out the door, "Hey, hey! Don't push me old lady! I can walk by myself you know!"

Cassandra ignored the old lady remark, but her eye twitched slightly. She contented herself with saying, "Sit down, shut up, and wait for the others."

The door slammed once again. Instantly the kid turned to the other two and said, "Alright, just what the heck is going on here?"

Before Inuyasha or Goku could say anything the door opened again and another person was shoved in, knocking the first kid down. This new guy had bright orange hair and was dressed all in black with a huge sword on his back. He had managed to stay upright while the kid had been knocked flat on his back. He quickly sat up and said, "Watch where you're going you idiot!"

The kid with orange hair slammed a foot onto the blonde kid's chest and said, "What did you call me you little punk?!?"

Instantly, Cassandra was in between the two, pushing them apart.

"Stop this right now! You all have to work together, not tear each other apart! Now sit down and wait for the others!"

Sulkily, the two boys sat down, the blonde kid in a yellow chair, and the orange haired kid in a black chair. The door closed and an uncomfortable silence spun out. In an attempt to break the silence, Goku asked, "So who are you two?"

The blonde kid instantly jumped up and said, "My name is Naruto Uzumaki, and someday, I'm going to be the number one ninja in my village!"

The orange haired kid sighed and said, "I'm Ichigo Kurosaki, substitute Soul Reaper."

Before anyone could ask what a Soul Reaper was, the door opened yet again and once more Cassandra was shoving someone through once again. This kid looked abnormally short and had large spiky tri-colored hair. Once more, Cassandra advised him to be quiet, sit down, and wait. The boy sat in a purple chair and looked around. Inuyasha noticed he was wearing a strange gold necklace. The boy broke the silence and said, "So does anyone know what's going on here? My name is Yugi Moto by the way."

"This guy in the red said we had to save the Universe. Not that, that's a new thing for me." Goku said, indicating Inuyasha.

Once again, before Inuyasha could say anything, the door opened. But it opened much wider than it had before. Strangely, a red and blue truck rumbled in and stopped by the table.

"Yes, just sit down and wait. Only one more person has yet to arrive."

The door closed and everyone stared at the truck. All of their eyes widened as the truck suddenly transformed into a giant robot. This robot sat down in a huge blue chair at the head of the table and looked around.

Goku leaned over to Ichigo and asked, "What is that thing?"

"You're asking me?" Ichigo said in disbelief.

"Excuse me, but I'm not a thing!" The robot said. "My name is Optimus Prime, leader of the Autobots and sworn enemy of Megatron."

Naruto jumped up again and shouted, "What the heck are you talking about?"

Optimus was about to answer when the door opened again and the last person arrived. His black hair was slicked back and he was wearing a white shirt with blue jeans and sneakers. His hands were in his pockets and he turned back to Cassandra as she said, "I'm sorry I can't conduct this meeting myself. I'll be sending someone up as soon as I can."

The door closed, and the boy looked around the table at the assembled crew. He sat down in the only remaining chair, a green one, and said, "Hey, the name's Yusuke Urameshi."

Everyone took this opportunity to introduce themselves. Soon, everyone knew everyone at the table, by name if not by experience. The silence was palpable as they all waited to see who would be conducting this meeting. They didn't have to wait long. The door opened and a cheerful looking girl with blue hair and a pink kimono walked in and said, "Hello everyone! My name is Botan!"

Yusuke's mouth dropped open in surprise and he said, "Botan?!? What are you doing here?"

"Silly Yusuke!" She said, walking to the screen. "I'm here to conduct this meeting. Now that the Barriers have been broken, anyone can travel to different Universes if they have the means. I just flew here on my oar!"

She cleared her throat and looked much more serious. "Now then. To business."

She pulled out a small remote and clicked it at the projector that was on the table. Instantly a picture of a Universe popped up.

"This is a Universe. Normally it's seperated from other Universes by Barriers. These were created at the same time as the multiple Universes to keep the negative and positive energies of each Universe seperate. This is a delicate balance and it has been disrupted by an unknown force. Whoever, or whatever, he is, he's very powerful and he has assembled a force of villains to take over the Universes for himself. We think he might be picking up where the first group of seven left off. It will be your jobs to fix the Barriers and defeat the evil wherever it surfaces. To do this, you will have to travel to various worlds and find seven artifacts that were hidden there long ago. Only with these seven powerful objects will you be able to fight against the armies of darkness. Now, while you seven will be artifact hunting, the evil seven will be amassing its armies to take over. This is a good thing, because their eyes will be directed elsewhere. If they do find out what we're doing, they will surely send someone after you and delay the process of artifact hunting. Be warned: Each of these artifacts holds untold amounts of power. With it, you will be able to obliterate your foes. Combine all seven, and a power will be unleashed that is so enormous, it will eradicate the forces of darkness and fix the Barriers. That is your mission."

While she had talked different pictures had gone by and they were now at the end of them. She smiled and said, "You will now go see Washu and Koenma so they may send you to your first destination."

"What, Koenma is here too?" Yusuke asked incredulously.

"Oh yes! He demanded to have a part in organizing this. Washu wasn't very happy as you can imagine."

With that, she opened the door and ushered everyone out. She closed the door behind them and they all headed up to Washu's office.
1121222111112211122111121121122211121.title: Debriefing

1121222111112211122111122.content:
The woman pointed a finger at him and ordered, "Strip!"

Inuyasha jumped back in surprise and said, "WHAT?!?!?"

"You heard me! It is lonely up here! I never get to leave this gate and it has left me... wanting. I need to at least see a man naked! Now strip! Or I'll send you to Hell no matter what you've done!"

Inuyasha growled and muttered to himself but slipped off his gi top followed by his parachute pants.

"There! Satisfied?"

The woman pulled out a piece of paper and began to draw on it. Inuyasha stood by patiently for a few minutes while she worked.

"There! This should keep me occupied for awhile..."

"Can I go now?"

"Hmmm....I suppose. But stay away from the Touch of Death! Or next time things'll have to get dirtier! I mean it!"

So Inuyasha was sent back down to earth, returned to his body, and his memories were modified. He slowly stood up and faced the demoness.

She clapped her hands to her mouth and said, "Whoop! How'd you survive?"

Inuyasha looked confused and said, "Survive what?"

"My Touch of Death!"

"I guess it doesn't work on me!" Inuyasha said. "Now where were we?"

The demoness shrieked as Inuyasha picked her up by her collar.

"I tried to be nice, but enough is enough! Stop this now!"

He immediately notices her crocodile-tears, "What the?! Cut that out!!! Youre not fooling anyone!!" But he was wrong..

Shippo and Sadri stopped fighting and turned their heads....

A huge fireball shot out at Inuyasha's chest, "OW!! WHO THREW THAT?!" he drops the demoness!

"Let the woman go!!" Sadri glared at him.

Inuyasha just looked at Shippo weirdly, "Shippo? Im trying to save you here!"
Chronos runs to Shippo and Sadri, "H...Help me! He tried to molest me!!"

"WHAT???!! I DID NOT!!!"

"You sick, flea-ridden bastard!" Sadri glared and raised a finger at him, "Release the light... AND BIND THE DARKNESS!!" a beam of light shot out his finger and hit Inuyasha's necklace!

"Aw god, not again.." Inuyasha's face slammed down HARD on the ground... and couldnt get back up!! He was frozen stiff to the ground...

112122211111221112211112222.content:
Shippo lifted his foot and slammed it down on top of Inuyasha once again.

Sadri knelt down next to his remains and said, "Hah! Let that teach you to mess with my dear Chronos!"

Shippo kicked Sadri in the face while he was distracted. Sadri fell onto his back his nose bleeding.

"Gah! Look what you've done! I'm bleeding! You'll pay for that!"

Sadri clapped his hands together and slowly pulled them apart. A huge fireball formed in his hands which grew larger and larger until it was the size of a beach ball and held it over his head. Shippo waited until Sadri threw the fireball at him then transformed into the big pink ball. The fireball bounced off and launched into the sky.

"You'll have to do better then that!" Shippo laughed.

"I've only just started you little ingrate!"

-Back in Heaven-

Inuyasha stared up at the huge gates in front of him and then at the woman standing next to them, a drawing in her hand.

"Yes, yes, welcome what's your name?" She said rather fast, not looking up from the drawing.

"Inuyasha. What the hells going on here anyway? Where am I?"

The guard's head snapped up and she narrowed her eyes at him.

"What are you? A klutz or something? This is the THIRD time you've come here!"

"What? No it's not!" He yelled back.

She slapped her forehead. This was giving her a headache.

"Well it doesn't matter. You've been here more then you should and I can't keep giving you chances! You blew it again and again by acting stupid! Now you're going to burn!"

"Wait! Isn't there anyway I can get sent back?"

"Oh no! I've heard this one before! No one gets a FOURTH chance."

"Come on! Isn't there anything?"

"Maybe..." She said, a sudden idea forming. "A few hundred years ago a demon found its way into Heaven and stole a magic artifact. It was a weapon forged from Holy Magic and was one of kind."

"What is it?" Inuyasha asked.

"It was a doubled sided rod carved from wood from the eldest tree, hidden in the Mists of Death. The other half was forged from silver and ivory. The rod was imbued with Sacred powers from Heaven and the pure destructive force of Hell. It was originally created as a symbol of balance between good and evil. But when the demon stole it the balance twisted violently and near apocalyptic destruction rained down on the earth. The demon was only slain when a group of High Priests came together and sealed the monster in the mountains. The weapon was lost, apparently in those same mountains. If you can find the weapon and bring it back to me, I'll give you your fourth chance and grant you instant access to Heaven for this momentous good deed. If you don't revert to sin of course."

"No problem! I'll find it and use it to destroy Naraku once and for all!"

"No! You musn't use it! Its power will twist your body and spirit and use you to bring destruction once more! The rod can't be handled by earthly creatures. After only a day of using the rod, the demon who stole it grew to a monstrous size, horns sprouted from its head and a mane of wild hair grew down the spines of its back. It was a human like demon before it stole the rod and after its body was turned into that of a mindless beast. Beware its power Inuyasha!"

"Alright, I get it." Inuyasha said. "Now send me back!"

"Remember! Find the weapon in the mountains!"

And with that the guard dismissed Inuyasha back to earth.

-Meanwhile at Heavens Gates-

Cassandra hastily stuffed the picture into the front of her robe and said, "So how did you die anyway? I thought you were sealed in the mountain."

The demon's eyes narrowed as he said, "Yes, you heard correct. I was trapped in a mountain as it was the only thing that could house my enormous body. I was not as you see me now. No...I was a beast! Walking on four legs with four horns, boiling red eyes, and fangs the size of trees! The last thing I remember was the priests sealing me and the rod in seperate peaks. Then it only seemed a second later, though judging by the things I saw several hundred years must have past, I saw a small demon girl standing before me. She smiled a strange smile and I grinned down at her. But she had nothing to say. She only touched one of my toes and I felt life draining from me. I don't know what that demon girl is, but her touch is death! My body dissolved from the monstrous state back to my normal form. And now you see me here before you."

Cassandra looked directly into his eyes and said, "And now you want me to bring you back to life so that you might destroy this demoness and take back the rod in atonement?"

The demon bowed and said, "You are correct."

She puffed up her cheeks and blew a raspberry at him.

"Hah! Like I can believe you!"

The demon wiped the spit from his eyes and said, "And how do you expect to retrieve both halves of the rod and the Chronos Stone?"

"I've already sent someone! You will not be needed."

"Ahh, but what if I told you I hid one half of the rod."

"How? You were killed as soon as you were released."

"In the last vestiges of my life, I managed to use the remaining divine powers I had to spirit away the Side of Heaven, the holding niche for the Chronos Stone on the top of it, to a secret location. I could go retrieve it...if I were alive."

Cassandra bit her lip in consternation. Here was a dilema!

I've always had a thing with you being a bug to me that I would care for and now that dream of mine has come true!" Weevil heard this wide-eyed and fell over in shock, "I-I've had the same dream. I wanted to be shrunken down so that I could be yours to do with what you wished and now, it seems both of our dreams have come true, though not in the way either of us expected it!"

Rex then grinned, "Well then. Do you think that you could figure out an antidote for this so I could get back to normal?" Weevil then shrugged, knowing exactly what Rex was thinking, "It'd take a lot of time, probably several weeks to figure out the antidote and then another month or two to work on a shrinking potion."

Rex frowned, "But I can't wait that long!" before Weevil chimed in, "Well why are you complaining? You have me and you're 1000 feet tall! How about putting me somewhere safe on you and you can have some fun!" Rex's frown turned into a smirk as he looked at the expanse of his new playground, "Why didn't I think of that before?" as he puts Weevil...

"Remember Kurama. The vial works well, and it will help you stay focused, unlike two others...anyway, you will grow to their height, and even by luck, you may even surpass it, but it is temporary. After a certain amount of time, it will wear off, so you may want to do your job quick and in a hury, or you may end up like those poor humans below."

1141211211211.title: The Vial and the Mayhem

choices: "Stop the giant demon coming this way".
11412112112112.content:
Suddenly, Yusuke and Hiei stopped as they saw something out of the corner of their eye and it was growing. They looked and found Kurama growing up to their height.

"Alright, Kurama is here to help me," Yusuke shouted.

"Like hell he is, he's here to help me," Hiei shouted back. Both started fighting again, but for only a few seconds, until they heard a voice shout "ENOUGH!"

They both turned towards Kurama and found themselves facing his chest. Looking up, they saw Kurama looking down at them, a look of anger on his face. He then looked down at the ground and saw some humans grouped together, cowering in fear. He bent down to tal to them.

"Don't worry, we'll be finished here soon. You guys can go home," he told the people. They ran off as Kurama stood back to his full height looking down on Yusuke and Hiei, who actually looked a bit scared of what the giant demon would do.

"What do you guys think you're doing? This isn't some playground. Yusuke, I thought you wanted to protect people, not destroy them and the city. You're acting like a bunch of children".

Yusuke and Hiei looked at each other and then around. They saw buildings cut in half, fires in some buildings and red stains on the ground, with crumpled bodies lying not far away. Yusuke was horrified. He was so focused on Hiei that he ignored everything else, including the tiny people below.

"Sorry Kurama," Yusuke muttered, knowing the red head was right, but still wanting to keep some dignity. Hiei just nodded his head as he spit Keiko out into his palm. She was drenched in saliva and scared to death. Yusuke leaned over to talk to her, but she crawled backwards, not wanting to get close to him.

"Come on Keiko, it's just me," Yusuke said, not knowing how deep his voice had become. Keiko had her hands over her ears.

"Yeah," she screamed, "Well, the Yusuke I knew would never do this".

"Okay," Yusuke said, "I get it, what we did was wrong. Can't we just get this lecture over with?"

Kurama looked around, "Maybe there is some way you can redeem yourselves. You can..."

People were running as always. Ash grabbed some people and crushed them inside his hand. It was covered with blood but it wasn't important for the giant. Then, Ash used his final punch to destroy the centre mall. He did it, he destroyed his last target.

Ash fapped and cummed on the ruins. It was perfect ! He loved his rampages. But suddenly, Ash felt strange... What's happened ?
11521121112111.title: Four destructions, four methods.

Ash began to worry. He had just arrived and already the chaos had started. Ash waved his hands trying to alert everyone.

"Wait! Please! I'm not going to hurt you guys! Honest!"

Apparently, the people didn't listen as they ran from the now large boy.

Ash looked down at the people as they tried to run away from the huge pokemon trainer.

Doing his best not to crush anyone, he took a step forward and...

Ash as mostly a very clumsy person, and it was showing now because when he took that step he tripped over a small red car and started to fall.
With a very loud thud that created earthquakes at rating 4, Ash fell onto the city. Instantly all the tall buildings jabbed into his body and crumbled. Ash was so big that almost all of the city was under his body. As he lay there, he could feel the millions, upon millions of people dieing under his gigantic body. However he couldn't get up. His foot was stuck in a local swimming pool.

Ash lay there trying his best to get up without destroying anything else. But he couldn't do it. And the worst thing was that a small pool of red was forming around his body.
