1152121.content:
It was a beautiful day in Palet Town and Ash, Brock, Misty, and Pikachu were visiting Professor Oak. He was showing them his latest invention.
"It's a growth supplement for Pokemon. It makes them bigger, faster, and stronger! I've already tested it on this Voltorb!"
He lifted up what appeared to be an Electrode but turned out to be a giant Voltorb!
"Wow that's amazing! Can we have some for my Pokemon?" Ash asked.
"Of course. You can take this bottle. Be careful how much you use. A little bit goes a long way."
He handed Ash a box the size of a pencil box filled with pills.
"Let's use it!" Ash said.
Before they could, however, a cloud of smoke filled the room! Ash used his Pidgeotte to blow the smoke away.
"What was that?" Misty asked.
"I don't know. But....Oh no!" Professor Oak yelled. "Someone stole an entire crate of my supplement!"
"I'll bet it was Team Rocket! Don't worry Professor Oak! We'll get it back!" Ash said.
They ran outside and began to track Team Rocket.
Meanwhile, in a hot air balloon outside Palet Town....
"I can't believe how easy it was to steal these pills!" James said.
"All it takes is a little ingenuity!" Jesse said. "Now let's test these pills!"
Back with Ash....
"No luck. When we find them they're going to get a super powered jolt! Here Pickachu! Eat this!"
1152121.title: Professor Oak's New Invention....Stolen!

11521221.content:
One fine day in Dr. Garcia's laboratory, Dr. Garcia looked through the window and yawned. "I need to go out and get some fresh air." Said Dr. Garcia, as he exited his laboratory, he looked up at his mansion and saw that one of his windows is broken.

Dr. Garcia: I never knew that window was broken! I wonder how did that happen...

Dr. Garcia starts to investigate the situation and reveals a dead creature nearby.

Dr. Garcia: Hmm... What a wierd-looking creature. It looks like a mouse or maybe a rat, but it's way too big to be a mouse, and I have never seen a mouse whose fur is yellow. It seems to have a couple of pink cheeks and extraordinarily large ears. This might be interesting for me to do some experiments with this strange creature.

So, Dr. Garcia took that creature, into his laboratory.

Back in Dr. Garcia's Lab, Dr. Garcia inserts that strange little creature into his device to genetically engineer and to revive it.

Dr. Garcia: Ha, this ought to work. After I press this button, this creature will be brought back to life, thanks to my genius!

After pushing the button, the machine starts rattling and making strange sounds.

Dr. Garcia: What the... Despite of the uniquely shaped creature, this machine should be able to obtain a thorough scan of this creature. However, this is not suppose to happen according to my theories.

After a few minutes, the machine starts smoking, leading to an explosion in Garcia's lab. Dr. Garcia hurries and tries to shut off the power.

Dr. Garcia: Dang! I guess that the machine can't take this strange creature...

After the explosion and after the smoke is clear, a creature jumps out of the mess and pronounces, "Pichu?" Dr. Garcia looks at the creature with amusement and asks the creature for its name. The creature simply replies, "Pichu?"

Dr. Garcia: Ahhh! Pichu is your name?
Pichu: Pichu!

Pichu looks at Garcia with enthusiasm and starts approaching to Dr. Garcia slowly.

Dr. Garcia: What do you want?
Pichu: *Drips all over the place and replies,* Pichu!

The mouse, Pichu, is rather one foot tall and when he approaches to Dr. Garcia with hunger, Garcia quickly evades from Pichu.

Dr. Garcia: Get away from me! Otherwise, I'm going to destroy you!

Pichu walks away into Garcia's labrynth.

Dr. Garcia: Pichu! You can't go there!!!

Not willing to listen to Garcia's advice, Pichu enters into Garcia's room. Because Pichu is dying of starvation, he quickly gulps any of the potion found on Garcia's room. When Dr. Garcia enters into the room, he finds out that those chemicals have been consumed by the creature.

Dr. Garcia: Oh no... He drank ALL OF THEM... *Garcia quickly runs away from his room as soon as possible, knowing what will happen next.*

Pichu suddenly feels extremely sick and leans downwards rapidly. After a few minutes, Pichu becomes grizzly and starts to generate electricity and shocks elsewhere. His body is shaking and his mood is constantly changing from happiness to sadness. During this time, the place appears to be shrinking in front of Pichu's eyes. He ponders about this strange dilemma. When he gets up, he stretches himself and breaks the ceiling. Pichu has grown from 1 foot high to over two stories high!

Although Dr. Garcia knows the consequence when his chemical potions are ingested, he refuses to leave his lab, not wanting to abandon all of his experiments. He decides to go back to his room. Seeing a two-stories high Pichu, Garcia says,

Dr. Garcia: Oh My God! What the heck happened here! I guess that this proves that my potions actually work!

In the meantime, Garcia realizes his hair is being soaked by Pichu who starts dripping all over the place.

Dr. Garcia: Hey buddy! Do you want to help me to complete my experiments?

Pichu kneels down and grabs Dr. Garcia with his chubby arms.

Dr. Garcia: Let me go, you overgrown RAT!

After tearing Garcia's clothes apart, Pichu starts patting all over Garcia's body.

Dr. Garcia: Hey, stop that! That's ticklish!

Pichu holds Garcia by the foot and stares at Garcia with huge black eyes. Pichu puts Garcia near his nose and starts sniffing him.

Dr. Garcia: Aaachoo! Let me down!

Pichu then grabs Dr. Garcia and cuddles him very hard.

Dr. Garcia: I can't breathe! Please release me!

Pichu: Pichu.... Piii---

After cuddling Dr. Garcia, Pichu starts licking Dr. Garcia. Afterwards, Pichu coughs since Garcia hasn't showered for weeks!

Pichu: Pii... Chuu-eww!

Pichu scratches his head and holds Garcia in one hand, thinking what can Pichu do to remove that disgusting taste. Pichu goes into the bathroom and fills the tub with hot water. He throws Dr. Garcia into the bathtub.

Pichu: Pichu!
Dr. Garcia: That's too hot, you fool!
Pichu: Pichu?

Pichu starts rubbing Garcia on the back and on the front. Pichu even washes Garcia's hair as Dr. Garcia tries to escape from Pichu's grasp. Pichu slaps Dr. Garcia to order Garcia to behave himself. After Garcia is cleansed, Pichu starts licking over Garcia's body and says, while giving an evil grin,

Pichu: Piii....

Pichu picks Garcia up and shows Garcia his claws.

Dr. Garcia: What are you going to do...?

Pichu throws his claws at Garcia, making a mishmash out of Garcia's bold body.

Dr. Garcia: Yeoowwch! Nooo...

Pichu starts licking Garcia's blood with pleasure. He opens his mouth and approaches Dr. Garcia's wounded body. However, Pichu backs off as he got a better idea.

Dr. Garcia: Oh.. God no!

Using his fingers, Pichu starts picking Dr. Garcia wounds. After that, he licks his fingers and enjoys the taste pretty much. He grins even more, looking at Dr. Garcia's wounds. Pichu starts punching Dr. Garcia's wounds until some flesh is spilling out of those wounds. Dr Garcia breathes so hard, trying to survive.

Dr. Garcia: Why is this happening to me... YEOOWCHH!!... Eeeeeeeehhh...

Slowly dying, Dr. Garcia's body is being torn apart by Pichu. After picking up a chunk of flesh, Pichu engulfs that into his mouth. Pichu starts chewing, seeming to enjoy so much. Pichu looks at the dying doctor and says,

Pichu: Pichu...

Dr. Garcia moans in pain while Pichu finishes chewing that chunk of flesh. Pichu decides to take a bite of out one of Dr. Garcia's legs. Pichu rips Dr. Garcia legs apart and puts it into the mouth. Dr. Garcia is completely speechless as he's in a coma, knowing that one of his limbs has been ripped apart. Dr. Garcia still struggles to survive, wishing to complete his ultimate experiments. It's just too bad that Garcia has to be conceded by one of his guinea pigs.

After Pichu finishes chewing the leg, Pichu cleans the blood from his face by licking them thoroughly. Thinking that it tastes so good, Pichu decides to add some flavors to the almost cadaver of Garcia. Pichu lays Dr. Garcia on the table and rushes to the kitchen to pick up a bunch of hot sauce, the Tobasco Sauce. He sprays all the hot sauce to Garcia's body. Dr. Garcia cries out in pain and eventually dies in agony. Pichu looks at the cadaver, thinking that it's no fun tormenting the body. He decides to just gulp the body directly. In addition, since Pichu likes to enjoy tasting human's flesh, Pichu starts eating the corpse gradually by tasting all of the tendons, nerves, flesh, and even the bones piece by piece. When the body is completely crushed, Pichu finally swallows it. Nonetheless, as Pichu is still hungry, he decides to leave the place in order to look for bigger meals. Where will this monstrous man-eating mouse go?
11521221.title: Pichu Brothers/Pichu it is then!

115212211.content: pichu is heading for the big city, to have the hope of finding his "one year ration" of humans, he then made it and started to eat humans and humans, but then someone appears, is.....
115212211.title: Pichu, the new human eater.

choices: Pichu continues his vore and carnage!
Pichu leaves the city in search of different places to explore in his great size
1152122112.content:
After a while of devouring many humans in the large city, the army finally arrived onto the scene in jets!

When Pichu noticed this, he was a little frightened, and in spite of his size and power over his puny surroundings, he felt a little scared. The incoming Jet caught his attention. It was flying very low, and would be difficult to catch under any circumstances.
He braced himself for the catch with a loud "Pichu!". From a crawl, he adjusted his position to a low crouch, and had to smile, looking down between his feet at the tiny cars and buses in the parking lot thinking about the view anyone below might be seeing if they looked up.

American Airline flight 77 was coming in low and fast, Pichu took a deep breath, and held it as the plane zoomed in. He grabbed it almost at ground level, his angle was just a little off, and the right wing hit the ground, bent and snapped in his paw, but other than that, he held the plane firmly but securely in his grasp. The Mayor of the city, watching on a monitor whistled and said,
"Damn!! I'm hurry up and destroy this beast!" The staff had been worried about the sudden appearance of the colossus in their precious city.

There were six rmy jets among the sixty eight passengers. Pichu roared "Pichu!" and at the same time, his stomach growled. Apparently he was still hungry and wanted more human cuisine.
Pichu then started shaking the jet in his paw in an attempt to get the human of the plane so he could eat them and fill his hungry belly, so the six army men were pushed out the door forcibly by violent shaking, Pichu looked at the pathetic tiny figures in his paw, staring up at him with fear.
He picked up one squiggling little figure holding it between his thumb and paw finger. Pichu licked his lips as he stared with hungry eyes at the small kicking figure. Then after a few secounds, Pichu opened it's seemingly large jaws and brang the first victim towards it's mouth while the other soldiers watched in hypnotic fascination as it's tongue snaked out to tease the little man and coat him with saliva, then nudged him into it's gaping mouth.
The man’s head had progressed deep into Pichu’s throat and he was in mortal peril of vanishing forever if Pichu should swallow. He no longer struggled. Probably paralyzed in fear.

Pichu’s lustful eyes went from his tiny victim to the army men as it's tongue formed a semi-circular channel running back to it's terrible throat. Pichu was rising up to engulf it's little victim, whose head was just now nudging it's uvula as he convulsed at the prospect of what waited below for him.
In slow motion Pichu’s throat contracted, embracing the man's head and shoulders in hot slick flesh taking him inexorably deeper and then re-opening. Pichu repeated this taking him still deeper. With practiced expertise, he was swallowing him down just as a snake swallows its’ prey, engulfing him a gulp at a time.

Suddenly Pichu’s peristaltic reflexes erupted, it's throat completely embracing the little army man and dispatching him swiftly with a loud satisfied gulp. Pichu sighed and patted his belly wich responded with a hearty growl. Pichu then looked down at his other victims with an evil grin.
But instead of eating them right away, like the little men sitting in Pichu's paw had expected. Pichu whisked them all down to just below it's chest and pressed them against the warm, soft, yellow flesh of it's stomach. As Pichu held them close to his stomach, they could distinctly hear cries of anguish from deep inside, reaching them through the imprisoning walls of this Pokemons belly.

Then at this moment Pichu quickly threw them high into the air over it. All of the men were still shocked from the throw when they landed deep into Pichu’s wide opened maw. Pichu then promptly closed his maw and swallowed all the men down! The wiggling bulge in Pichu’s neck quickly disappeared into his belly, where anyone that entered it, would die of both asphyxiation and acid burns.

"That's it for the brave troops of flight 93" The Mayor thought, sad that he could not save them.
After that horroriffic scene, Pichu was still hungry! And his belly even growled as proof that he was. So he desperately tried to grab the remainder of the jets, in an attempt the break them open like nuts to get the real meat inside...

So Pichu stood high on his feet and tried to grab them, but the jets fired itty bitty rockets at him. This did not hurt Pichu, but it definetely annoyed him. So Pichu then used his thunder shock attack! And easily fried each and every rocket to ashes. Pichu giggled with excitement and squealed "Pichu!" triumphantly, then continued to destroy the city in search of more humans to fill his unmerciful belly.

After seeing this, the Mayor cried out in anguish "No!" realizing that their was no hope left for his precious city... So, what will happen next?
1152122112.title: The army comes!

choices: Contnue towards the heart of the city!
Take a nice nap before going on...
11521221121.content:
As Pichu continued his chaos and feasting, he finally got full and patted his belly. Even though he wasn't hungry anymore, he definetely wasn't done playing.
He wanted to see the peoples reaction. He knelt down to look closer at the nearest building.
Looking into the windows of the top floors He could make out the people.
The people were no more than an inch tall, He could hold about a dozen in one hand alone.
Still kneeling before the first building, he placed his paw firmly on the top floor, and gave it a push. The building gave way under his yellow paw, it rocked a little, and then at the base of the building, puffs of smoke and dust billowed out, indicating that the base of the structure was damaged and the building would collapse. People dove from the upper floors, to fall to their death,
the ones inside would be crushed and buried under the rubble. The
building crumpled under his hand, as the building disintegrated. This
pleased the Pichu, who then stood up, and took a step over to the next
building, that looked just like the first. He noticed that the people
in the building were streaming out, trying to escape. He slowly placed
his foot on the tiny people, first holding back, and then pushing down
with his full weight. Then, like someone stamping out a cigarette butt,
he ground the bodies into a mushy red paste it oozed up between his toes. Lifting his foot now, he placed the ball of his foot onto the roof of the structure. The
building crumpled under his yellow foot, kicking up a cloud of dust and
smoke. "Pichu!" Pichu exclaimed excitedly, delighting in all the damage he was causing. Though Pichu wanted to take a closer look at the people, so he reached
down and managed to pick up a handful, He held them in his left paw, It was fantastic, they were like helpless squirming maggots. He threw them to the ground where they plopped by his feet.
Pichu then decided to walk directly into the heart of the city.
Each step was different, and each step was a delight. Cars and trucks flattened like tin foil, roads buckled, underground water mains would shoot up tiny
sprays misting his feet and ankles, gas lines ruptured and exploded beneath him as he walked. The concrete gave way, and broke like thin ice over a puddle. Pichu
enjoyed every step, taking the time to grind a crowded bus under his heel, or
to drag his foot through the crowds at a shopping mall.
The streets were more and more crowded as he approached the tall downtown buildings. More and more people were crushed under his foot, every time he took a step. He could hear the sounds of traffic, emergency sirens, and the din of people screaming, all as if coming from very far away.

The buildings, now were far taller than the ones along the outskirts of the city, Pichu laughed with a hearty "Pichu!" as he very much enjoyed antagonizing this little town. Most of the buildings were clothed in a skin of glass and metal, unlike the smaller ones of brick. At one point Pichu caught a glimpse of himself reflected in the shiny mirror like surface. He liked what he saw and smiled cutely, upon reaching to touch his reflection, the building was taller than him though, but that didn't mean that he could'nt easily destroy it, a portion of the glass fell away, revealing a mesh of exposed floors, these were the offices with a view, and what a view they had now, of this gigantic Pichu. His skin was yellow, and he had long pointy ears, and a nimble black nose. Pichu scraped away the first layer from the tall office building, like a cat clawing at a scratching post. Mortar, furniture and people plummeted down sixty stories below as Pichu giggled.

More offices, walls, and tiny furniture was revealed, tiny people bolted through the doors, hoping to escape into the heart of the building. Pichu opened his paw like a wedge, and pushed through the thin inner walls. The outside of the building swayed, showering glass down below. It would be easy to push all the way through to the other side.
Pichu grabbed another handful of people, these he squeezed, making a fist. He then opened his hand to examine the results to see if there were any left alive, there were none. Pichu wiped his paw on another building, leaving a red streak, this gave him an idea. Using the red pulp, like paint, he put a streak across his pink cheeks and forehead, then, using his thumb paw, he made a series of red dots across his yellow chest.
Checking out his reflection in another building, he was pleased with
the results and squealed "Pi, Pichu, Chu!", it looked like war paint. Pichu knocked the top floors off the skyscraper, looking down now, he could see the many cubicles revealed for the first time under the blue sky. This time Pichu made a fist, and plunged it down the center of the structure. Once more the building quaked, loosing more glass and concrete. Little fires erupted from inside the building, Pichu could make out tiny figures enwrapped in the flames.

Pichu leaned his huge body against the building, leaning into it, until its exterior collapsed inward, making an impression of the Pichu's body, as if it were sand. People clung to the boys immense paw, to escape the fatal drop. Pichu in turn squashed these people against him, leaving spatters of red. Pichu kneed the lower stories of the building, and the structure gave way, it collapsed upon itself with a series of explosions, Pichu could'nt help but laugh as the structure slipped and shrunk before him. he placed his foot on the remaining heap like it was a trophy, and wiped his paws.

He spent the next few minutes stepping on and mashing the mobs, rushing by his giant feet. it was like stepping on raspberries. they mashed to juice and pulp under his foot. Occasionally he would bend down to pick up individuals to squeeze between his thumb paw and knuckle, he liked the way they seemed to pop, after considerable wiggling. His thumb nicely covered the whole of the people, only leaving their head, hands and feet showing. He could only slightly feel the bones shatter as he applied pressure. Pinching heads off made him giggle and stick out his tongue, what a mess he was making. Pichu then sighed and looked around. What will this Pokemonzilla do next?
11521221121.title: More destruction, comin' your way!

choices: Let Pichu take a small 'lunch time' break before continueing on.
115212211211.content:
The young Pichu stooped down to look at the marquise of a department store. Bending down into a crouching position like a kid above an ant hill, he put his enormous paw onto the buildings glass and brick wall, as his hand pressed against it, windows shattered sending tiny flecks of glass down to the street below. Traffic was stopped in all directions as terrified people fled their cars, but right now the giant Pichu was preoccupied examining the model-like building.

He could try to look in the windows of the tall structure, but everything was so small and weak. If he wanted to, he could easily push a hole through the wall. He noticed tiny people running away, down on the sidewalk. A lot of them disappeared beneath the marquis that shaded the main entrance.

Pichu figured that there must be a lot of people in the structure before him. Reaching down, he grabbed the overhang between his thumb paw and paw, and ripped it off the wall. Plaster shattered and metal gave way, revealing the shattered glass entrance beneath. As he pushed his paw into the entrance, he could see the tiny people trying to escape his grasp. He grabbed a handful, some clung to his paw to avoid falling, others were grabbing on to each other. He brought his hand before his black innocent-looking eyes and watched the panicking worms. Slowly he closed his hand, it felt like a hand full of cooked green beens. He could almost hear the screams. Though he didn't know why, it affected him in a pleasing way. Their tiny bodies popped, like packets filled with ketchup. As he opened his hand, it was spotted red, with twisted bits of what looked like brown, white and red mangled clay.

A few of the surviving bug people, sought to run to the outside of Pichu's paw, to avoid another death grip. Pichu smiled and flicked them off his paw. with a shake, then he stood up.

The building was just above him, but it would'nt give him any problem in destroying it, he made a fist, and crashed his paw through the structure. Bricks and mortar showered down inside, it gave him the reaction he wanted. Crowds started flooding out the door, by his yellow feet, some would look up and scream, others would push those in front of them down, causing a pile up of bodies. Pichu smiled down at them, and let the first surge, pass his giant feet, then lifting his foot he carefully placed it over the swirling mass below. As he slowly lowered his foot, they tickled him, brushing the sensitive bottom of his massive sole. He could feel the panic, as those under his great foot realized they would soon be mashed to jelly into the concrete.
Some tried to crawl up onto his foot, from between his toes, as he bore his foot down harder, the tickle stopped moving, red spurts gushed from below his heel and the ball of his foot. He lifted his foot again, another surge rushed out the shattered store front. Pichu placed his heel on the ground lifting his arch and toes over the escaping mob, again he slowly lowered his foot, the bottom of which was slippery with gore and clinging articles of clothing. Twenty more were trapped beneath his foot. He crouched down again to get a closer look at the damage his foot was doing.

A policeman with a gun ran as close as he could and fired a fuselage of bullets, Pichu didn't feel anything, but was angered by the nerve of this tiny person, he bumped the policeman gently with his toe, the officer fell backwards, Pichu broke the legs of the helpless victim.

The worm like squirming excited Pichu, who then placed his toe directly over the head and shoulder of the tiny man, as he put his weight on the figure, he pushed his toe forward, leaving a long red steak on the ground.

Standing up again to his huge height, he was beginning to tire of this game. The ten story, block sized department store below him was severely damaged. Pichu would finish off the job by electrocuting it, and letting it collapse to rubble beneath the incredible surge.

As he shocked the building, it crumpled like a multi layer wedding cake. About the ruined structure, a plume of dust and smoke arose. Pichu could see water, fire and tiny people jumping from the windows of the collapsing walls, this was great fun, and there was still so much to do before him. Pichu roared "Pichu!" content with excitement. The city was his. Now what?
115212211211.title: Mash that city, Pichu!

1152122112111.content:
The late morning sun was climbing higher in the sky, as Pichu waded
along the channel that separated the city from the mainland. Up and
down the river, Pichu could see the numerous bridges and spans that
allowed traffic to flow in and out of the city. Some were simple
railroad bridges, while others were complex multi level constructions,
as intricate with their woven spans, as piano strings.

The water of the river was only up to the Pichu's stomach, the bottom was soft and mushy silt, Pichu was careful so as not to slip. As he approached the first fairly large bridge, he marveled at it in curiosity, it's tallest spires were really tall. There were four lanes in each direction, and the cars were
like matchbox toys. Most were the size of one of Pichu's paw single paw.
A bus was the length one of it's arms. Traffic was beginning to jam, as
the drivers saw the huge Pichu approaching. Pichu smiled as the cars
started to swerve, even before he got near.

"Pichu, Pi, Pichu!" Pichu emmited with giddyness. Pichu nudged the structure with his elbow, the trestles swayed, as if in a fierce storm. A few cars actually flew off the
bridge, plunging into the river below, Pichu nudged the bridge again,
a little harder this time, the center portion rocked like a swing,
cracks formed all across the base of the structure, and the two towers
that supported the span, showed the slightest signs of bending.

By now all traffic had come to a halt on the bridge, Pichu looked at all the traffic surrounding it and
could see the tiny people abandoning their vehicles to make run for the safty of either side. They were so small.

Pichu managed to lift its foot out of the water, and brought it over
the bridge, so that he easily straddled it. A long yellow bus was right
below him, he reached out towards it and grabbed the bus, then brang it close to it's face. As Pichu held it close to his face, the driver gunned the engine futily. Holding the bus with both arms, he gently pressed his thumb paws together, the windows shattered as the metal sides collapsed inward, crushing the helpless riders. Casually, Pichu tossed the bus into the river at his feet. it bubbled and sank quickly.

Pichu again lifted his foot, only this time he set it directly on the bridge, as he bared his weight upon it, the steel cables snapped, portions of asphalt and iron collapsed into the waters. Could the bridge support Pichu? Not a chance! The center part of the span, snapped throwing all the cars into the water. Pichu continued to wade up the river, noting how the houses were getting larger and taller.
On either bank of the river there were warehouses, docks, and shipyards. The largest of the buildings were still only the size of a bed, Pichu was heading up the river where the "tall" buildings were.
Coming down the river was a large tanker, it must of been five feet long, to Pichu, who splashed down into the shallow water to get a better close-up look.

It was gray and rust colored, and had two smoke stacks that billowed dark
smoke. It couldn't maneuver very well, and it couldn't go very fast either.
Even lying flat on his belly, the river wasn't deep enough to cover his
back, Pichu smiled and chuckled "Chu!" as the water he displaced, rushed up the banks, knocking down some of the smaller wooden buildings. The water felt good against his bare skin, and it cooled him off a bit.

Pichu grabbed the freighter and lifted it clear of the water. The props were spinning wildly in the air. As Pichu clutched the boat tighter, the metal crumpled like a tin soda can, Pichu grabbed the rest of the ship with his other paw, and pulled it in half, the crew spilled out into the waters. Squeezing tighter, the metal compressed like tin foil. The Pichu scooped up a group of people that were bobbing in the water, he
squashed them easily. His paw was red with the remains, he rinsed in the water which also turned red, and discarded the crumpled ship, it quickly disappeared beneath the murky waters.

Pichu stood up again, volumes of water poured off of him. Pichu wanted to walk off the side of the river, but Pichu also wanted to I'll dry off a bit.
The city is up ahead, but for now, Pichu wanted to have some fun with these little buildings. Stepping onshore, he placed his foot carefully onto a waterfront
warehouse. It collapsed to splinters beneath his foot. His next step
hit a water tower that gushed it's contents before falling. All the
while, people, hundreds of them scurried from before his massive form.
Pichu shuffled his feet, watching smoke and dust lift, from wherever
he placed his foot. The stack of power lines, at the generator plant,
sparked and glowed blue and pink as they fell under his foot. The high
voltage gently tingled him, but no more. Cars speeding along the riverside freeway were flattened like roaches, picking up a car, Pichu was delighted to see the driver and his passenger dive out the door onto his paw. Pichu crumpled the car and discarded it, being careful not to let these two people get away. They stood almost about as tall as a paper clip, and Pichu could make out that one was a man, and the other a plump lady. She screamed when she realized the boy was looking directly at her. The man pulled a gun and quickly emptied it, as if it could even be felt by the boy.

Pichu carefully lifted the man out of his right paw, where the woman was lying, she had lost her balance and slipped backwards. Pichu held the man out over empty space, at it's shoulders. The man would have been lucky if Pichu just dropped him to his death. Instead, Pichu placed the man gently on the ground, he set the woman not far from the man carefully. The woman was screaming all the time. Then the
boy stood up to his full height. The whole time, Pichu had a wicked smile as if he knew what he was about to do. The man was trying to make a run for it, when the Pichu lowered his toe, breaking the mans feet. The tiny man tumbled over. The woman screamed some more. Pichu moved his foot just a tiny bit, placing his toe directly over the mans rump, then he slowly pressed down, the man
squirmed, a red puddle forming from his mashed lower limbs. The boy,
lifting his toe again just a little more, he placed it over his victims
belly and chest. He could almost hear the little man screaming "No,
nooo" more blood actually gushed, drenching the woman who could only
watch and scream herself silly. Was the man dead yet? Pichu lifted his
foot away to look at the mangled pulp with two arms and a head. It
reminded him of some of the bugs that it had seen in the past that had been mooshed, only now there was this pretty red. Pichu knelt down, tempted to see more of what the human body looked like, so Pichu placed his thumb paw directly on the head, he pushed down, it easily gave with a pleasing pop. The brains, it seems were a light pink, like shrimp.

The screaming lady was paralyzed with fear, there was a spot of brown, and yellow. Pichu became angered with all the screaming and yelled "Pichuuuuu!", as he pinched her between his thumb paw and paw and squeezed her like a tube of tooth paste. She gave way to moosh, between in his, as a jet of blood spurted, drops of it sprayed the Pichu face. He licked it of, reminding him of how good it tasted (back with the incident of Dr. Garcia), and then placed the red on his finger, to his tongue. there wasn't enough to taste, but Pichu was starting to get hungry.

Pichu at first didn't notice more Apache helicopters (like the last ones) that were combat ready, approaching him. Pichu grinned, "Pichu...". Will Pichu fight them, or just ignore them?
1152122112111.title: Pichuzilla! :o

choices: To the heart of the city.
11521221121111.content:
The armies were massing on the hills, on the outskirts of the city, it was clear that they wanted to confront the gigantic Pichu, with the minimum of damage to the civilian buildings.
Isn't that just too bad for Pichu, who did not like being the target of a sting of hits from the cannons of the war helicopters.
Twelve Apaches in formation headed towards his face, each with a ruby laser sight line, pointing to his eyes. Puffs of smoke indicated the launch of the air to ground heat seeking missiles, while vapor trails marked the trajectory of the ground based missiles.
A line up of sixty tanks approached in formation, their cannons blasting, their sights were focused on the Pichu's exposed stomach area. A number of surveillance jets passed over Pichu's head, reporting back to their base commanders, observing far from the melee. Then there was the ground troops, like a marching swath, the tiny soldiers covered the ground, behind the tanks. Their swastikas flying behind the fighting troops, indicating where the command units were stationed. This was their concentrated effort as saving their city.

The heat seeking missiles struck Pichu on his sides and stomach area, the made large explosions, but they might as well have been blasting at twelve foot thick steel plates. Pichu felt a slight sting, this did little but anger him, another volley was launched, It was the shot's toward his eyes, that bothered Pichu, he shielded them with his wrist, as the cannons let loose. Again, the blasts exploded on Pichu's arm, without so much as breaking his skin.
The Helicopters backed off, and circled around for another pass at the giant Pokemon. They were fast, but Pichu's mouse-like reflexes were terrific, Pichu whipped his hand, grabbing the first machine, and like swatting at a gnat, Pichu easily knocked it out of the sky, it plummeted to the ground in a fiery explosion.
The Apaches broke formation, now each one was zooming in toward a different body part, hoping for a more massive hit. They were desperate to draw blood. One flew behind Pichu's, and came up behind his head, cannons blasting, Pichu swatted it like a mosquito, it squashed against Pichu's back, tickling it slightly. With Full weaponry blazing, five helicopters made a charge towards Pichu's face, They had accurately surmised that the only place Pichu might be vulnerable would be at his eyes, they were going in for a point blank hit. Pichu swung around with furious "Pichu!"s, the blasts directly hitting the side of Pichu's face sending a trickle of blood down the boys cheek, now they were sending their most powerful weapons up against the titanic Chu. Most of the missiles had no effect, other than a short flash followed by a sting, more often than not, Pichu was able to nimbly dodge the trails, and then retaliate by charging the launchers. At the first volley, Pichu just stood still, seeking to gauge the worst that they could dish out, but after being hit, although not hard enough to be anything more than a nuisance, He decided to go on the offensive.

First, all the Helicopters had to go. The Jets were trickier, but after the air forces were taken over, he would mop up the ground assault. They attacked savagely and just as quickly were dispatched. Pichu swung, with speedy reflexes, at speeds that the ground troops could not anticipate, knocking aircraft out of the sky, and directing the fiery wrecks toward the forces below. Pichu could catch even the fastest helicopters in his hand, with crushing force. He jabbed and punched, dodged and blocked, all the while delivering death blows toward his attackers. The jet bombers were flying higher than his reach, dropping their most powerful payload, one hit, actually made a substantial gash. A river of blood ran down the Pichu's arm, this gave the ground troops some hope. Pichu searched quickly for some projectile to launch back at them, he had to do something to bring the speedy high flying craft down. Pilots soon realized the folly of flying low, Pichu pulled them from out of the air in mid-flight, and dashed them to the ground, the smart ones kept their altitude. Pichu swooped to the ground, grabbing a hand full of tanks, these he jettisoned, like a child skipping stones on a lake, at the high flyers. Pichu laughed as a tank tore through the fuselage of one of the slower moving bombers, as the plane broke up, a puff of twenty parachutes dotted the sky. Drifting closer and closer to Pichu's anxious grasp. Pichu tore the screaming paratroopers to bloody shreds.

"Pichuuuuu!!!!!!!!!!" he roared, Like David defending himself against Goliath, the Pichu proved to be an uncanny shot, The sky was full of parachuters abandoning their doomed craft. He grabbed handfuls of tanks, directing them at the remaining jets, and sometimes at the ground based launchers.
Terrified, the tank commanders, reversed their weapons, not aware of the ground forces that were following close behind. Many of their own men were caught under the treds of the retreating tanks. The generals seeing how their own tanks were being used as weapons against the aircraft, commanded the tanks to get out of there, but where could they go to escape Pichu's clutches? The larger slow flying bombers all met fiery ends, but there was one last bomber quickly entering the range, it was flying twice as fast, and Pichu figured that this was probably the biggest weapon yet, it was flying so fast that it made a pass at the young pre-evolved form of Pikachu, shooting a red beam, Pichu grabbed at it, without strain and missed it, it got by him, leaving a long but shallow cut along his side. "Pichu?", the cut didn't bother him, it was only a scratch. He followed the path of the jet, as it banked left and circled around while climbing to safety. It was going to make another pass. As it started its next run, Pichu noticed a bay door opening in the front, it was armed with some kind of missile, it was aimed straight at his chest, it was approaching super fast, Pichu didn't wait for the launch, he ducked low, the jet didn't fire it's main weapon, but it darted past Pichu's large diamond-shaped ear, he had been cut again! "Pichu!" wined Pichu.
Angrily he grabbed a handful of tanks, and flung them at the retreating bomber, it still had it's major bomb, and was going to make another attempt. As a race car entering it's final curve, the plane banked and adjusted altitude for the approach. Pichu crouched like a catcher waiting for the plane, he had a plan. The jet was flying low now, the pilots watched the mountain of a Pichu loom larger, they set the data and came up with a path that would lead to a direct hit. Just the concussion from the impact alone would stop the giant Pokemon's heart, all they needed was one shot.

With grim determination to carry out his plan, Pichu held his position. The jet was darting in racing toward it's target. Pichu stood still and stuck out it's tongue a little, the countdown came, Ready, Aim... The boy at the last moment, like a bullfighter stepped to the side, and spun to his right, the jet passed too close, the pilot and crew were jolted as Pichu grabbed the wing of the craft in his spinning left paw. Without letting up speed, Pichu spun the jet back in the direction of the troops. The weapon fired and the boy watched as many of the ground troops in the back, were incinerated by their own weaponry. The jet itself could not right itself and adjust it's course. It slammed like a fireball into the headquarter station, setting off a second ground explosion. "Chu, Pi, Chu!" Shouted the Pichu, Now it's Pichu's turn...
He vented his fury on the ground troops. Their weapons were useless. Die you miserable scum, Pichu's expression seemed to say, as he stomped on the retreating forces, heads were smashed for miles around, The ground ran red with the blood of the fallen. Pichu was breathing heavy, after the slaughter, but he was elated. Now he would do his job and finish off the city. Pichu sang as he trotted along the path towards it's next stop. Where will Pichu head next?
11521221121111.title: The battle...

115212211211111.content:
The row of apartments blocked Pichu's path, each was about twenty stories tall, they stood in formation. For some reason they reminded Pichu of dogs, German Shepherds standing still in six rows of four.
Each was a broad standing structure, Thick in mass, brick and glass, just above the boys kneecaps. All were remarkably identical, like they were stamped out. Dog size dominos, lying on edge.
The boy approched the complex from the middle of the broad side of the buildings. This was a major complex, Pichu figured the buildings to be older than some of the skyscrapers he had leveled downtown.
Those were mostly metal and glass, these were all made of bricks, with smaller windows. This is going to be fun, Pichu liked the way the brick structures crumpled, as they kind of fell into themselves.
Surrounding all the buildings were the parking lots, filled with toy-sized sized cars. Pichu placed both of his feet in the parking lot, compressing about 5 vehicles beneath his weight.
The people were trying to escape in their cars, but the parking lots were hopelessly jammed, even if Pichu hadn't blocked their path.

Pedestrians were fleeing from the structures in droves, still there was no way they could totally evacuate their buildings in the short time they had left.
Pichu took another step closer, wiping out some more vehicles. It would be easy to smash the buildings with it's arms, bringing them down to the ground, but Pichu wanted to do something different.
He crouched down to get a better look at the crowds swarming around his feet. This was just so neat. The little people were so easily dashed,
He crushed them with his paws, then with his feet. Their reactions were pretty much the same, as he reached for them; they fell and screamed.
Some tried to evade him, and suffered the worse for bringing themselves to his attention. These he would make special work of.
One man fancied he could escape by dodging the Pichu hands. When he was caught, the boy proceeded to tear the tiny figure apart. First the arms were plucked off with a spray of blood, then the feet, then the legs. Pichu squashed the rest of the body with his thumb paw, then he put his thumb paw to his mouth. Pichu began to salivate as he licked the plood with a smile.

Pichu was hungry. Pichu was standing up before the broad side of the middle building in the row. The buildings now reached up to his head.
Pichu found another person, this time a woman. "Pichu...", Pichu licked its maw as it quickly popped her alive into it's mouth. She had the consistency of a marshmallow. Pichu used his front teeth to biting her, she abruptly stopped moving, then Pichu chewed a little then swallowed with a loud "gulp!".
Pichu plucked another screaming victim, this time from the parking lot. As Pichu brought the tiny figure to its mouth, Pichu could almost imagine it screaming "noooo..". This one Pichu mashed with it's molars.
However, eating them one at a time just wasn't enough to fill Pichu's hungry belly. He dragged the edge of his paw like a scoop, Pichu counted 4 people in his paw, then Pichu leaned its head back and dropped them, struggling, directly into it's mouth. Pichu held them in it's mouth for a moment before deciding to chew. Pichu could feel them moving on its tounge.
They made a good mouthful, and Pichu chewed way past the last kicking and struggling. The warm blood tasted good. Their clothing was swallowed with the carcasses. The clothing left a stringy aftertase in Pichu's maw, Pichu didn't like it though.
Pichu grabbed another handful, these Pichu gobbled up quickly. As Pichu chewed, blood would dribble from its mouth, Pichu used his bare arm to wipe the excess from its lips.

Pichu still standing up, decided to do in the buildings by just plowing into them. As Pichu slowly approached the first structure like a bulldozer, Pichu saw people leaping from the windows. Better to die in the fall, than be crushed in the collapsing building they use to call home.
Pichu's stomach touched the first building, lightly at first. The bricks gave the walls a softer feeling, like a pie crust. Pichu savored the sensation as the building collapsed about its chest.
The brick walls gave way, then the inner structures, these collapsed like cookie wafers, inward, revealing more furniture, crumbling drywall, and trapped people.
"Pichu, Pi, Pichu, Chu!", Pichu laughed, giggling as it raised its paws above its head and continued stomping, plowing into the next structure. Still hungry, Pichu took another handful of people to his mouth. These Pichu chewed slowly and thoughtfully. Then another. Pichu kept the clothing in a wad in its mouth, rather than swallow it.
The building actually tickled Pichu as he plowed through it, Pichu continued on his stomoping through the next building in the row. Like an unstoppable moving mountain, Pichu laughed as each building collapsed.
Pichu noticed on top of the structures, what looked like little cups, a water reservoir it appeared to be, Pichu lifted one up, and poured the water into its mouth it was cool and refreshing after the warm blood. Excellent! Three on each building, about forty gallons each, Pichu would be able to drink his full with his meal.
After about eight mouthfulls, Pichu was getting a little more picky. Pichu spit out the chewed wad of clothing it had collected in its mouth. Pichu thought it could do without the clothing, though peeling each, one by one would take forever. Pichu picked up a little boy about the age of 9, and ripped the shirt off, then the pants and shoes. Pichu observed the tiny figure kicking in its paw and sighed "Pichu...".
Pichu compared the figure to itself. He could make out the tiny hands in detail, the figure was a pale flesh tone, the boy had long silky hair and had bright blue eyes. After a moment of silence, Pichu began laughing.
Just perfect in every detail. Pichu brought the figure to its awaiting maw, and virtually sucked him in like you do with spaghetti. It struggled and pounded at the Pichu's jaws, as Pichu severed the figure in half with his front teeth, then swallowed.
Actually, undressed was much better. Pichu continued in a straight path, deliberately plowing into the structures against his chest and belly, while occasionally selecting delicate morsels from the surrounding grounds.
Pichu decided after sampling, that woman tasted a little better than men, though Pichu couldn't say why, even its language. Pichu examined a particularly well formed screaming lady more carefully than the man. She curled up each time Pichu tried to touch her with its enormous hand. She was pinker than the guy. Pichu casually smashed anther building while examining her. Hundreds of people crushed between the collapsing brick walls and Pichu's feet. Pichu tossed the woman high in the air and caught her in its teeth, like a piece of popcorn...

Pichu had carved out a U shaped niche between the buildings Pichu had already leveled. It resembled a horse shoe shape, or maybe an old armchair, with two buildings extended on each side, as the arms.
Pichu spun around in a sitting position, with its back toward the building. Its feet were extended outwards, flat on the ground dangling over the ruins of two buildings and the parking lots. He looked at the two "armrest" buildings flanking it on either side. They both had entrances, in their center that poured little people towards it, into the street, from both sides. Pichu casually placed its hands plam down, into the fleeing crowd. This position wasn't all that comfortable, so Pichu decided to lean back a little, using the building behind for support. As Pichu leaned his body back, it could feel the soft crumbling of the moldings and cornices.
The corners of the broad building fell foward, as the center was pushed in by the Pichu's back. Uh-oh, it's going to go, Pichu leaned back a little futher, the building gave way as the girders bent back, the structure seemed to become soft and toppled, Pichu fell backwards, laughing like a little child "Pichu, Pi!!" Pichu shouted having so much fun.
Pichu was now lying flat on its back, the bumps of rubble, cars and people under him were hardly felt by the Pichu's thick yellow skin.
With his large enormous ears close to the ground, Pichu could better hear their screams, without looking, Pichu scooped up a handful of people and placed them on his chest and belly for observation.
They were bewildered and tried to stand and run for safty, away from the boys gaze. Some appeared hurt, and unable to scurry, Pichu flattened the lame ones with paw finger.

Pichu wasn't hungry anymore, but this was too much fun. Pichu scooped its paw to catch them and watched as they tried to avoid the Pokemon's enormous hand. Pichu dangled one, just holding the human by his leg, then Pichu pinched the other leg, and holding the figure like a wish bone, between its two paws, Pichu gently split the figure in half, looking intently as first the clothing was sprayed red, then as Pichu tore the figure, Pichu could make out the intestines untwining, he ripped further and could make out the messy deep red purple blob or the lungs and heart.

All this wrapped up in one neat little package. The little buggers tickled as they scurried across the long field of yellow that was Pichu's belly, its belly was large and slippery, causing some of the people to slip off.
Tired of lying down, Pichu leaned up again, brushing the cars, trees and people off its back, Pichu ran its paws through its silky large ears. How'd the little buggers get up there? Pichu sat up, the survivors on its chest and belly slid down and tumbled off.

The building next to Pichu resembled a saddle ready to be sat on, so Pichu stood up. "Pichu!" Pichu chuckled, Placeing its feet on either side of the building, Pichu slowly lowered himself down to a crouching jocky like position, Pichu straddled the building, hovering just above the structure, it slowly lowered himself on top of the "saddle".

The center of the building sagged down, as Pichu rested its weight upon it, the roof buckled, Pichu brought its feet together to get better balance but just the opposite happened, Pichu tarted to fall to the side as the building gave way. It was like sitting on a cake.
Actually it crumpled more like a building made of saltines.

Everywhere a building went down, smoke and dust exploded into the sky. Pichu was standing up again, looking at the figures clinging to its yellow form. Pichu examined the ruins between its feet, standing up, looking at the people holding on to it, from its sides to its feet, Pichu brushed them to the ground and mashed them mercilessly under its toes.
Kicking up hills of ruined people, Pichu's feet stained red, like the one who mashes wine grapes. The more Pichu stomped, for some reason, the more its anger and contempt of them grew. It was more than their being so small and helpless.

Pichu grabbed lightly a hand full of people so as not to damage them, and deposited them on the roof of the last remaining building of the complex. Pichu smiled in anticipation of its next accomplishment.
Pichu piled another handfull onto the roof, high above the ground, then another and then still more, till the whole roof was filled with the panicing crowd.
Pichu filled the roof till there was no more room for any others. Pichu smiled at the soft cushion it had made for itself. Slowly Pichu turned and lowered his rear onto the squirming mass of people beneath him. They kicked, punched and tried to hold off the decending weight, as its rear squashed them down, the roof of the building caved in. Two stories compressing upon themselves, puffing smoke and dust.
Pichu laughed. "Chu!" Pichu said, as it rode it all the way to the ground. "Pi!", Pichu shouted in glee. Should Pichu continue its mass killing
115212211211111.title: Mass destruction.

115212212.content:
Pichu decides to stroll through the countryside. He needs to work off Dr. Garcia! He passes forests with Ratatas' in in, as well as Sentrets'. In the distance, he hears the lamenting cries of Pidgeys'. Passing berry bushesin amongst the vegetation, Pichu marvels at the different colors.

Seeing the skyline of Goldenrod in the distance, Pichu weighs his options.
115212212.title: Somewhere else...

"What was that Robin?" Starfire asked, turning from the cashier to Robin.

"Well we'd better check it out." Robin said. Even if it wasn't Beast Boy he still had to be sure that whoever, or whatever, was walking through the city wasn't planning on destroying it. Although the stink was bad enough. So Robin and Starfire, still holding a paper bag full of groceries, ran outside to go after the giant. By this time, Beast Boy had already walked to a different part of town, but there were quite a few foot prints left behind so they could follow. Robin jumped on his motorcycle while Starfire flew after him, trying to keep the bag from spilling. Robing was having a tough time trying to avoid falling into one of the foot prints since they were all over the place.

But all distractions and what not aside, they managed to finally catch up with Beast Boy. Starfire landed next to Robin's motorcycle and said, "Robin why is Beast Boy so very much larger than normal?"

"I have no idea." Robin said, shocked at seeing their former shortest member so big.

"I am going to go and ask him." Starfire said, flying towards Beast Boy.

Beast Boy turned around as he heard Starfire fly towards him. He grinned and said, "Hey Star! Pretty impressive huh?"

"Yes, but how did it happen? Is this normal for your species?"

"Naw, Cyborg invented some crazy growth ray and it hit me by mistake. But I decided fighting crime would be easier now, not to mention it's a whole lot easier getting around!"

"Yes, I woud imagine so, but--Oh my word! What is that smell?"

For whatever reason, Starfire had not noticed the enormous stench rising from Beast Boy's feet until now. She felt a little dizzy as she covered her nose and mouth.

"Dude come on! My feet do not stink that bad!"

Robin was staying right where he was, at least fifty feet away from BB's massive smelly feet.

"Perhaps you should go wash them somewhere." Starfire suggested.

"Or maybe you should just shrink back down to normal!" Robin yelled from where he was standing.

"No way! I haven't got to do anything yet! Well, if all you're going to do is lecture me, I'll have fun on my own!"

And with that, Beast Boy left Robin and Starfire behind.

"What should we do now Robin?" Starfire asked.

Robin wasn't sure. Beast Boy looked mad and if they kept bothering him who knows what he might do? Then again, if he was mad he might cause damage to the city in his 'fun'. What to do...

That was all it took the giant as he was cuddling his girlfriend, crashing into buildings as they made out. His eyes were filled with anger as he looked away from Star towards Aqualad. "I need to take care of something." Beast Boy told her.

And began to spin in a tornado fashion. Soon a vachuum like tornado had opened, sucking in all the water life and Aqualad.

Starfire giggled as she watched Kidflash zoom after her. 'This is so funny!' Starfire giggled as she saw Kid flash start zooming around her at superspeed. Giggling, Starfiring moved her hand down in front of the circle he was making. Causing him to crash into a hard wall. Flattening him into paper with a sweatdrop.

"Ouch." Kidflash said as he was wrapped in the giantess hand. As Starfire brought him up to her face, Kidflash couldn't help but gulp at what thoughts may be running in her mind. Thats when she pushed him between her breasts. 'This is heaven!' Kidflash smirked as he totally forgot about what he was doing.

Superboy was having a much harder time though. As Beast Boy rose up from the water, Superboy tried everything to harm him. He zapped him with his laser beams on his cheek, leg, feet, chest, and even his eye. No affect at all. Beast Boy was also spending his own time trying to stop him by slowing swatting his hand. Didn't work.

Then with as much power as he could, Superboy hit Beast Boy in the chest. "There!" He said as he flew a few feet away. Nothing happend. "Wha!?" Superboy said as he saw how his superpower did nothing against the changeling. That's when Beast Boy caught him, holding him up to his head he smirked evilly.

"Looks like your nothin to me. And it looks like Kidflash couldn't do anything against Star either! Me and her are gonna rule the world and theirs nothing you can do about it!" Beast Boy laughed as he walked through the city, reaching back to his love.

"Is that for me?" Star giggled as she brought Kidflash away from her breast.

"Yap!" Beast Boy told her as he brought Superboy into her hands. "He's your gift for our one hour giant anniversary!" Beast Boy laughed.

"He's so cute!" Star said as she hugged her boyfriend.

Meanwhile the other Titans stood there shocked by the strength of them. "Is there anything that can stop them?" Robin asked the others.

"I dunno. Maybe Aqualad will know when he wakes up." Cyborg told him.

'Maybe...' Raven thought as she looked at the others, knowing what may stop them.
1152222112211221211.title: Nothing works! What can stop these Titans!?

11522221122112212112.content:
Raven weighed the possibilities in her mind. She could tell the others about her plan...but it might be harmful to the giants. She didn't think she needed to resort to such drastic measures yet. As she debated Starfire bent down and planted a kiss on each of her toys.

"You are now my favorite new toys!" She said, hugging them close.

Both Superboy and Kidflash suddenly felt strange. With that simple kiss Starfire had unknowingly transferred the virus to her toys. And they weren't going to be toys for long!

Raven and the other watched in horror as Superboy and Kidflash quickly grew to match Beast Boy and Starfire in size. Okay...now she needed to resort to drastic measures. She took in a deep breath and said, "Guys, I have a plan."

Cyborg and Robin stared at her and Robin said, "What is it Raven?"

"I didn't want to mention it before because it's a very dangerous plan. It involves a lot of magic and the effects will be unpredictable. Do you want to try it?"

"We have nothing else to lose." Cyborg said.

"Alright. Then follow me."

Raven led the boys, Cyborg carrying Aqualad, to her room. She quickly pulled down book after book flipping to several different pages and lighting candles before measuring powder and setting it inside a pentacle. Robin quickly began to get anxious, looking out the window and seeing a giant Superboy and Kidflash grinning at this new development. Beast Boy didn't look to happy though.

"Alright. I'm done." Raven said, standing up and dusting her hands off.

"So what is all this?" Robin asked.

"It's powerful and ancient sorcery of an advanced kind. It borrows on the Life Force of a person and grants them abilities that were otherwise latent."

"What do you mean, "Borrows Life Force"?" Cyborg asked

"I mean it takes away the energy that keeps you alive and turns it into a conduit for powers you didn't know you possessed. It works but can be taxing if used too long. I can cast this spell on all of you if you want, but that could prove dangerous. I'm not even sure what latent powers you might have. I don't think I'll be able to cast it on Cyborg though."

"So we have a decision to make." Cyborg said. "Should we cast the spell on Robin or Aqualad?"

1152222112211221211221.content:
The light slowly faded around Robin as the spell took full effect. They waited to see what would happen to him, if anything. Nothing did.

"Did it work?" Robin asked.

"It had to." Raven said, flipping to a reference page in one of her reference almanacs of magic. "I did the spell exactly as it was recorded, I specified a target, and I chanted the spell correctly. You now have unlocked a latent power within you. Whatever it is, you should know a little bit about it yourself."

Robin searched his mind for the answer. He delved deep into his memories and found a small patch of glowing black and white in his mind's eye. Yes, there it was! An ability he forgot he knew! He pulled a small tendril of that glowing pool from the dark recesses of his mind and brought it to the surface. He felt a little strength leave him, but nothing too bad. He activated that power, sending a mental note reverberating around the area. Everyone waited with bated breath to see what would happen next. Suddenly, they heard a splash and the sound of several feet slapping against pavement.

"Come on!" Robin shouted, leading the way to the outside of the tower.

What they saw there both shocked them, and left them in a wondering awe.

Penguins.

Dozens of penguins.

"What?" was all Robin could managed to say.

They watched as the penguins waddled around on the island, picking at the joints of their wings and some carrying tiny fluffly grey penguin babies. Once they heard Robin, a few detached from the main group and cuddled against him. One squaked and saluted him.

Everyone sweatdropped.

"Yes..." Lust said, deep in thought. "But who do you suppose sent them that Alchemy Dust?"
"Who knows?" Envy said shrugging. "It's safe to say it might be someone they know..."
"But who?" Lust said. "This could get out of hand if we're not careful."
"What's the worst that can happen?" Envy said.

Back inside HQ...

Havoc was about to go into Roy's office with a what appeared to be a file of some sort when Ed stopped him.

"I wouldn't go in there right now." Ed said.

Havoc just stared at Ed, covered completely in the white dust.

"I probably don't want to know, but what are you covered in?" Havoc asked.

"It's a long story." Ed said with a sigh. "Safe to say, I need a shower."

So Ed headed back to his hotel while Al told Havoc, Hawkeye, and the rest of the group at Eastern HQ what happened in Roy's office.

"So, what, Roy's some kind of giant in there?" Havoc asked.
"Yeah, that's about it." Al said.
"And how does he plan on fixing it?" Havoc said.
"He's calling for help right now." Al said.
"Good," Hawkeye said. "I think it's best we finish this business before it gets worse."

As though waiting for her to say that, a huge thump was heard from inside Roy's office as well as a loud curse.

Havoc threw open the door and revealed a strange sight. The dust hadn't been through with it's power and Roy had grown again. His head was still at the ceiling, but he was sitting down and his back was pressed against the far wall. His knees were also touching the ceiling and his feet were on either sides of the doorframe.

"And things just got worse." Havoc said with a sweatdrop.
1152222222212212.title: Stranger Things Have Happened...I Think

11522222222122121.content:
As Roy was getting himself trapped in his office, Ed had reached his hotel room and was taking off his red coat. He sniffed the powder to see if it smelt like anything. It didn't.

"I wonder if this stuff washes off?"

He tried to rub it off, but was unsuccesful. He pulled off his boots and socks and was about to remove his shirt and pants when he felt a strange burning sensation through his body. It got worse and worse and Ed gritted his teeth in pain. Finally it was over. Ed, panting slightly, checked himself over to see if he was hurt in any way. After he was sure he was okay, he began to grow. He yelled out in surprise as his head quickly hit the cieling. He crouched down and noticed that his coat, boots, and socks weren't growing even though they had been covered in powder.

"Guess they need to be touching my body when I grow." Ed murmered as his head once again struck the cieling. He was growing more and faster than Roy had the first time he had grown and Ed was soon cramped up inside his room. His bare feet were pressed against the wall with the door while his legs were bent so that they lay flat against the cieling. His head was shoved into the opposite wall with his arms crossed around his chest. It was like being trapped inside a small box. As much as he tried to move Ed could hardly wiggle.

"This isn't good!" He said, still trying to free himself.

Back to Eastern HQ, Al, Riza, Havoc, and the rest of the group were trying to decide what to do with Roy.

"Now refresh my memory. How did this happen?" Havoc asked.

"I brought in some mail for the Colonel." Riza said. "It was an unlabeled box."

"Then, when Lt. Hawkeye left, the box exploded and white dust covered Col. Mustang, Ed, and me." Al continued. "A note was inside the box telling us that we should enjoy the experience."

"And then I assume this happened to Roy." Havoc said, indicating Roy.

"Yes, exactly." Al said.

"Alright we know what happened." Fury said. "But how do we reverse it?"

"How should I know? I don't know alchemy." Havoc said.

"Do you have any idea Colonel?" Riza asked.

Roy thought about his knowledge in alchemy and realized he had no idea.

"I'm afraid not. I've never heard of something like this happening before."

"Maybe someone in Central will know." Al said.

"I suppose it's worth a shot." Havoc said.

Fury picked up the phone and dialed for Central.

"Hello? This is Eastern Headquarters. We've had an alchemic accident down here and need help. You'll send who? Alright....if he knows what he's doing." He hung up.

"Who are they sending?" Havoc asked.

"Major Armstrong." Fury said. "He claims to have the most knowledge in alchemic accidents."

"I'd better go check on my brother. To make sure he hasn't got in any trouble."

Al quickly left, not wanting to be around when Armstrong arrived. He quickly ran over to the hotel where they were staying and found the room they were staying in. He opened it and Ed's right foot pushed out and shoved him against the wall.

"Al? Was that you?" Ed said.

Al managed to maneuvre his head between Ed's big and second toe to say, "Yes! I'm okay!"

"I'm sorry Al! I didn't mean to hit you like that."

"It's alright. But can you move your foot?"

"No. I'm wedged in here too tightly to move!"

"This isn't good..." Al said.

This entire ordeal was going from bad to worse. Enjoy the experience indeed...
11522222222122121.title: Problems on Problems

choices: Edward starts a panic and/or grows again
115222222221221211.content:
Edward was about to say something until he began to feel the wierd sensation in his body again. "...Oh no."

"What's wrong brother?" Al asked, still trying to slip his body from his brother's foot.

"I think I'm about to grow again!"

Just after Ed had said that, his body began to expand in height yet again. He could feel the strain of the walls and saw that the wall was beginning to crumble a bit. His head was also pressing against the celing pretty hard as the ceiling of the bathroom began to slowly split apart. His knees were doing the same.

Al, who was still stuck aginst the wall, was being pushed by the growing foot and had less room to move. The walls seem to break apart as Ed's leg grew longer. Suddenly, the wall crumbled into almost crumbled behind the armor with the soul and he began to fall back. Thankfully, Al didn't feel pain because he wasn't in his human body, but his armor was a bit flattened. He was now lying against the tree that was next to the Elric's room.

"...I didn't see that coming. Hm?"

Suddenly, Alphonse noticed the ceiling slowly beginning to burst open. A very long strand of hair stuck out from one of the holes. Along with more blonde hair. All of the sudden, Edward's whole head, from neck up, came up from the ceiling!

"Just great..." Ed mumbled.

The wall around the bathroom door had crumbled almost completely, both his legs extending from it, giving him, along with his arms. He was in a sitting position, with his shoulders still under the part of the ceiling which hadn't fallen yet.

"Brother! are you okay?"

Ed looked down to see his brother lying against a tree, a bit dented in the chest plate, but not hurt at all. "Al! Are you okay?"

"Yes, I am." Al answered.

Edward sighed in relief, but remembered the predicament he was in. He was still stuck, and now very noticable.

"It can't get any worse than this...?"

choices: Hawkeye and the others try to find out who sent the package
1152222222212212112.content:
As Ed struggled in vain with his growing problems, Roy, Hawkeye, Havoc, Fury and now Breda and Falman, were waiting for Armstrong.

"How long do you think it's going to take for Armstrong to arrive?" Havoc asked, sitting backwards in a chair.

"He said he'd be here in a few hours." Fury said, leaning against the wall.

"Only Armstrong could make a two day trip last a few hours..." Roy muttered.

Before anything else could be said, Armstrong appeared, sparkles flying about.

"Greetings my friends! I have arrived from Central to assist you with my knowledge of Alchemic accidents, which have been passed down the Armstrong line for generations!"

Everyone sighed, prepared for a long, long night. Armstrong wasted no time. He questioned everyone about what had happened and then examined the powder left on the box, careful not to touch it.

"I've come to a conclusion!" He yelled out suddenly. "This is Alchemy Dust!"

"And what exactly is Alchemy Dust?" Falman asked.

"It's a powerful tincture in powder form. It has less power than a complete Philosopher's Stone but is still quite powerful. The dust is infused with a burst of alchemic energy and is contained for a set period of time. When the dust has contact with a living organism or inanimate object, depending on the desire of the one who infused it, the alchemy activates! Also, like the Philosopher's Stone, it can perform human transmutation, but to a much less extreme degree."

"That's very interesting Major." Hawkeye said. "But how do you propose we fix it?"

"Ah, that is a more difficult problem. Obviously the dust was intended to change size, but who did it? We'd have to track down the one who performed this alchemy before we could fix it."

Everyone sighed again. They had no idea where the package could've come from, so finding whoever sent it would be nearly impossible!

"You know, Fullmetal was covered in a lot more dust than the Col. I wonder what happened to him?"

"He probably grew larger than the Col. and is stuck some where." Armstrong said. "I will take it upon myself to find and rescue him!"

He flexed his arms as his shirt seemed to dissapear. Hawkeye, Havoc, and Breda shoved him out the door saying, "You do that."

"But I can!"

The two brothers looked back to see the person responsible for the line. They saw the familiar muscular guy, running towards the duo at full speed. "Armstrong?" they both asked in unison.

Stopping next to Alphonse, Armstrong grabbed onto Edwards ankle. "Don't worry Alphonse. Watch as I beautifully pull your dear brother out!" Armstrong assured, the sparkles returning to him.

Alphonse sweatdropped. "Uh...thanks?"

"Alright already with the gloating! Just pull me out!" Edward said, a bit annoyed.

"Alrighty then! Now suck it in!"

Edward took a deep breath and, with one strong pull, Armstrong was able to pull Edward out of the slowly collapsing building. Edward, wide-eyed, looked down at Armstrong. "Uh...wow...um, thanks?"

"It was the least I could do! Such strength has been passed down the Armstr-"

"Alright, I know." Edward interuppted. "But now, I'm fully in sight. What am I going to do?"

Armstrong began to explain about the dust and what it does. After his explanation, Edward began to examine his surroundings.

"So, what you're telling me is that someone wanted us to grow?"

The major nodded his head. "Yes, and we can't get you back to normal until we find out who."

Edward looked at the building he was pulled from. Compared to it, he was about 40 feet tall! He looked down at hiself. The powder was still on him.

"Armstrong, do you know when this stuff will come off?"

Armstrong rubbed his chin. "I believe that the dust may start to dissipitate when you reach the hieght the mystery sender wants you to be."

"And what about the Colonel?" Alphonse asked.

"The Colonel is in the same boat as you. He can't even get out of his own office! I must have to return for assistance. For now, we shall part. Farewell Edward Elric!"

And with that, the major left, sparkles flying about around him.

Edward and Alphonse just watched him leave.

"What are we going to do Ed?" Alphonse asked, looking high up at his brother.

"I guess we should..."

Before Ed could finish, he felt a surge through his body. "Not again!"

"Crap, this isn't good at all."

Anyway, Ranma has traveled to the Netherlands along with his male allies Genma, Ryoga, and Mousse to search for the sacred lake that will cure them of their nasty Jusenkyo curses!
"There it is, guys!" Genma pointed to a humongous bubbling lake, "Lake Uranus! Said that if you dive under the water for 30 seconds, you'll be cured of any and all diseases!"

Mousse reads off a book of the Lake's ancient history, "Hmm.. it is also said that it belonged to a great warlord, Lord Uranus the Twisted. He had his men bathe in this lake everyday to remain unbeatable. However, his kingdom got sick of his tyranny, they shot him full of arrows. With his last moments of life, he crawled toward the lake in hopes of getting his mortal wounds healed.. but he died 6 inches before he could even touch the water!"

The gang hung on to every word of the little story except for Ranma! He was too busy singing, "I am man, hear me roar, wash my manhood by the shore, and Im never gonna turn into a GIIIRRRRRLLLL!!"
But Ryoga just gives him the cold stare, "Be that as it may, I warn you Ranma! Akane is MINE!"

"Pst!! Take her!" Ranma says with a grin, "Id give up all the women in the world to stop becoming one!"

"Allright guys!" Genma shouted to the others, "Who's going first?"
"ME!" Ranma immediately volunteered, stripped off all his clothes, and jumped into the bubbling lake!

As he dived into the water, Ryoga for some reason had a bad feeling about the lake, "Um... Mousse? I feel that it just seems... too easy! Is there some sort of catch bathing in Lake Uranus?"

Mousse flipped through the book, "Hmm... it says that for every 100 people that bathe in the lake, there is a... bizarre side effect to the hundredth person."

"Aw c'mon, men!" Genma tried cheering up the others, "Dont wuss out on the golden opportunity to be rid of our damn curses once and for all! Besides... what are the odds that any of us will be that hundredth person?"

---SSSPPPPPPLLLLLLLLLLLAAAAAASSSSSHHHHH!!!!!----

Just then, the gang got by a HUGE wave of water coming from the sacred lake!!! But being soaked from head to toe wasnt horrible enough! Because their jaws dropped when they see the first thing coming out of that water...
11522222222222211.title: Yes, there IS a cure!

11522222222222222211.content:
Lately, Ichigo had reached an inescapable conclusion: he just was not strong enough. Even though he had promised to get better and be able to protect everyone, Aizen and the arrancar army had him worried. His few encounters with the arrancar's led him to be worried, not that he would EVER admit that to ANYONE.

While Captian Hitsugaya had been around, Ichigo learned a few more things from him. One specific thing caught his interest: captains manipulating the size of their Soul Reaper. It started to make Ichigo wonder if it would be possible to use spiritual pressure in other ways to get stronger. Maybe the best evidence that it could work was Kenpachi Zaraki who used it to make himself so physically strong that even someone on a captain level would have trouble wounding him.

So Ichigo began to experiment, and he discovered...
11522222222222222211.title: Ichigo

choices: Ichigo looks for a hollow to fight
115222222222222222112.content:
Ichigo was taking advantage of some down time to practice with his spiritual pressure. After his visit to Soul Society he had seen some impressive things done with it, and decided it was time he learned how to do something impressive. Today he was experimenting with channeling spiritual pressure to different parts of his body.

While training, a strange thought entered his mind, a Menos Grande. There was no real reason to think of one, but he did. So in his mind, every slice of his sword was a one-shot victory. Even still, he couldn't stop thinking about them, how big they were, how unstoppable they seemed when he first saw one.

At first, Ichigo didn't notice his perspective changing, he was probably 7 feet tall at this point. He continued his training, continuing to slash at hallows that were only there in his mind as he past 10 feet. He stopped moving and steadied his breathing after that round of his training, and as he watched the world around him he finally noticed his perspective on it changing. Ichigo was 15 feet tall and still growing!

He blinked, then decided it wasn't the weirdest thing he had ever seen so he might as well continue his training. He took a deep breath, then started in again with his constant movement and slashing through the air. This time, something was different, Ichigo wasn't thinking of looking up and a Menos Grande, he was thinking of looking down on hallows. He past 20 feet in hight, but just kept growing. Ichigo smirked, he actually found this entertaining and he wanted to see where things would end up.

He grew to over 25 feet, which gave way to 30 feet, even that was surpassed as he reached 40 feet, and finally his impressive growth leveled off at 50 feet. He stopped and looked at the world from his new perspective. Everything was smaller, trees looked like they would fall over if he just pushed them with one hand. Somehow, hollows didn't seem quite so threatening anymore.
115222222222222222112.title: Ichigo gets bigger
