Someone unexpected grabs the sandwich and eats it
1152222222222222222121.content:
He was about to go back to sleep, when he felt something cold and metallic in his hands. He looked over and saw, to his horror, the Millennium Necklace! It hadn't been a dream! It had been a premonition! An unusually strong one! He jumped out of bed and got dressed as quickly as he could. He had to make to Kaiba Corp. before Mokuba ever found the gun! He ran as fast as possible and soon entered Kaiba Corp. He ran for the elevator and jammed the button for the fifteenth floor, where the gun would be set on a table.

As the elevator door opened, Yugi saw Mokuba open the door to a lab. Realizing he was running out of time, Yugi ran after Mokuba and knocked the gun out of his hands as he picked it up.
"Yugi! What are you doing here?" Mokuba asked in surprise.

Yugi didn't answer. He just smashed the gun into a thousand pieces.
"What did you do that for?!?!? That was Seto's!" Mokuba exclaimed in surprise.
"Trust me," Yugi said. "That thing was nothing but trouble! Tell your brother not to make it again!"
"Okay...I guess..." Mokuba said in confusion, walking away.

Yugi sighed a breath of relief as he exited Kaiba Corp. and started heading back to his house. Suddenly, his cellphone rang.
"Hello?"
"Yugi? Don't you know what time it is? You were supposed to have come over here an hour ago!" Tea's voice said.
"Sorry, I slept in and then had to take care of something," Yugi apoligized. "I'll be right over!"

And so Yugi prevented a disaster of universal proportions. He checked back later that night with Mokuba to make sure that Seto wasn't going to make another gun and Mokuba said he convinced him not too.

And so Yugi continued on with his life believing the incident was never going to happen again. Too bad that wasn't meant to be....

While Mokuba HAD said his brother would never make another gun that makes people large. Instead Seto had begun experiments on a special chemical that would continue his experiment. After all, Seto would NEVER let Yugi tell him what to do. Even if his brother asked him to do it.

---In Setos office---
Seto was sitting at his desk. Watching his desks built in television. His top scientist was explaining the affects of Project:ENERGY GROWTH.

"The serum itself begins to change the body greatly. As they feed in order to give their body energy, their body quickly uses that to apply muscle and height to the body. The more food they eat, the faster their growth and the hungrier they get. After reaching 10 feet the target begins to absorb other energy sources to feed its growth. Electricity, solar energy, even wind energy can all add to its growth. It no longer needs to feed on food unless it wishes too. After reaching a eventual size the target will actually stop growing and will be sustained by the energy it gets from the sun." He explained.

"Good. Now explain to me the dangers." Seto told him.

"Yes sir. The only danger besides falling into someone who will allow the power to control them is too much growth. Should the person cause enough damage as a gaint that the govt.'s resort to nuclear power. Well lets just say that its not good. They would grow from the release of energy until they are around 1/2 to 100x the size of Earth. This is the only danger we know of. Well, other than their sex drive." The scientist told Seto.

"And what about the other affects?" Seto asked.

"Yes. In order to adapt to their new bodies, they gain regenerative powers, a adaptable body temp., ability to breath carbon dioxide and other gases, immunity to radiation's bad affects along with the ability to make their duel devices and their duel monster decks larger with them. How they do that is still unknown though. The bad affects result in them gaining a large ego, a need to mate with someone close to them, and a large temper should someone anger them and unleash their wrath." The scientist explained.

"Good then. I want the suppy shipped to Duel Academy to be tested on some monkeys. Make sure no one finds out about this, got it!?" Seto commanded him.

The scientist gulped and gasped as he stuttered. "Y-ye-yes si-si-sir mister Seto!" And with that Seto turned off the television. Soon he would begin a plan to make himself larger and more powerful than Yugi ever could be. Though he would wait until his experiment is proven successful.

And so the serum was shipped in 8 vials. All of which were being transported to Duel Academy by Helicopter. And by dawn the shipments would be placed in a secret lab that was ironically placed next to the Academy's cafeteria.

As the vials were being transported, one of them was tipping alongside the case as it moved. The lunch ladies were readying to move breakfast into the cafeteria as they crossed paths with the scientists and the case with the vials. Secretly one vial oozed out the blue substance on one single breakfast sandwich.

While all of this was happening, Jaden and the gang were standing at the lunch line. They were all wearing eager faces as they prepared to grab a sandwich of their choosing.
1152222222222222222121.title: Yugioh GX-The new experiment

choices: Syrus feels hungry again hours before lunch
11522222222222222221211.content:
The blue substance quickly soaked into the bread, turning it a slight shade of blue that was almost entirely unnoticable. It was placed on a plate surrounded by other types of sandwiches and kids were grabbing them left and right. Jaden grabbed a sandwich that was to the left of the infected food item, while Tyranno grabbed one from the other side. Syrus, however, reached out and took the infected sandwich, putting it on his tray next to his other selections. The three friends looked around for a table and saw one near the back of the cafeteria. Jaden sat down near the end of it and Syrus sat down next to him. Before he could start eating, however, Tyranno pushed him over onto the floor in order to sit next to Jaden. With a loud, "Oof!" Syrus hit the ground hard, his glasses nearly jounced from his face. He angrily stood up and said, "What did you do that for?"

Tyranno grinned at him and said, "Sorry, but shouldn't best friends close as brothers sit next to each other?"

Syrus growled at this, but wasn't fool enough to pick a fight with Tyranno. Not only was he a lot taller than Syrus, he was also a lot stronger and buffer. Picking a fight with him would be suicide. He just took his tray and moved it to sit across from the other two. He sighed and picked up his sandwich, taking a bite of it. He was so tired of constantly getting pushed around by everyone. It didn't help he had a poor self image of himself, but he was also short for his age and pathetic when it came to fighting in an actual fight. Ever since Tyranno had come into the picture, he had constantly gotten into verbal brawls with him but never took it far enough to actually fist fight with him. Sometimes, he wished he was bigger and stronger, able to defend himself and his friends not only in duels but also in reality.

It didn't take long to finish the breakfast sandwich and after it was gone, Syrus felt a strange uplifting of his spirits. He felt like he had more energy and was also hungrier. He happily ate the rest of his breakfast, eating and listening rather than joining in with his friend's conversations. After awhile, they noticed how much and how fast he was eating and Jaden said, "Ah, Syrus? Are you feeling okay?"

Syrus nodded and said, "Sure, why do you ask?"

"Well, you never usually eat so much. I was just wondering if you were sick or something."

Syrus shook his head and said, "I just feel really hungry this morning, that's all."

Jaden shrugged and didn't press the subject. Everyone had days when they felt like they were starving. They finished breakfast and dropped their trays and dishes off before heading for their first class.
11522222222222222221211.title: Consumption of the Infected Sandwich

choices: After class Jaden goes to see if Syrus is all right at the Nurses.
Lunch time arrives and their's no food in the cafeteria! Who ate it all?
115222222222222222212111.content:
Hours passed as the school day went on. In every class Jaden slept while the others listened intently and took notes. Tyranno had kicked Syrus out of his usual seat next to Jaden and had forced him into the row behind Jaden. He had wanted to sit on the other side of Jaden; but that was impossible since the new Jaden clone Johan had arrived. Since he arrived Jaden had been spending more time with him or Tyranno since he forces himself onto Jaden.

Syrus sat behind Jaden, sorrow in his eyes. Professor Crowler was teaching and was constantly bringing down members of Slyther Red. He did it to everyone but Jaden since he had aknowledged Jaden as a real duelist (Though he would never say that aloud.). Jaden just sat there looking down at Jaden while Crowler went on and on. 'It's not fair.' Syrus said angrily. 'Everyone keeps on taking Jaden away from me! When will I get some alone time to talk with Jaden? I'd even duel him if it would get some time with him.'

However, Syrus mind began to focus on something else as the class went on. He heard a rumbling sound. At first he didn't know where it was coming from. But then he heard the rumbling sound get louder and louder. Syrus rubbed his stomach in pain as felt it rumble again. 'Why am I so hungry all of a sudden? Why do I feel like eating a huge feast!? I just ate before school started!' Syrus thought as the rumbling continued to worsen.

"And so class the new series of duel monster cards called-" Professor Crowler spoke until he heard a huge rumbling sound erupt throughout the room. His eyes twitched angrily as everyone looked around to see who it was. "Who is making that inconsiderate racket!? If you don't tell me right now it's detention for the next eight weeks and ten extra assignments each day!"

A few seconds passed until Syrus raised his hand and gulped. "It's my stomach sir. I'm really hungry!" Syrus told him as another rumble emerge from his stomach, this one even louder than the last. Jaden and the gang looked up at Syrus, concern filling their faces.

"Well get on out of here and see the school's nurse! I don't want that racket disturbing my classes!" Crowler instructed him.

"Yes sir!" Syrus said as he got out of his seat.

Jaden looked up at Syrus concerned. "Are you going to be all right Syrus?"

"Yeah Jaden! Don't worry about me!" Syrus said cheerfully as he left. Jaden looked on as he left till he was gone, and then he sat there thinking for the rest of the class about what was wrong with Syrus. Syrus soon had a depressed look on his face. 'Great stupid! The one time I could spend time with Jaden and I told him not to worry!' Syrus told himself bitterly.

As he headed for the nurse's office, his stomach rumbled so loud that half the school could hear it. Syrus rubbed his stomach in pain and let out a soft moan. "Darn it! Darn it! Forget the Nurses! I need to eat and fast!" Syrus told himself aloud as he ran towards the Cafeteria.

Within minutes Syrus had arrived at the Academy's cafeteria. He saw no one in there, no doubt on their break before lunch. He entered the kitchen and was awestruck by what he saw. crates full of freshly cooked sandwiches, gallons of milk and other drinks, sweets as far as the eye can see, and loads of fattening foods that could turn a skinny kid into the blob in about 3 seconds. Syrus licked his lips hungrily as he looked on at the food. "Time to feast!" Syrus smiled as he jumped in.
115222222222222222212111.title: I'm so Hungry!

choices: He runs into Jaden as he heads to the Nurses
1152222222222222222121112.content:
Syrus wasted no time. He grabbed a few gallons of milk and made his way over to the mountain of sandwiches. Drool was practically running out of his mouth as he grabbed two of them at the same time. It took literally a minute to cram both sandwiches into his mouth and swallow them down with a quarter gallon of milk. Moving as fast as his hands would allow he jammed sandwich after sandwich down his throat until they were all gone. Syrus sighed and finished off his tenth gallon of milk. Even though he had eaten enough for the entire school, his stomach was only slightly distended. It was as if his body had distributed the food all over his body evenly. Thinking that would be enough, Syrus started heading for the exit of the cafeteria. He hadn't even made if halfway before his stomach roared at him to go back and keep eating. Groaning, grabbing his growling belly, Syrus ran back to the food and started eating the fruit next.

A half hour later, the lunch ladies were making their way back into the cafeteria to set out the lunch they had just made, but were astonished to see not a speck of food was in sight! It was like a wild animal had stormed in and devoured all the food, leaving nothing but wrappers, empty bottles, and spotless cans. The lunch ladies slowly made there way through the devestation, wondering who could've done all this.

"What are we going to do?" One of the youngest ladies asked.

"This is obviously some student prank!" The senior lunch lady said, kicking aside an empty can of beans. "We're going to tell the headmaster and have him find the culprits!"

So the senior lunch lady called the headmaster and demanded that he find out what was going on or they were walking! Fearing a mass revolt over the loss of the lunch ladies, and therefore the loss of all cooked food, the headmaster instantly sent Professor Crowler to find the mischief makers at once. He was, of course, outraged that his precious time was being wasted finding some snot nose brats who stole an entire schools worth of food. He knew it had to be delinquents from Slifer Red. Who else would bother to orchestrate such an elaborate trick. He made a beeline for the Red dorms, eager to find out who did this and have them severely punished.

As Crowler went on the prowl, Syrus had hid in his room. His stomach was finally quiet but he was worried it might start growling again. He had never ate so much in his life. He didn't even think it was possible for a human being of his size and weight to eat like that. What really freaked him out though, was that he hadn't gained any weight whatsoever. It wasn't natural and Syrus was starting to get worried that something was wrong with him. He jumped off his bed, a decision having been reached. He would go to the Nurses to see what was wrong with him.
1152222222222222222121112.title: Eating Until Nothing's Left

choices: Syrus goes into the Nurses office to find out whats wrong
Syrus stomach is getting louder. He needs to eat NOW!!! Go to Slifer Red
11522222222222222221211121.content:
Syrus decided that the only one that could help him was the Nurse. And he had to hurry. Dr. Crowler was on a witch hunt for anyone nearby the Cafteria. "If he heard from another student that I was near their then that would be all that Crowler need's to hang me on the school's flagpole!" Syrus said as he ran towards the Nurse's office. He wasted no time trying to get there. Every second could be a second too soon.

But Syrus didn't realize what was happening inside his body. The serum was in a sense sentient, and wanted to bring forth what the serum sensed was what Syrus wanted. As it had merged with every molecule of Syrus being, the sentient serum soon realized what Syrus wanted. It knew he wanted to be stronger and faster than anyone else. And so it began a complicated system of transforming his body into a giant of muscle. Yet it didn't have the nutrients needed to activate this evolutionary change. So the serum made Syrus body crave food beyond anything. After he finished eating, the Serum knew it had achieved a vast amount of nutrients. More than enough to make it's host easily twice his height. Yet it did not want people to get suspicious of what it was doing. And so it began by slowly making Syrus body bigger. The next part of its step in achieving its host wishes was to get this 'Jaden Yuki' and make him the hosts mate.

Jaden sat outside the nurses office. As soon as class had ended Jaden had left the class. He told the others he would be back after checking up on Syrus. He sat there outside. He had even skipped lunch, though he heard that all the food was gone. After he had arrived at the Nurses, the main nurse told him that Syrus hadn't come by all day. "I hope Syrus comes by soon. I'm afraid he might be hurt real badly." Jaden said as he sat there.

Syrus quickly ran towards the Nurses office. He took all the routes and hallways that most people didn't travel, knowing Crowler wound't be bright enough to know he was taking the long way instead of the short way. As he ran, his muscles slowly started to grow larger. His legs started to thicken as his pants grew tighter. His arms started to become shorten and his arms thickened. His shirt slowly ride up to reveal a hardening six pack. His shoes grew tighter as he ran. 'What is wrong with my clothes?' Syrus thought desparately as he ran into the main hallway that lead to the Nurses. That's when he saw who was sitting outside the office. "Jaden!" Syrus exclaimed happily and then realized what that meant.

"Hey Sy!" Jaden said as Syrus stopped running in front of Jaden. "Sy why weren't you here by now? I thought you would've have them do every treatment possibly to cure whatever was wrong!"

"Very funny!" Syrus said with a laugh. Being around Jaden was so easy, so natural. "I am going to tell you, but you've got to keep a secret."

"Yeah Sy I promise? What is it?"

"I was the one who ate all the food in the cafeteria." Syrus whispered to Jaden.

Jaden's eyes turned white with shock "Really!? You ate all that food! Then why aren't you a blob?"

"I don't know! All I know is that hunger I felt made me so hungry I just ate and ate. I didn't gain a single ounce."

Jaden looked up and down Syrus body. Syrus was right that he didn't gain any fat from eating. But there was something else about him. He was taller, easily up to Jaden's neck in height. And he saw those muscles that were appearing all across Syrus body. "Syrus, your taller and you like you've been at the gym!" Jaden told him.

"Wha?" Syrus said in surprise. He looked down at his body and how his clothes were tighter against his new muscles. His clothes were also shorter against his body. Revealing his abs and leg muscles. "I am bigger! No wonder I felt my clothes growing tighter when I was running!" Suddenly Syrus let out another rumble.

"Not again! I'm still hungry!" Syrus said as he rubbed his stomach.

"Sy. You might need to go see the doctor. Though if you want we can go to Slifer Red. I have some food there for you." Jaden said cheerfully.

Syrus began to ponder this. Should he see the Nurses or should he got eat some more.
11522222222222222221211121.title: Syrus is off to the nurses. Wait? Jaden's there!

choices: "I don't want to leave just yet..."
115222222222222222212111212.content:
As Syrus' stomach started growling louder, he remembered how bad it had felt when he didn't eat anything. If he went to the nurses now, chances were he wouldn't be able to get anything to eat for a long time. He looked at Jaden and realized this was a perfect chance to be alone with him. If he chose to go to the nurses, he'd lose that opportunity until who knew when.

"I'd rather go back to Slifer Red and get something to eat." Syrus said.

"Alright, then let's go!" Jaden said, grabbing Syrus' hand and leading back to their dorm.

Syrus' heart leapt at the contact. He smiled and hurried along behind Jaden. It didn't take them long to reach the Slifer Red dorm but it was long enough. Syrus' stomach growled even louder as Jaden closed the door. He then went to his desk and pulled open the biggest drawer on the bottom. It was a surprisingly shallow drawer, only about the size of the other drawers. That is, it was until Jaden pulled off the false bottom. Inside the drawer was a large multitude of different chips,candies, and sodas all cleverly concealed.

"I thought I'd need this someday since we're not allowed to have food in the dorm rooms."

"How come I've never seen this before?"

Jaden shrugged. "Didn't look hard enough?"

Syrus shrugged as well and said, "Well, I guess it doesn't really matter. How much can I have?"

Jaden laughed and said, "Have as much as you want!"

Syrus greatfully grabbed two sodas, a bag of chips, and three candy bars and started eating and drinking them all. Jaden just looked on in surprise as he saw Syrus stuff himself with as much food as he could get his hands on. He watched as his hidden supply of food dwindled down, down, down...nothing. Syrus burped and laid back on his bed, a content smile on his face.

"That was great!" He said. "Thanks Jaden!"

Jaden looked at Syrus laying on the bed and said, "You know, those clothes are really too small for you now. Until you get some new ones I'll lend you some of mine okay?"

Syrus jumped up and said, "Really? Are you sure?"

"Sure I'm sure!" He said, opening his closet. "You can't go walking around the school like that can you?"

Syrus shook his head and grabbed the clothes Jaden passed out to him. He then began to strip off his old clothes, giving Jaden a better look at his new bigger body. He was really shocked to see such a drastic change in his friend, especially since he'd been normal that same morning. But it also felt right. Syrus had taken a lot of crap from a lot of people over the years and if anyone deserved something like this it was Syrus. Yet he was also worried about his friend. Changes like this weren't normal. He should really see a doctor. He snapped out of these thoughts as Syrus said, "Thanks Jaden."

Jaden was bemused to see that his clothes were still a little tight on Syrus. Even though Syrus was still shorter than Jaden, he was quite a bit thicker. Syrus felt a strange, heady feeling being in Jaden's clothes. It took him a little while to realize that he could smell Jaden's scent on his clothes. He had washed them, but under the smell of detergent was the unmistakable smell of his friend. This would be what it felt like if they were close, holding each other, perhaps even kissing...

Syrus' face heated up like a steamed vegetable. He coughed to break the silence and said, "Thanks." again.

"No problem buddy!" Jaden said cheerfully. He looked at the clock and said, "We'd better get going if we want to make the next class on time."

Syrus nodded and bit his lip. He didn't want to go. Not yet. Who knew when he'd get to spend more time with Jaden?

"Syrus?" Jaden said, concern in his voice. "Are you alright?"
115222222222222222212111212.title: Alone at Last!

choices: As they sleep, Syrus starts to grow bigger until he's a foot taller than Jaden
At Kaibocorp, Seto finds out two of the Serum bottles is missing there
1152222222222222222121112122.content:
"Actually Jaden I would like to stay here." Syrus told him. "I don't want to go out there with Crowler on his Witch Hunt. That and I might have another stomach ache like before."

Jaden listened intently to Syrus speak. As he finished Jaden sat down next to Syrus, giving his friend a big friendly hug. Syrus enjoyed the touch and was saddened by the release. "It's alright buddy! Stay here for now. That way you won't have to worry about him going to the Obelisk Blue dorm!" Jaden told him.

"Thanks Jaden." Syrus said happily, smelling a strange scent that was even more overpowering of Jaden's scent from the clothes. It smelled like a sweet, sugary scent with a tough and calmness about it. It was Jaden's regular scent.

"Well I have to get back to class. I got a couple more hours of the chef professor from Ra Yellow. Need to catch up on my sleep!" Jaden chuckled as he got up. The thought of Jaden leaving him was a bit too much for Syrus right now. Syrus grabbed his hand and felt the warm touch of his friend.

"Jaden. Will you stay here with me? I feel a bit tired. And I don't want you to leave just so you could get caught by Dr. Crowler." Syrus explained to him. He had big puppy dog eyes as he stared at Jaden. With his eyes magnified by his new growth spurt.

"All right Sy. I do feel *yawn* a bit tired." Jaden told him as he yawned. He layed himself upon his bed, ready to go to sleep. "Well? Are you joining me?"

Syrus jumped as Jaden asked him that question. "But are you sure? There isn't much room on your bed!" Syrus told him.

Jaden laughed "Well yeah! But were friends. So it's okay if you lay here." Jaden said as he got underneath the blankets. Syrus swallowed hard and began to crawl underneath to the blankets. As he layed there, he felt Jaden's hands on his hips. Syrus let out a silent gulp.

"Jaden. Your hands are wrapped around me." But Syrus soon learned it was futlile, Jaden was completly asleep. That was all it took for him to go to bed. Just let him stay there for any time longer than 3 seconds and he was out like a lightbulb. Syrus smiled as he brought his lips to Jadens. They kissed quickly, with Syrus blushing and Jaden happily snoozing. Completly oblivious to what was going on.

"Night Jaden." Syrus said as he buried himself into Jaden's chest. Not realizing that a blue glow encompassed the two of them, forever marking them as each other's. And Syrus fell into a deep slumber.

As these strange events were occuring at the school, on the mainland, in Kaiba Corp, Seto was busy doing work as usual. He was impatient for the test results to come back from the Duelist Academy research branch. The growth serum wasn't exactly a cheap project and he didn't want anything to go wrong. But that was just too bad for him wasn't it?

As he continued working, his phone rang.

"What is it?"

"Mr. Kaiba, sir, I have some bad news."

"It had better not be about the growth serum tests." Seto said dangerously.

"Actually sir...that's exactly what this is about."

Seto growled and slammed his fist on his desk. Every freakin time! As soon as money went into a project the idiots that worked for him had to find a way to screw it up! He composed himself as best he could and said, "Just spit it out!"

"Y-yes sir! We recieved a call from the research branch at Duelist Academy saying they had succesfully recieved the vials of the serum. Unfortunately, between the time of the vials arriving and the time of the scientists down there picking them up, two of the vials went missing!"

"Two?!?" Seto yelled into the phone.

"Yes, I'm afraid two of the vials are gone!"

"What about the rest of them?"

"They're secure in the lab at this time. We decided it would be best if we talked to you first before deciding to commence the tests."

Seto thought about it for awhile. He was eager to test out the growth serum and get some results, but this was a top secret project. If something went wrong, he wanted no connection with it. It would be best to try and find the two missing vials before someone got a hold of them.

"Postpone the tests for now." He said at last. "Concentrate all your time on locating the missing vials."

"Yes sir! Right away sir!"

Seto slammed the phone back onto its cradle in disgust. He had to prepare for the worst. If those vials were consumed and a couple of uncontrollable giants suddenly appeared, it would ruin his company and his reputation. And this whole endeavor had already cost a fortune from the prototypes of his size chaning ray all the way to the growth serum. He didn't want lawsuits thrown on top of this whole mess. He turned back to his computer and closed the program he was in. He started typing letters to various branches of his business. He needed to be ready if anything went wrong...

As Jaden thought these thoughts, Tyranno stood up, his head nearly hitting the top of the cave. Jaden looked up at his huge body, not a single stitch of clothing in sight. Syrus suddenly leapt into Jaden's mind and he coughed slightly. This was an odd new development. Had Syrus ever bombarded him with a strange smell? No, the only thing Jaden had ever smelled was Syrus' normal, sweet smell. The more Jaden thought of Syrus, the more his heart raced, the more he felt a desire to be near to him. Jaden shook his head slightly, but it still felt fuzzy with longing. But now was not the time! This was his chance to get some questions answered!

"Tyranno how did this happen to you?" Jaden asked.

Tyranno sighed and said, "It happened earlier today. I was looking for some food to eat since someone had ate all the food in the cafeteria and I nearly tripped over a small glass vial. Since no one was around I grabbed it and smelled it. Since it smelled like strawberries I assumed it was from the cafeteria, so I swiped it and drank it. But that idiot Johan and that wimp Syrus were always getting in my way! So something inside me let me grow bigger and stronger to be able to make you mine forever!"

It was another fine day of sailing on the ocean. The weather was clear, the current was fast, and the wind was favorable. The Merry Go was currently docked at an island while the crew was exploring. Nami, Usopp, Nico, and Chopper had stayed behind to collect supplies leaving Zoro, Luffy, and Sanji to follow a map Nami had found. It wasn't a very detailed map. All it showed was two islands and a path that connected them. They had found the island, but so far it was nothing special. It appeared to be totally deserted. Each crew member was searching a different part of the island and so far, no luck. Frustrations were running high, especially for Luffy who was starting to get really hungry. Just when he was about to give up and head back to the Merry Go, he pushed aside a clump of bushes and saw something strange. Immense ruins lay in the middle of a clearing. Luffy was amazed by the sheer size of the structure that was shielded from view from the outside world by the enormous trees that grew around it. Luffy quickly ran into the entrance, eager to see what he could find. Dissapointingly the ruins seemed to consist of only one room. An entirely empty room. Luffy walked around the length of it but couldn't find anything. He turned back to leave when he spotted a table. He looked around wondering where it had come from. On it were three items: A bottle full of green liquid, a box full of cookies, and a book.

Luffy tried to pick up the book but it seemed to be glued to the table. He flipped through it and saw a few pictures of the items on the table with what appeared to be instructions of some sort next to them. He closed the book again. It was too boring to bother with. He grabbed the bottle and the box and started heading back to the Merry Go.
115222222222222222222211.title: Mysterious Ruins

1152222222222222222222112.content:
Back on the Merry Go, Sanji and Zoro had just arrived from finishing searching the island.

"Did you find anything?" Zoro asked Sanji.

"Nothing." The cook sighed, lighting up a cigarette. "Looks like that map was a total bust."

"I wonder what's taking Luffy so long?" wondered Zoro.

"HEY GUYS!!! LOOK WHAT I FOUND!!!"

Zoro and Sanji looked out into the forest from the deck and saw Luffy running towards them holding up a bottle and a box. He jumped onto the ship and proudly presented his findings.

"What is it?" Zoro asked, looking at the bottle.

"Dunno." Luffy replied. "I found them in a ruin."

"And this is all that was there?" Sanji said in disbelief. "What a waste of time!"

"But you have to wonder why someone would bother to build a temple to hide something like this." Zoro said.

"Who cares?" Sanji said, leaving to go below deck. "Let's just head back so I can see my sweet Nami again!"

Zoro sighed and said, "Maybe he's right."

"Aw come on! We should at least try it!" Luffy said.

"Are you crazy? Who knows what this stuff is! It could be poisoned!"

"Well, we won't know until we try!"

Zoro sighed and said, "Fine, but if I get poisoned, I'm going to kill you!"
1152222222222222222222112.title: Which One, Which One...

11522222222222222222221121.content: How fast does it occur?
11522222222222222222221121.title: Speed of Shrinking

11522222222222222222221122.content: How fast does it occur?
11522222222222222222221122.title: Speed of Growth

choices: Luffy tries drinking some of the liquid to see what happens
Luffy tries to get on the island without falling in the water or capsizing the b
115222222222222222222211221.content:
Luffy looked at Zoro and said, "Aren't you going to try anything?"

"No thanks! I'm not going to touch them until I know what they are."

Luffy shrugged and opened the box. He reached in and grabbed a handful of the cookies inside. Before he could stuff them in his mouth, Zoro grabbed his arm and said, "One! If they're poison one shouldn't be fatal."

Luffy emptied his hand of cookies except for one and Zora let him go. He popped the small cookie in his mouth and chewed it up. It didn't taste like much, just a regular sugar cookie. He swallowed it and said, "Seems fine to me!"

Zoro still looked skeptical and said, "Let's just wait and see."

So they waited. A few minutes later, Luffy's stomach growled and he said, "Can I have another one yet?"

Before Zoro could answer, something very strange happened. Luffy started to grow! Zoro backed away as Luffy's body expanded, breaking the chair he was sitting in. His legs lengthened on either side of Zoro until his feet were hanging over the bow of the ship. His head traveled higher and higher into the sky until it was level with the crow's nest. Finally, his butt ended up resting on the stern of the ship with his hands gripping the sides of the ship for balance. The whole thing was rocking back and forth due to the sudden change in weight.

Zoro gaped up at his huge captain, completely at a loss for words. Before either one could say anything there was a frenetic pounding from below deck. Zoro looked over at the door leading below deck and saw Luffy was sitting in a way that blocked it. Sanji was probably wondering what the heck was going on. Suddenly, Luffy laughed and said, "Didn't see that coming!"

Zoro sweatdropped at the casualness of this statement and yelled, "I told you, you shouldn't have eaten them!"

Luffy looked down at Zoro and said, "Now can I have another one?"

"NO!!! YOU CAN'T HAVE ANOTHER ONE!!!!!"

"Hey!" Sanji's voice came from behind the door. "What's going on out there?"

No one answered him and Luffy couldn't shift his position without falling off the boat.
115222222222222222222211221.title: King of the Giants

1152222222222222222222112211.content: Luffy stomach growled agian and he said "if i can't have a cookie can i have some of the liquid"? Zoro agreed and luffy carefully picked up the bottle between his huge fingers and drank it all.They waited to see what would happen but nothing did then luffy stared to grow agina but this time much bigger before zoro new it luffy had rerached....
1152222222222222222222112211.title: Big Luffy

choices: Thankfully Nami grabs them and explains the Big big fruit
Zoro grabs them and accidentally eats one
1152222222222222222222112212.content:
"And besides that Luffy. You need to get off the boat before you sink it!" Zoro shouted at him angrily.

Luffy looked around and saw nothing but water. "But if I do then I'll sink!" Luffy said with a whimper.

"That's why you use your hands to paddle us to a island!" Zoro shouted angrily up at him.

"That's a great idea! Thanks Zoro!" Luffy said happily as he began to use his hands to paddle back to the island.

"So what exactly happend to Luffy?" Sanji asked as he was mixing batter in a bowl.

"IS THAT ALL YOU CAN SAY!? LIKE OMG LUFFY'S A GIANT OR SOMETHING ALONG THOSE LINES!?" Asked a screaming Zoro as he saw the non-shocked reply of Sanji.

"Well you can't expect me to be shocked by every thing we see. Like that time we were on the island with the two giants and the dinosaurs(in the episodes that didn't appear on tv and happen before Alabasta for those of you wondering) and the time that Usopp and Chopper took on a dog that was a cannon. You can't expect me to be shocked by every little thing." Sanji said as he looked up at the giant Luffy as he paddle back to the island. "And since you shouted at me I am going back inside and not fixing you dinner." He said angrily as he went back into the ship's kitchen and slammed the door.

"Geez. PMS much?" Sanji said as he went back to cooking.

"I HEARD THAT!" Shouted a pissed off Zoro towards Sanji.

As Zoro was shouting at Sanji, Luffy had paddled back to the islands shores. Carefully he proceeded to get up off the boat and placed his feet in the cold water which was small enough to be insignificant and non-threatening. Luffy lifted himself off the boat. Causing it to tumble and shake for a few minutes.

"Whoa!" Shouted Zoro as he was backed on his feet. As he did, he noticed Luffy's hands were moving down to the cookies. "Oh no you don't!" He shouted angrily as he went for the cookies.
1152222222222222222222112212.title: Finding a safe place to land.

choices: Someone knocks on the door to the house, not bothered by the giant Luffy
11522222222222222222221122121.content:
As Zoro made a grab for the box of cookies, to prevent Luffy from eating any more, Nami's head poked up from the side of the ship. She saw what was going on and quickly hoisted herself onto the ship and swiped the box from both of them. She tossed it into a bag with the liquid and quickly tied the bag shut. When that was done she sighed and looked up at Luffy.

"So I take it he had one of the cookies then?" She asked casually.

"Why is everyone being so nonchalant about this?" Zoro said incredulously. "Isn't anyone else shocked or suprised or anything about this?"

Nami turned to Zoro and said, "Relax. This is just the effects of the Big Big Fruit."

"Another Devil Fruit huh?" Zoro said.

"Right. I'll explain everything when we meet up with the others. This island is pretty much deserted and we found an empty house in the woods we can use. Come on!"

She jumped off the side of the ship and started running into the woods. Zoro knocked on the door leading belowdeck and said, "Sanji! Get up here! Nami has something to tell us!"

Sanji came running up and kicked open the door, knocking Zoro flat. "My beautiful Nami is here?!? Where?!?"

Zoro stood back up and said, "She ran into the woods to meet up with the other's you idiot!!"

"Then what are we waiting for?" Sanji yelled out. "Onward to Nami!"

He jumped off the boat and ran blindly into the woods. Luffy stood up and watched him before looking down at Zoro and saying, "He's going the wrong way you know."

Zoro sighed and said, "Well we'd better go get him."

Luffy grabbed Zoro and said, "It'll be faster if I carry you!"

With that, Luffy walked into the forest, grabbed Sanji, and managed to locate Nami and the house within seconds.

"It's great being this big!" Luffy said enthusiastically.

"For you maybe..." Zoro said under his breath.

"Hey Luffy! You think you can let us down now!?!?" Sanji yelled up at the giant captain.

Luffy set them down and they walked into the house. Luffy tried to see into the window but was unable. Finally, he grabbed the roof in his hands and pulled it off, looking inside the house. Nami had already set out the box and the bottle and was about to start explaining. Ussop, Chopper, and Robin all looked up at the giant Luffy and each one opened their mouth to ask a question but Nami said, "Save it! I'm going to explain everything I know first, then we can discuss."

Their mouths snapped shut and Nami began explaining the powers of the Big Big Fruit.

"Alright, I learned about this fruit a long time ago when I was just getting started working for Arlong. The Fish Men pirates were looking for it all over the place but could never find it. Legend has it, that only somehow who isn't looking for it, can find it. So since every single one of the pirates knew about it, they could never find it. They managed to get quite a bit of information on it, and I of course stole it!"

She laid out a piece of paper with a picture on it showing a strange fruit shaped like a heart. There seemed to be two distinct fruit conjoined at the base, but on closer inspection, it proved to be a single piece of fruit. Tiny black lettering in a foreign language was crammed onto every availabe inch of paper.

"It took forever for me to translate it." Nami said, continuing her story. "But I finally found someone who spoke this language and got is deciphered. The Big Big Fruit is unique to other Devil Fruits in that it has two effects. One is to make a person grow larger at will, while the other is to make the person grow smaller at will. Unfortunately, it was so difficult to locate that only one man ever found it. Despite having found it, he never ate it himself but instead dehydrated it until it was compressed into two forms. They are what you see before you now."

She opened the box and revealed the cookies. "These cookies are from the growing side of the fruit, while this liquid is from the shrinking side of the fruit."

"So Luffy's not stuck like this then?" Zoro asked.

"Right. To shrink him back to normal, all we have to do is give him some of the liquid. Nami said.

"Aw, but I don't want to go back to normal!" Luffy said sadly.

"Come on Luffy! How are we supposed to sail through the Grand Line when you're too big to fit in the boat?" Zoro asked.

"And there's no way I'm going to cook for you when you're that huge! Sanji said. "You'd clean out our whole store of food!"

"They're right Luffy." Robin said. "It's just not practical."

Luffy crossed his arms and said, "It doesn't matter. I'm staying like this to help me become King of the Pirates!"

His crew sighed and tried to decide what to do next.
11522222222222222222221122121.title: Explanation of the Big Big Fruit

choices: Chopper gets beat by Ryohei, who goes after the Straw Hats
Chopper manages to subdue Ryohei and takes him captive
115222222222222222222211221211.content:
Before anyone could suggest anything, there came a knock at the door. Everyone looked at the door while Luffy said, "It's okay. It's just some kid."

Zoro opened the door as the kid yelled out, "Watch your mouth guy! I may look like a kid, but I'm older than any of you!"

"Who are you?" Zoro asked.

"My name is Ryohei Kisimura! I've been charged with keeping watch over the Big Big Fruit! Honestly, I fall asleep for a few years and people just walk into my house and steal my stuff!"

No one quite knew what to make of this boy. He had short spiky red hair and was wearing a long shirt that reached his knees. He was holding a teddy bear in one hand and a huge key in the other.

"So wait." Nami said. "How can you be the keeper of the Big Big Fruit? It's been lost for decades!"

Ryohei sighed and said, "Like I said, I only look like a kid! My great grandfather charged me with keeping that particular Devil Fruit after he dehydrated it. The fruit is too dangerous to fall into human hands, so he disguised it and hid it in a huge temple. Then he gave me the key to the temple and put me to sleep in a stone coffin. If anyone was ever to remove the fruit from its hididng place, I would be woken up and sent to catch the thieves! And now I've found you!"

"And what do you plan on doing now?" Sanji asked, leaning back in his chair. "You're just a little kid! Even Ussop could kill you without trying!"

"Hey! What's that supposed to mean?!?!?" Ussop demanded.

Ryohei growled and said, "My grandfather gave me this key so I could stop anyone! I've already locked the temple I was sleeping in and retrieved my grandfather's other treasure! The Buff Buff Fruit!"

With that, the kid dropped both the key and the teddy bear and gritted his teeth in concentration. At first, it didn't look like anything was happening. Then, before the startled Straw Hats, his muscles started growing! Slowly his arms thickened, ripping the sleeves of the shirt, his legs strengthened, rippling and pushing his feet into the floor, cracking the tile. The shirt split down his back as he continued growing, the material falling away to show off his deep six pack and his ripped pecs. He was left standing in his underwear, a seven foot tall muscle monster.

"Okay...I didn't see that coming..." Sanji said from the floor, having fallen in surprise.

"Somebody do something!" Nami shrieked, grabbing the bag and stuffing everything back into it.

Moving fast, Chopper changed into his human form and locked hands with Ryohei. Knowing he wouldn't be able to hold him for long, the others ran out of the house into Luffy's hands. He stood up and said, "Couldn't I just squash him?"

"No Luffy!" Nami shouted. "The Buff Buff fruit does more than just increase muscle mass! Not even you could beat him now!"

"Then can I have another cookie?" Luffy asked. "That would help!"

"That would just make more problems!" Everyone else yelled at him.

Luffy 'humphed' and started walking away with his crew.
115222222222222222222211221211.title: Protector of the Temple

choices: The cookie lands in Nami's mouth and she swallows it
The cookie lands in Zoros mouth and he swallows it
115222222222222222222211221212.content:
"And I want to get bigger! So gimme!" Luffy said as he reached down for the tiny box. He grabbed it between two of his fingers without breaking it. But his crew were now worried about how big he could get.

Thinking on impulse, both Zoro and Nami jumped out and shouted "Oh no you don't!" and jumped into the air to catch the rising box full of growth cookies. "We can't have you getting any bigger!" Zoro stated angrily as he held onto to the box.

"Yeah! If you get any bigger then most of this island wouldn't even make suitable living space for you! And do you think we'll be able to move you on a ship? Of course not!" Nami stated angrily "Plus you ate the cursed fruit and you'll fall into the ocean if you try to swim!"

"If i'm big enough then all I have to do is a gomu gomu toss and send myself towards the nearest island!" Luffy told them as they held on for their lives.

Meanwhile the others looked on from below. "What do we do!? What do we do!?" Chopper cried in terror as he ran around in circles.

"How should we know? It's not like we can do anything when their 40 feet in the air!" Usopp stated as he looked up from above.

"I could have grabbed if I could see it. But both Zoro's and Nami's bodies are blocking my sight." Robin said as she looked up at the rising hand.

However none of them needed to worry as the box began to slip thanks to Luffy squeezing the box between his fingers and the weight of Nami and Zoro making it slip between the fingers. Soon the fingers lost their grip with the box and it fell along with Zoro and Nami.

"My beloved Nami! I'll catch you!" Sanji stated happily as he stood under her and held his arms out.

Her body and Zoro's fell faster than the box and sped towards the ground. But instead of landing in Sanji's arms, Nami crash landed on top of Sanji's head. "Ouch!" She shouted as her body flattened Sanji's in order to soften the blow. "Thanks for saving me Sanji." Nami told him as she petted his head.

"Anything for you my precious Nami!" He mumbled from underneath her.

"Don't worry Zoro! I'll get you!" Robin stated as she used her powers to create hands beneath Zoro, stopping him from crashing into the ground. The hands placed him on the ground after their job was done and vanished.

"Thanks Nico." Zoro replied as he looked up at the box that was falling. And that's when he noticed what was wrong. The box was open and a cookie out before Luffy caught it. "He's got the box!"

Nami who had just gotten off Sanji. She dusted herself off and looked up into the air as well along with the rest of the crew. "Great! Now what are we supposed to do?!" Not realizing a cookie was falling to the ground.

The group stared up with their mouths open at as Luffy brought the box to his face. No doubt wondering if he should eat one or all the cookies. That's when the cookie landed into the mouth of....
115222222222222222222211221212.title: Luffy snags another cookie.

choices: "No." to the surprise of the crew members
1152222222222222222222112212122.content:
While the Straw Hat crew was busy gaping upward at Luffy, no one noticed a single cookie land in Zoro's mouth. Zoro gagged as he felt something land inside his mouth and convulsively swallowed. The cookie went down hard and Zoro nearly choked on it. But what was done, was done.

"Uh oh..." Zoro said quietly.

Everyone's gaze, even Luffy's, was drawn downwards as Zoro started to grow.

The rest of the crew was forced to take steps back as Zoro grew taller and taller, his feet covering more and more ground. Eventually, one of Zoro's heels smashed a wall to the now tiny house behind him, forcing Zoro to take a step forward. The whole ordeal was dizzying for the now giant swordsman as his view constantly changed. Finally the growth stopped when he was normal sized compared to Luffy. Thinking fast, Zoro grabbed the box and said, "There! That's one problem solved!"

"Solved? SOLVED!?!?!? How has anything been solved?!?!?" Ussop screamed up at Zoro. "Now you're both giants!"

"This is really getting out of hand!" Nami said.

"Well, at least Zoro can keep Luffy in line." Robin said shrugging.

Luffy frowned and said, "Aw come on Zoro! I want to eat those cookies!"

Luffy made a grab for the box, but Zoro kept it out of his reach. "I don't think so!"

A small scuffle broke out between the crew mates, their feet constantly moving. The tiny crew members had to run and dodge Zoro's huge black shoes, and Luffy's massive sandal clad feet lest they get squashed. Chopper was making an annoying racket, screaming and running around like a madman. Finally, Luffy gave up and sat down, crossing his arms with a "humph!". Now that things were finally settling down, Nami pulled the liquid out of the bag and said, "Now both of you drink this and get back to normal! We're on a mission remember?"

Both giants looked down at the bottle, then at each other. Zoro looked down at Nami and said...
1152222222222222222222112212122.title: The Biggest Swordsman in the World

choices: How could I make love to Luffy if he was a giant and I was tiny?
Me and Luffy have been lovers for AGES! And your now going to be our toy Nami!
11522222222222222222221122121221.content:
"All right. Give it to me." Zoro said as he bent down and grabbed the small liquid from Nami's hand. She had opened it so he could simply take a sip and then pass it to Luffy. And just as he was about to put some in his mouth, he looked down at them. A wicked smile crossing his face. "On second thought. Being a giant isn't so bad." And then he chugged the liquid out into the sky. In seconds it vanished into the horizon and was lost, landing somewhere in the North Blue. He put his swords on the ground as he looked down at the group.

Luffy looked on and was in disbelief for ten seconds. He had thought Zoro was going to make him shrink. Instead he found out he was his ally. "Good job Zoro!" Luffy chuckled as he waved his hands in the air in joy.

The entire crew was stunned in shock as they saw Zoro betray them. For several minutes none of them talked. At least until Nami stepped forward after gaining her composure. "Zoro! How could you do that?!" Nami said angrily as she looked up at him. "Now we have no way to shrink you or Luffy!"

"Exactly." Zoro stated as he looked down at them. "The feeling I have now since I grew big is intoxicating. Why I am so strong now now I could slice a mountain in half with just a slight swing."

"But that still isn't a reason for you to go and do this! There must be some other reason why you choose to act like this." Robin said as she looked on with the others. Usopp and Chopper were flinging their arms around in terror and Sanji took this chance to wrap his arms around Nami. Only to get beaten to a pulp by her.

"What possible reason could you have for doing this?" Nami asked the giant swordsman.

"What reason? What reason? We'll allow me to show you why I would like to become a giant alongside Luffy." Zoro quickly grabs Luffy's arm and pulls him into his lap. Luffy made a yelp and blushed as he fell into Zoro's lap. Two arms wrapped around the Captain as he was put into Zoro's arms. The only problem was this-Luffy wasn't trying to resist at all. Looking down at the rest of the crew, Zoro smiled evilly as he spoke down to them.
11522222222222222222221122121221.title: Sorry guys. But no.

choices: "Let's keep her safe for now. We've got a lot to discuss about some changes."
115222222222222222222211221212212.content:
"Me and Luffy have been lovers for AGES! And now you're going to be our toy Nami!"

This stunned everyone into silence. It was just...too much! Luffy blushed again and said, "Zoro, I thought you wanted to keep it secret."

"I did. But now it doesn't matter." he said, holding Luffy tightly.

"Wait, hold on!" Nami said. "How does something like this happen without anyone noticing? We all sleep in the same room!" (Have you seen the ending theme? They're all in there together.)

"Simple." Zoro said. "Every night we take turns up in the crows nest to watch out for land and other ships. So whenever Luffy or I have to keep a lookout, the other comes up to keep them company. That's how started anyway. Needless to say, on some of those nights there isn't much looking going on."

"WHAT?!?!?" Chopper screeched. "You mean we could've crashed the ship just because you two were...were....uhh..." Chopper fell onto his back in disbelief, Ussop fanning him, both to help revive him and stay out of this conversation.

Zoro grinned down and reached around Luffy, heading straight for Nami. Sanji instantly sprang into action, lashing out at Zoro's hand with a fierce kick. Of course, this did nothing to discourage him. The kick was barely felt. Nami yelled in surprise as she was suddenly swept up in Zoro's huge, and slightly calloused, hand. She peered between two of his fingers and saw it was a long fall down. And Sanji might be there in time to catch her again. She turned and found herself face to face with both Zoro and Luffy. Zoro had an evil grin on his face while Luffy looked as happy and clueless as ever. Zoro tossed Nami slightly, up and down on his hand. She yelped with every movement and Zoro said, "So Luffy...what should we do with her?"

Luffy seemed to be thinking about it. Nami held her breath, hoping against hope that Luffy would see the light and put a stop to this madness. Her hopes were in vain as Luffy said, "I don't care. Whatever you want to do Zoro."

Zoro's grin got, if possible, even bigger. He stopped tossing Nami up and down and held her in his palm. The other Straw Hats looked up in trepidation, wondering what was going to happen next. Obviously, things were going to change drastically from here on out.

Zoro finally came to a decision and announced it to the crew.
115222222222222222222211221212212.title: Secrets Revealed

choices: "No more talking! I want some alone time with you Zoro!"
"I'm bored! I wanna see the inside of the ship Zoro!"
1152222222222222222222112212122122.content:
"I've decided that there are going to be some changes around here." Zoro told them as he continued to toss Nami in his hand. She was covering her mouth, her face green and ready to releash vomit unless the tossing stopped. Zoro's other hand was on Luffy's ass, and had pushed him even closer into Zoro's body. But all Luffy did was smile and giggle as he snuggled into Zoro. He didn't have any care about what happend to the rest of his crew now that he was big.

"Release my beautiful, exotic, all-mighty goddess Nami from your hands right now!" Sanji commanded Zoro. Yet the giant swordsman ignored the cook as he shouted words so bad that they would have caused his grandma to faint in shock.

Chopper and Usopp huddled together in fear, awaiting whatever the giant swordsman had to say. Robin watched emotionless as she crossed her arms, but she was in fact greatly worried. Out of concern for Nami and the rest, she spoke "What are these changes Zoro?"

"I'm glad you asked Robin!" Zoro told her as looked down at her. "First off, our journey in finding One Piece isn't over. Isn't that right Luffy?" Zoro asked his rubber captain. Finally Zoro stopped tossing Nami around his hand, the girl sighed in relief as her face turned from vomit green to normal.

The boy was enjoying his snuggle into Zoro's chest when he heard Zoro speak to him. "Off course! I'm going to be King of the Pirates!" Luffy said in joy.

"And how exactly is a giant suppose to become the King of the Pirates when he doesn't have a ship big enough to fit him!" Screamed Chopper.

"Plus you can't swim thanks to the power of the cursed fruit!" Usopp screamed as well as he pointed at them in terror.

"That's true." Luffy thought for a second. But then his face was filled with joy "But then Zoro must know how I can become the King and have my own ship!"

"That's right Luffy." Zoro said as he kissed him for a second. But then he went back to speaking. "You all must have realized that this island isn't a ordinary island right?" Everyone on the ground looked at the each other, confused. Even Luffy looked confused by what Zoro was saying. Nami was the only one who didn't look confuse. In fact she realized that Zoro knew the one thing she kept secret when explaining about the cookies and vial. "Nami! I didin't realize you did not trust us enough the group enough to tell them about this island's secret."

"So you know what he's talking about Nami?" Robin asked her as she looked up.

"Yes I do." She told Robin as she looked down.

"So what's the secret!?" Luffy, Usopp, and Chopper asked in unison.

"As you all know, this island isn't big enough to support a couple of giants for too long. While it is large when we see it, to Luffy and Zoro it is much smaller. And at their current sizes, the island would only be able to feed the two of them for less than 10 weeks before the island is picked clean." Nami explained.

"But great goddess Nami! What does that have to do with this island." Sanji asked as he held out his hands to grab her should she jump from Zoro's palm. But she stayed right where she was. Not wanting to anger the giant swordsman.

And while Nami had not yet said it, Robin had figured it out all on her own. "This island is actually a giant ship!" Robin stated.

Luffy, Usopp, and Chopper gasped in joy. "It's a giant ship! COOOL!" Both Usopp and Chopper forgot their fear for a few minutes, but went back to huddling together as soon as they remembered.

"Yes. It was a small ship designed to act like a island by the person who separated the big-shrink fruit. The ancient ruins stated that if one were to put the cookies into the core of this ship it causes the island to grow in size." Nami told them.

"I see. But that doesn't explain anything. We didn't find the fruit on this island. And Luffy ate it while we were on the ship. So how did we just happen to land on the island that is actually a ship built for people who eat the fruit?" Robin asked.

"Yeah! I mean the chances of that happening is zero to none!" Chopper stated.

"Because it's like the fruit itself. But you can only find this island when someone has already eaten a cookie." Zoro told them.

"Ah! That makes sense. If you only find the fruit when your not looking for it, then finding the island in order to get a giant off your ship must be how you find the island ship." Robin explained.

"That makes sense I guess?" Luffy smiled as he thought about it. But the way they had worded it left him in confusion. "Well it doesn't matter does it?! I'm still going to be king of the Pirates!"

"That's right." Zoro hugged Luffy as he kissed him again. "Now I am going to explain the changes." He told the tinies as they looked up at them. "Now, the cookies are ours and we'll going to use them to make ourselves bigger. And the island so we can travel across the Grand Line." Zoro said as he placed the box inside a secret compartment at the bottom of the handle of his strongest sword. "And don't even think of trying to break through the handle. It's made of the worlds strongest metal, and at it's current size none of you can even hope of popping it off."

"Dang it!" Sanji said in frustration. 'Now how am I suppose to save my Goddess Nami?!' He thought as he looked at them and then at Nami.

"Second change. You are all mine and Luffy's servants. You'll do what we say or else you'll end up like Nami once we start using her." Zoro told them. The group shuddered at the thought. And Nami felt a shiver of fear travel down her spine at the thought. Luffy just laughed.

"The third change is that the Merry Go will never be used again." Zoro told them.

"What! Are you going to destroy the ship that was given to us by the woman I love?!" Shouted Usopp. He couldn't believe Zoro would destroy the precious treasure given to him by the girl he loved.

"Yes." Zoro told him. In seconds Usopp was off, ready to get the ship to sail. Ten minutes passed as Usopp got on the ship, and began to get the ship to sail.

"He does realize that the ship has been damaged by Luffy when he was on it, so it can't go anywhere right?" Chopper asked.

"WHY WON'T THIS THING MOVE!?" Usopp shouted in anger.

'He hasn't realized it' The group thought.

Luffy just laughed for joy. And the remaining normal sized crew returned to listening to Zoro.

"And what are the rest of the changes?" Robin asked him.

Just as Zoro was about to speak, Luffy interrupted him......
1152222222222222222222112212122122.title: There's gonna be changes around here!

choices: Yes! Luffy and Zoro put the bed to good use!
No! They gather the others first and finish explaining the changes!
11522222222222222222221122121221222.content:
As everyone waited in anticipation for the rest of Zoro's changes, Luffy suddenly yawned and said, "I'm bored! I wanna see the inside of the ship Zoro!"

Everyone but Zora face faulted at Luffy's words. All that dramatic tension totally wasted! Zoro just smiled at his lover and said, "Sure, why not? They're not going anywhere."

He smiled down at the tinies as he said this, in a somewhat vicious way. The crew got the message. They weren't going to go anywhere. With that decided, Zoro stuck Nami carelessly in his right pant pocket and stood up with Luffy. Luffy eagerly began to make his way back to the center of the island where the temple was. Obviously the way into the hold of the ship would be somewhere over there, right? It was that thought that drove Luffy and Zoro followed, smiling at his excitement. Nami peeked her head out and looked around worriedly. She didn't like leaving the others behind. It would only be a matter of time before Luffy and Zoro desired their own alone time and then she'd be in trouble. But there wasn't much she could do except watch the group grow smaller in the distance until they were gone completely.

As soon as the giants were out of sight, Robin turned to the other crew members and said, "So what are we going to do?"

"What do you mean, what are we going to do?!?!?" Sanji yelled in anger. "We're obviously going to save Nami and teach those two giant bastards a lesson!"

"Brilliant plan." Robin said, rolling her eyes. "And how do you plan to accomplish this?"

Not skipping a beat, Sanji said, "Still working on that!"

Robin sighed and turned to Chopper. "What do you think?"

Chopper quivered in terror and said, "What can we do? Unless we can somehow trick Zoro and Luffy into drinking some of that liquid, we don't stand a chance against them!"

Ussop took that moment to arrive back on the scene after trying to work the Merry Go. Robin turned to him and said, "What do you think we should do?"

Ussop looked worried and said, "There's really nothing we can do. I think we should just do what they say! I don't want to end up like Nami!"

Sanji turned on him and punched him in the head, yelling, "You lousy coward!"

As the other crew members argued and tried to discuss various courses of actions, Zoro and Luffy had arrived back in the temple. Luffy looked around and said, "How are we supposed to get down into the ship?"

Zoro pointed at the altar where the box had originally sat. Luffy looked down at it in annoyance and said, "Yeah, so?"

Zoro pushed it down with his foot and it sank into the floor. Instantly, lights raced along the floor, up the walls and into the ceiling. Luffy looked around in amazement as the floor creaked and groaned under their feet. Slowly, it started moving down, into the depths of the island ship. Luffy started bouncing up and down in excitement, eager to explore this new phenomenon. He didn't have to wait long. The elevator began to pick up speed, moving down faster and faster until it came to a sickening halt. Instantly, Luffy jumped off and began looking around. It seemed to be set up as a standard ship except everything seemed to be more metal than wood. It was like being inside a massive engine room, yet there were no comforts spared. The most uncomfortable was obviously where the engine itself was. It looked extremely complicated, with flashing lights and various dials, chugging steam out in various places. Luckily the entire thing seemed to be self sufficient so they wouldn't have to worry about maintaining it. There was also a bedroom complete with a huge four poster bed big enough for two, covered in silk sheets, an adjoining bathroom with a large bath (made for two, of course.), and a porthole that allowed them to see under the ocean. Another room was the library filled with what appeared to be hundreds of books and atlases. Nami poked her head out and immediately caught site of a huge atlas she'd never seen, or even heard of, before. She longed to look through it, to see how whoever built this ship drew a map. The possibility of treasure also rose up in her mind. This room, however, did little to capture Luffy's attention and Zoro didn't really care either. A room that did draw their interest was a fitness room complete with a giant sized weight set. Finally, their was a kitchen stocked with a variety of implements and food they'd never seen before. Luffy grinned and said, "It's going to be funny watching Sanji try to cook with giant utensils!"

Zoro smiled at that thought and drew Luffy in close. Luffy laughed and said, "Shouldn't we go back to the others first?"

"What's the rush?" Zoro asked seductively.

Luffy felt Zoro's hardening member pressing against his leg. He was ready for some action. Nami, also feeling the stiffening member, started sweating in fear. Was the time already at hand?
11522222222222222222221122121221222.title: Exploring the Island Ship

choices: Luffy and Zoro continue their good time

115222222222222222222211221212212221.content:
As Luffy and Zoro drew closer together, Nami found herself pressing up against Luffy's thigh, something very hard pressing against her. She looked up and saw her captain and his swordsman making out. Her heart started beating faster, wondering she was going to be pulled out and when her part would start. Luffy and Zoro broke their embrace only for Zoro to start unbuttoning Luffy's shirt. 1152222222222222222222211.content:
Our brave hero and his companions are currently stuck in jail thanks to our useless hero being wanted by the King. Alongside him was the royal soldier Ros, the young female Demon King Rchimedes or Rchi for short, the ninja demon Janua, and his talking masochist cat Michelajul Lortelia.

"Can we do something about my ribs?" Alba said as he winced in pain from his broken ribs. A result of Ros sending him through Demon King Ruki's gate earlier unprotected.

"Are you still going on about that? I thought we already went over how lame it is that you keep wanting me to fix them." Ros sighed as he looked at him with boredom. "It's not like healing them will make you stop being useless. After all, the only thing you're good for is complaining about how absurd everything is."

"I'd still like them fixed!" Alba retorted.

"I could try fixing them with my rib fixing jutsu." Janua said as he cracked his knuckles. "That is if you'll personally take care of Miichan as after I leave for the demon world."

"No thanks. I'd probably end up with more broken ribs." Alba sighed as he sat down. This was the second time in a few days that he'd been thrown in jail, and now he had to deal with even more crazy people.

"I know what might help you!" The small Rchi replied cheerfully as she opened a gate. Sticking her hand inside it, she pulled out a small bottle with green liquid in it.

"What's that Rchi-chan?" Alba asked as he saw the green substance sparkle.

"This is the Demon Kings super secret formula for making someone big and strong. It even heals you as you grow." Rchimedes happily told him before turning away from the others and whispering "With a few side effects. Heh heh heh." as she made a small evil chuckle.

"Lame. If he got big enough I might do zero damage to him when I stab him. I might even have to level up some just to do damage." Ros was displeased with the idea of such a thing happening.

"I wish someone would hit me." Michelajul said quietly in the background.

"That's a good thing for me!" Alba retorted. "I'd love some of that stuff Rchi-chan! Maybe then I'll become a Hero who can make my mother proud." A triumphant smile crossed his face as he though of how happy his mother would be.

"Okay" Rchimedes arm with the bottle in it began to stretch across the jail cell to give it to him.

I'm still wondering how she's doing that. Alba thought as he saw the arm moving towards him. "Now I won't have to deal with these ribs at least."

Izuku walked into Class 1-H, he'd been asked by Mei Hatsume to drop by when he got a chance.

"Oh good, you're here!" Mei greeted the spiky haired boy.

One long exposition dump later.

"Hugo?" He heard Jimba's voice ask. He looked down at his feet and saw the once taller man, staring up at him. "What in the name of the spirits happened to you?"

"Well I found some tablet on the plains while Fubar and I were riding around..." Hugo explained, "I read its inscription just before it shot a beam at me. I kind of....broke it after it did." Hugo began to regret that decision. "The worst part is...it seems every minute, I get taller!"

"What have you done...?" Jimba sighed in disappointment. "You found the Power of Size spell then? A tricky one to counter act..." Jimba thought, scratching his chin. "Well then, I know how to." Jimba smiled.

"Cool, I knew you would!" Hugo smiled. Jimba nodded in response. There was a moment of silence. "So are you going to tell me...?"

"I'll tell you tonight." Jimba turned to walk away. "You've got to learn from your actions."

Hugo glared at him...
12322121.title: Go see Jimba. He may know something.

choices: ...nah, give the ducks a good scare.
Take a look at the mountains around the mountain path.
123221211.content:
"Fine..." Hugo sighed loudly. "Though you can't expect me to just sit here all day."

"Oh, I don't." Jimba replied jokingly, "And I'll explain to Lucia what's going on with you."

"Thanks Jimba." Hugo nodded, took a step backwards and walked back out onto the plains. Jimba returned back to the chief's hut to inform Lucia about her son's predicament. Meanwhile, Hugo traversed the plains again trying to think of something to keep him occupies. At this point he had grown five more feet leaving him at 25 ft tall. Any wild creatures that caught site of him on the plains fled in fear, not wanting to be crushed by the giant Karayan. It was then he had the idea.

'Maybe I ought to go check on the ducks...' He thought looking north towards the Duck Village. 'Maybe give them a little scare.' He grinned at the thought of picking up a building. 'Though maybe...'
123221211.title: Karaya Plains

choices: Keep drifting and come up with more ideas to pass the time.
1232212111.content:
Hugo spotted the duck's lake after growing two more feet while walking. He leaned down, to try and stay out of their view while contemplating how to scare the ducks. 'I can't breath under water...but I can hold my breathe for a good amount of time...' He began to think of a way to get into the lake without getting caught. 'The lake is big...maybe I can get in at the far corner and swim under the water towards the village....but if I over shoot...'

Hugo decided on his idea and began walking around the edge of the lake, out of view from Duck Village. It took him about fifteen minutes to get to the far end and he ended up growing another foot leaving him at 28ft. Hugo slowly slipped himself into the water and swam calmly towards the village of unsuspecting ducks.

He made it the edge of the village in about thirty seconds with about another thirty to go before his breathe ran out. Some of the ducks caught site of the strange shadow and watched curiously. Hugo timed it carefully and his arm snatched an empty boat just outside of two and held it up high. Ducks began squawking and running every which direction while Sergeant Joe approached the disaster and readied his pole Axe. It was then he stopped. Hugo picked up an isolated house carefully and lifted it up before bringing his head up for a breath of air. He froze at the sight of Sgt. Joe. "Hugo!?" He squawked. "How'd you get so...big!?" He was stunned.

"Uhh....long story..." Hugo mumbled lowering his arms and placing the objects back down. "Come one Sgt. I was just joking around!"

"Hugo, you scared away my entire village! Aren't you a bit old for this kind of stunt?!" Sgt. Joe scolded. Hugo sighed and began swimming backwards towards where he entered. "Hey, get back here you!" Hugo simply ignored him as he grew while drifting in the lake.
1232212111.title: Duck Village

1232222222.title: Tal?

12322222221.content:
The tall, well built, black haired man swung the axe at the tree, hoping for it to break. He already had two good sets off wood with him, meaning this would be the last for the day. "We can't stay forever on this island..." He moaned swinging again, hearing the tree crack. The tree finally fell after a few more swings, finishing his work for the day. "I've got to get another job tomorrow..." He was a lazy man sometimes, so it was a surprise he had as much muscle as he did. He knelt down to pick up the wood but caught site of another object, something that was gold and sparkling to his right.

Upon touching it, the gold light grew blinding then quickly vanished as soon as it came. A little bit spooked, the man (Tal) backed away. He picked up the wood and went on his way, hoping to not regret what he just did. Once he reached their campsite on the beach, he spent the rest of the day preparing the campfire and food for the night before heading to sleep. Overnight...
