124.title: First Up X

1241.content:
X had gone and explored a group of Maverick bases finding no one but soldiers waiting for him. He had used his X Buster to pulverize his enemies and had not seen a worthy fight all day.

As he explored the final base he had finished off all other forces in their and as he was about to leave a giant scythe attacked him. He barely dodged it and had attacked with his X Buster. He had saw a robed Maverick as he shot and missed it.

The Maverick went for it's scythe and tried to slash X but X saw this and changed his ability to Sting Chameleons ability launching needles that destroyed the Maverick when a virus attacked him. He had felt funny and suddenly something happend to him.
1241.title: New Maverick  Virus

choices: Go by Maverick Hunters Hq to show them
12412.content: Suddenly his Mechanical body suddenly began to grow. 10..20.. until he reached 60 feet tall. "Whoa! I'm gigantic!" He looked around and wondered what he should do with his new size...
12412.title: X the new found giant

124121.content:
X began to think that at this size, he could crush Sigma with ease. X began to walk (more like stomp)towards Sigma's fortress, each step left a small earthquake.

At the fortress,

A maverick canine watched from the top and was on look-out duty. He was accompanied by a maverick bird. Suddenly, the maverick dog's eyes went wide.

"What's wrong Fang?" Asked the maverick bird. (Fang wolf isn't a real maverick, I made him up)

"Look...over...there." Fang said, pointing ahead of them. To there surprise, they saw a 60 foot X heading there way! They both warped to Sigma's current location, in the main hallways, taking a stroll. When they appeared in front of them, they frantically told him what they saw at the same time and talked so fast that Sigma couldn't make out a word they were saying.

"Shut up!" Sigma commanded and the two became quiet. "Now tell me what happend calmly."

"We saw X heading here!" Terror said. (Terror Hawk is yet another maverick I made up)

"And he is HUGE!" yelled Fang.

"Hmm..." Sigma said, going to a nearby large window and pushed it open. Indeed, Sigma saw a giant X heading this direction.

"Send out King Dragon!" (he was a giant maverick from X4)

"Yes sir!" The two mavericks said and went tom release King Dragon.

Back to X,

X really didn't notice that while he was walking, he was crushing trees as if they were grass. But he did make sure that he didn't crush anyone.

X had reached the fortress' main gate and was confronted by maverick guards. X simply kicked them and they flew through the sky. He knocked down the door and was confronted by...
124121.title: Sigma's larger enemy

124122.content:
X decided to show the others at the headquaters his new size. X warped to the maver hunter HQ.

When X reached the front of it, he walked as quietly as he could to not cause a ruckus and to not alert the other hunters.

The doors opened in front of him. He kneeled down to see...
124122.title: A visit to the HQ

choices: Mavericks are attacking! They want the Gun!
1241221.content:
Zero had had one of the best days he could have ever imagined. He had removed his armor to reveal how close to a human anatomy that reploids had. He spent most of the day in the Maverick Hunters own private beaches tanning to get the envy of all the humans as his syntetic skin got darker without ever fearing gaining skin cancer.

Having slepth one of his day-offs sleeping, he wondered what he should do when X returns. "I'll show him how great it is to be taller than him." Smirked Zero as he layed sleeping. "He always hates when I say how much taller I am." Which was only a few inches.

As he layed there, a sound came across the speakers all across Maverick Hunter HQ. "Attention Zero, please report to the front gates of HQ. We need you to help with a seriously Xtra big problem!" The voice was frantic and scared.

Getting up, he wrapped a towel lossely around his waist. He liked to tan bare naked. "I'll go see X about this 'Xtra big problem' then come back. It's not like it's that big of a deal." Zero shrugged as he walked off. He would never seriously know how wrong he was.

Quickly heading past anyone who blocked his way, Zero heading towards the front gates. As they opened, he looked at towards the wasteland around HQ. "Where are you X?" Zero asked, when suddenly he heard a large sound.

"Up here little guy!" Said a booming voice. Looking up, Zero fell down in shock. It was a giant X! What was going on!? Bending down, X wrapped a hand around Zero's body. "Like the newer and bigger me?" Asked the giant reploid as he couldn't hold back his giant smirk.

"Umm...ah...uhhh...ummm!" Zero stuttered, shocked by this change of events. 'He'll never let me live this down!'. Regaining his thoughts he rose up and began to speak. "How did this happen?" He asked his giant friend.

"You won't believe it..." X said as he told him the story....
1241221.title: Newer and bigger X

choices: Sneak attack! The Mavericks manage to steal the gun
12412212.content:
As X finished his story, one thought was foremost in Zero's mind.

"Did you bring the gun with you?"

X grinned and pulled it out.

"So can I uh...see it?" Zero asked innocently.

"I don't think so! This is mine exclusively for now shorty!"

Zero was about to reply scathingly, when an alarm started buzzing throughout the base. A robotic voice sounded

"Warning. Warning. Maverick attack. Maverick attack."

X and Zero looked towards the horizon and saw an army of Mavericks closing in and fast! Zero readied his sword, prepared to fight.

"Are you going to fight in a towel?" X asked.

Zero looked at himself and swore.

"I'll be right back!"

"Take your time..." X said, not worried in the least.

The attacking Mavericks were being led by someone far away, as a quick scan detected no traces of higher powered Mavericks. Swarms of the little robots approached the base. But they didn't attack. X stared at them until one stepped forward and yelled out.

"We've come for the gun you stole from us!"

X rolled his eyes and said, "Like I'm going to just give it back!"

And with that, he stomped on the offending Maverick. This seemed to trigger the other Mavericks, as they all began to attack. The base's defense systems kicked in and helped X as he made quick work of the attaking Mavericks.
12412212.title: Maverick Army Vs. X

choices: Alia and other scientists examine X
Zero decides he must have the gun
124122122.content:
"This is the best you've got!?" X laughed as he crushed dozens of them simply by walking. They responded with missles, bombs, laser beams, claws, and the occasional ramming. But none of it seemed to affect X. 'I don't even have to actually fight them. But I do want to try out my new strength.'

With one swift kick, X had knocked out hundreds of mavericks out and destroyed them with a quick kick that had left a shockwave that was still wiping out enemies. 'I'm faster and stronger! That attack was o nly 1/10 of my stength!' X thought as he looked up the enemy armies. He bent down and blew with his mouth a gust of wind so powerful that mavericks were slamming into the canyons and blowing up. 'This is so easy!' X thought as he brought a hand down and swatted thousands of mavericks into grinded dirt.

'Now to test out my most powerful attack!' X thought as he jumped out of the center of the Mavericks. Since the Hunters were still preparing for battle he had nothing to worry. He watched as his X buster charged instantly. "X BUSTER!" He roared as a massive ball of energy engulfed every Maverick. The entire army was completly gone.

"There!" He said as he heard the speakers speaking "Attention! Attention! Maverick Hunter X has defeated all maverick forces! No longer a need to enter battle!" And it signed out.

But this was not happening before Zero had arrived back outside. He was ready for battle as he brought his Z Saber out. "Where are they!?" He stated as he heard the announcement. Moaning, he looked up at the Giant X. "Show off!" He said only loud enough for him to hear.

"I heard that little guy!" X said as he wrapped a hand gently around his friend. Bringing him up to his face, X smiled. "Were going to enjoy this new life aren't we!? I know Axl will!" He said as he brought his friend into his hand, entering the airship bay since it was the only way to enter the Maverick HQ.
124122122.title: Testing some of his new power

choices: X grows Axl not only to have a helping hand, but to spite Zero a little for fun
Not right now. X likes being the only giant.
1241221221.content:
X entered the Base and set Zero down, who sulked off somewhere. It didn't take long for the others to appear and congratulate him on a job well done. X was really enjoying the attention, but it was short lived as Alia appeared.

"Yes, yes, it's all very impressive, but now he must be examined. So shoo everyone!"

The others left reluctantly, and Axl stayed behind.

"Can't I stay a little longer?" He asked.

Alia rolled her eyes and said, "Fine, if you must.

Axl said, "Yes!" and went to a catwalk to see better.

"Alright X. We're just going to run some routine tests to see how your body is coping with the changes. You're going to have to lay down.

X complied and laid down. Alia and a small group of scientists started dettaching his armor. After it was all removed, they started attaching nodes to different parts of his body. Axl covered his eyes, embarrased at seeing his friends nakedness. It didn't take long for readings to come beeping out of the machines. Alia studied the results and said, "This is the best we can do until I can get some bigger instruments...We'll do this again in about a weeks time alright X?"

"You got it Alia!" X said, reattching his armor.

As soon as he was done, Axl jumped up waving his arms.

"Hey X! Over here!"

X went over and held out his hand. Axl jumped on, grinning from ear to ear.

"This is so cool!" He cheered.

X headed down to the gym, thinking Axl probably went back there after being denied a fighting workout. Halfway there, Axl said, "Can you make me a giant too?"

X thought about if for a second. He like being the only giant around and being able to take out entire armies by himself. That effect would be diminished with another giant. But it could also make things a lot easier if the Mavericks sent out even bigger armies.
1241221221.title: Full Body Examination Postponed

choices: The small adventures of two giants and a shrimp
12412212211.content:
"Well I could use the help if more of them appear in bigger numbers. I mean they were easy but if all of them attacked then I would be fried before I even know what hit me." X said as he thought about what Axl wanted. "I have to ask why though." He told him, Axl eyes smiled brightly.

"Well your my idol X! And I tire of how Zero seems to think he's better cause he is a couple inches taller than me!" Axl said happily in his friends hand.

"That's all the reason I need then." X said as he pulled the grow gun out and shot his small friend with it after putting him back on the ground.

Axl smiled as he saw his body grew as large and as powerful as X. "Oh thank you! Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!" He said as he hugged his friend, squeezing the life out of him with his increased strength.

X gasped as he felt his mechanical insides feel like they were breaking. "Too*gasp*hard!" He said as he felt his insides being destroyed. Realizing what he was doing, Axl let go and chuckled as he sweatdropped.

"Sorry, I don't know my new strength." He told him

X nodded as he rubbed his body. The strangest part was that almost as soon as Axl let go his entire insides seemed to be fixed. Nanomachines had replicated into X's body and fixed him as good as new.

Just then, Zero entered hoping to talk to his friend about this size arrangement. "X I want you to make me big because I deserve-" He stopped as he noticed the newest giant. "WHY DID YOU MAKE HIM BIG!?" He fell down shocked.

Axl giggled and simply pressed his finger on his friend, slidinghim across the floor. "Don't worry, I will make you bigger." X told him as he laughed.

"Really!?" Zero said happily, hoping for the day that he was taller than those two again.

"Yeah if you work hard enough!" Axl said laughing at him.

'I hope that doesn't mean what I think it means!' Zero said as he sweatdropped.
12412212211.title: Why should I?

choices: Now Axl and X have their adventures with Zero
124122122112.content:
Alia was just sitting in her office, typing something on her computer, when a notice was suddenly dropped into her In pile of papers. It was an envelope. She slit it open and removed the short letter inside. Her eyes quickly moved over the letter and she raised an eyebrow. Apparently the tools had already arrived.

"Well, that was certainly fast..." She said to herself. She shrugged. "Don't look a gift horse in the mouth I suppose."

She made her way to the docking bay and found a gigantic box. She sighed and called a group of workers to prepare a crane for her to open the box. It didn't take long to open the box and remove the giant sized instruments. As the other doctors were preparing the instruments for the coming examination, Alia herself went to find X. It didn't take her long to discover he was in the gym with Axl and Zero. She opened the door saying, "Good news X. The instruments are--"

She raised her eyebrow at the sight in the gym. X was sitting cross legged next to an equally huge Axl, with a normal sized Zero held tightly in Axl's hand.

"Having fun?" She said a little coldly.

X and Axl grinned sheepishly while Zero fumed.

"As I was saying, the instruments have arrived. Now if you'd kindly put Zero down, we can start the examination."

"Why do I have to go?" Axl asked. He was hoping to have some time alone with the little Zero. Much fun was to be had after all.

"I have to make sure everything is running smoothly in both of your bodies." She said. "There could be an abnormality in one of you that might not show up in the other."

Axl begrudginly put Zero down and followed X and Alia to the docking bay. Once again, the armor was removed, but instead of the nodes being attached, Alia began to take samples from the two. Using a massive syringe she took a "small" blood sample. Indicating two equally large jars, she told them to make a urine sample. Everyone left them alone for that one. Blood pressure was taken, heart rate, respiration rate, until the last thing left to take was a semen sample. That too was done in private.

"Alright that's enough for now." Alia said, scribbling something onto a clipboard. "I'll have these samples analyzed as soon as possible. In the meantime, NO MORE GIANTS. Do I make myself clear?"

The two giants, who had no intention of adding Zero to their ranks yet, nodded.

"Good. You can go back to the gym now if you want."

The two left as Alia supervised the analysis process. It could take awhile.
124122122112.title: Full Body Examination Completed

choices: Meanwhile, X and Axl play with their new Zero doll
Alia gives this info to the bigwigs in HQ
1241221221122.content:
Although Alia thought better of leaving a small Zero with two giants who would more than likely wreck the place to mock his small size, Alia knew that two angry giants may not be the solution to fixing that problem by taking away there toy. Alia left them to do who knows what to the poor reploid. Arrving at her lab, Alia began to experiment with all synthetic and metallic parts of the two giant reploids.

"Amazing!" Alia said as she saw millions of nanomachines working to fix any problems the body has. Using a scrapel she cut into synthetic skin sample. Instantly the machines went to work, repairing it until it was back to normal. She tested them all out. Slicing, cutting, infecting with viruses, and more. "That gun can revolutionize the entire way of life for reploids! Why with it Reploids can even become immune to the Maverick Virus! I wonder why the mavericks would make it to do that though?" Alia said as she examined them.

As she exmained them even more, Alia noticed the one side affect it causes. "It seems to inflate peoples egos to the point that they could believe themselves to be gods. I'm just thankful X and Axl weren't affected(Or were they?). I'm just shocked that these nanomachines can repair the reploid and even weaken the affects of a Nuclear explosion. It can completly repair a reploids body. I've never seen anything like this!" Alia exclaimed as she examined the nanomachines.
1241221221122.title: A shocking revelation

choices: They get bored. Do something else.
12412212211221.content:
Zero, left alone in the gym, searched all over, hoping against hope, that his two giant friends had left the gun behind. No such luck. He cursed and fumed, furious at the situation. When they got back, he'd be totally at their mercy...

They said they'd make him a giant too, but where was the guarentee? It made him feel a little...uneasy.

There wasn't much time left for thought, as he heard the massive footsteps of his friends approaching. He refused to become their servant or toy or whatever the hell they were planning to do to him. Knowing he couldn't very well fight them, he did the only thing left to do!

He hid.

X and Axl were laughing with each other about something as they entered. Zero was watching them from behind a rack of weights. He didn't like hiding, but he also didn't want to be in their clutches. X and Axl looked around at their feet for him, but he was nowhere to be found.

"Do you think he left?" Axl asked.

"I think he's hiding!" X replied.

"Then I guess its time for a little game of hide and seek!" Axl said, grinning (Evilly? Perhaps.). The two giants wasted no time. Getting down on their hands and knees they began to search for their tiny friend/toy-to-be. Zero started to sweat as they approrached his hiding spot. Would they find him?
12412212211221.title: Hide and Seek

124122122112211.content:
As they played their game, X and Axl made sure that if they wouldn't find him, they would scare him out. Looking around, X bent down and pushed his finger into a row of equipment. It had hit the objects with such force that they were either destroyed or slammed into the wall. "Looks like he isn't over here!" X said evilly as he looked around more.

'He's evil!' Zero thought at the destruction they caused. This was how they were going to find him? By destroying every living thing in sight!? Zero knew that if he stayed, he was likely to end up in the hospital for need parts for every bit of his body they would crush.

"Well, maybe hes over here!?" Axl said as he slamed his hand into the wall. Sliding it across. The wall crumbled and fell at the sheer power of Axl's hand. Anything that was in the way was destroyed as he moved his hand all the right to the end of the wall. "Nope! Not over here!" He told X as he pushed the crumbling wall, causing it to crash anything that was on the other side.

'I better reveal myself before they get more playful!' Zero thought as he fell down defeated. "I'm over here!" Zero shouted. Not that he needed to. The two giants walked over, their evil smiles telling him he was unable to escape his fate.

"Now what do you think we should do with him?" Axl asked as he held him.

"I think we should..."
124122122112211.title: Hide and seek is dangerous

choices: X and Axl spend more "quality time" with Zero
Alia discusses her results with the leaders of the Maverick Hunters
1241221221122112.content:
"Keep him as a pet."

Zero sprang up as he heard this and shouted out, "Oh come on! Haven't I been through enough yet?"

Axl and X pretended to think about it then both said, "No!"

Zero growled and ground his teeth in frustration, but what was he supposed to do? Until those two decided to let him join their ranks he'd always be inferior to them. And that just wasn't fair! So he waited to see what they would do to him next.

"So what do you think we should do next?" X whispered to Axl.

"Let's scare him some more!" Axl said, an idea forming in his mind.

"How?" X asked.

"By playing catch!"

With that, Axl scooped up the tiny Zero and held him tightly in his hand. X moved to the other side of the gym and waited for Axl to toss Zero to him. Axl wound up and sent the reploid flying through the air at high velocity. At the last possible second X caught Zero. He laughed at the expression on his friends face. Zero's eyes were wide open and he was breathing heavily. Before he had time to recover, X threw him back to Zero. Back and forth they went until Zero was so dizzy he couldn't tell up from down. Axl tossed Zero to X one last time then sat down. X sat down across from him and dropped Zero between them. He staggered a little bit to the left, then to the right, then fell on his back, the room spinning around him.

Meanwhile, Alia rushed to the War Room to discuss the results of her tests to the leaders of the Maverick Hunters.
1241221221122112.title: Indoor Catch

choices: Meanwhile Alia talks with Maverick Hunter HQ commanders
12412212211221121.content:
As Zero layed down between the legs of X, his fears of what could come only brought even greater fear to him. 'I just hope they aren't as cruel as they appear to be.' Zero thought as he layed there, catching his breath. X however, didn't want his pet to relax just yet before they made him into a giant. He was going to sweat and bleed before he got to be one of them.

Grabbing Zero, X brought him to his face. A smile so wide and inhuman as a evil glint filled both his eyes. Axl sat across from him, his own eyes filled with a evil look. "I wonder how it would feel if I shot you out of my mouth like a cannon?" X told Zero. Zero gulped as the dread of what was to come was realized. Placing Zero's legs in his mouth and the rest of him outside, X could feel him squirming. All this did was excite X as he felt the kicking of Zeros legs.

"Let me go! Let me go!" Zero said as he felt air coming into X's nose. 'Better brace myself!' Zero thought as he place his arms in front of his face, then with a gust of wind X had spat out Zero like a bullet. He was tossed across the air, ready to be smashed and beaten by a wall or some other surface. Then, Axl lips caught him with super speed. His legs now squirmed outside of his mouth. "Am I dead?" Zero said as he lowered his hands.

"As if little guy!" X said evilly as he talked to him from afar. Axl was licking Zero's upper body with his tongue. Feeling the great taste that came from him. Even though he had synthetic senses, it tasted wonderful to him. "Now launch him back to me Axl!" X said as Axl nodded, spitting him out at X who caught Zero once again. Back and forth the game went, the two giants laughing wickedly as Zero was beaten and battered.

Finally the game ended with Zero being placed between Axl's legs. He no longer cared for what the two would do to him for now. His body was so tired from the games the cruel giants played. He layed down, ready to sleep. Looking down at him, the two giants giggled.

"Is it time to make him one of us?" Axl asked X.

"Yeah, right now while he can't mock us for being shorter even at this size!" X said as he readied the gun to be fired.
12412212211221121.title: A cruel game of 'Cannon ball'

124122122112211211.content:
X aimed the gun at the tiny wore out form of his friend and fired. Slowly Zero grew to the same size as X and Axl. Well, he was a little taller, but really, who cares? Feeling newfound energy, Zero opened his eyes and stood up. He was surprised to see X and Axl both slightly shorter than him! Finally!

"So you finally took pity on me huh?" Zero said.

"Well yeah. You're our friend." Axl said.

"Your taller friend!"

He just wouldn't stop.

"Watch it Zero!" X said. "I've still got the gun. Maybe you'd like to play another game with us?"

Zero, visibly growing pale, said, "N-no! That's alright!"

Axl and X laughed at the fear on Zero's face. He wasn't a Reploid who scared easy.

Suddenly, the entire base shook fearsomely.

"What was that?" X said, suddenly serious.

"I don't know." Zero replied. "Let's go check it out."

All three ran from the gym and headed to the entrance of the base
124122122112211211.title: Zero Joins the Ranks

choices: Makes it without any other problems
12511.content:
Sonic, as usual, was in the middle of fighting one of Eggman's robots. "What the heck? And I thought you were starting to catch up!" Sonic laughed as the large robot's sluggish movement allowed him to just /WALK/ out of the way.

"Oh will you just be quiet!?" Eggman snapped. Sonic rolled his eyes. "It's an old one. I'm trying to give it one last chance to avoid being reduced to scrap metal."

"Sheesh. A little harsh, isn't it? But hey, either way, I'm losing." Sonic laughed.

"What?! How are /you/ LOSING!!!!!?"

"It's so SLOW!! I'm getting /REALLY/ bored! I mean, normally, I have to move fast to keep from getting shot, but this thing's so slow I hardly even have to walk!!! I'm not getting my usual end of the fun."

Eggman gave Sonic an annoyed groan. "Right now, I'm thinking the same."

"Heh. Not very common, is it? Us agreeing on something. But hey, if ya' fixed him up a bit, this would be at least a little more fun." Eggman nodded and they both sighed. "Hey, Eggy, how long do ya' think it's gonna take for it to make a turn?"

"We'll find out in a minute. Well, if you're bored, you could help me turn it into scrap metal."

Sonic noticed that something in the back of the machine was starting to open, and a green light could be seen starting to come through. "Umm…can ya' turn it off? I think it's gonna burst if ya' don't." Sonic said nervously, taking a step back. A sudden beam shout out from the back of the machine, hitting Sonic directly in the stomach. " AH!!!!!!" Sonic cried, being flung through the air by the mere energy of the beam. Eggman laughed at this. "Ugh…why do I feel so weird? Almost… sick?" Sonic groaned. Eggman laughed a little louder. "I'm not joking. Quit laughing at me already. I feel like I'm gonna vomit." Eggman laughed harder, only to wind being grabbed in a huge, white fist. "I said quit laughing."

Eggman looked up in awe at how much Sonic had just grown after having been shot. "What in the-?"

"I'm gonna have Tails help me out. Mind if I take that? Of course you don't. Thanks. Bye." Sonic said weakly as he grabbed the robot, set Eggman down, and walked away. He began heading to Tails's workshop, which wasn't that far away.
12511.title: A Gut-Wrenching Battle

125112.content: Sonic wanted to get to Tails's house as quick as possible, so he decided to go through the city. However, due to how much bigger he was, he had extreme difficulty not stepping on anyone or anything. A car blared its horns at him as it drove down the road. He immediately moved his foot, only to lose his balance. "LOOK OUT BELOW!!!!!!!!!" Sonic cried, trying to delay his fall enough for everyone to move out of his way. He could hear people screaming, and all he could do was hope they were running. He fell on his back, crushing a few buildings that had been behind him. He sat up quickly and looked around. He hadn't hurt anyone, but a few homes had been completely destroyed. "S-Sorry!!!! I didn't mean to. I'm just trying to get through here and make it to my friend's house!!! So if everybody could just…well…keep outta the way long enough for me to get through here, I'd be really glad!!! Cuz right now you guys are really making this hard for me!!!" Sonic said loudly, hoping everyone heard him. Fortunately for him, the majority did and moved out of his way, allowing him an easy walk. He still had to avoid cars, but with so fewer people in his way, it was much easier to walk through. Once out of the city, he walked the now much shorter distance to Tails's workshop. "YO', TAILS, YA' HERE, LIL' BRO?!!!!!!!!!" Sonic shouted.
125112.title: Big Feet, Little Houses…LOOK OUT!!!!!

1251121.content:
Tails yelped and covered his ears. He stormed out of his workshop to yell at Sonic, but all he could make out was a giant, red sneaker. He slowly looked up, mouth dropping as he did. Sonic smiled as their eyes met and wiggled his fingers at his little buddy. Tails backed up towards the house. "Hey, where ya' goin'?" Sonic asked, his smile fading away. Tails fled back into his house. "Hey! Come on! I need some help! Don't just leave me all alone!" Sonic flustered, but Tails didn't come back out. Sonic plopped down and hugged his knees. "What did I do that was so bad? I only came to ask for some help…" Sonic mumbled, sighing heavily. "I'd better go. He's not coming back…" Sonic stood up and began walking away.

Tails took a deep breath and ran outside. "SONIC, WAIT A MINUTE!!!!!!!!!" he screamed. Sonic looked back at Tails, and the look on Sonic's face made him feel awful. Sonic shook his head, looked away, and continued walking. Tails ran after him, then took to the air in hopes of catching up. "SONIC, COME ON!!!!!!!! I JUST WASN'T READY!!!!!!! PLEASE!!!!!!!! SLOW DOWN!!!!!!!!! I CAN'T KEEP UP!!!!!!!!!!!" Tails screamed as loud as he could.

Sonic turned and looked down at Tails. Tails flew up to him, completely out of breath. "Hey, Tails, you okay? You don't look too good, buddy." Sonic asked. Tails suddenly dropped. "TAILS!!!!!!!!!" Sonic yelped, immediately bending down and catching the exhausted fox. He sighed in relief and sat down, watching Tails with worried eyes.
1251121.title: Not Normal, but Normal Enough

12511211.content:
Tails's eyes began fluttering open. Everything was a blur. He looked around. There was definitely something there with him, but he wasn't sure what it was. Slowly, his vision cleared until he recognized what was sitting beside him. "S-Sonic!?"

Sonic sighed in relief. "I'm so glad you're alright. You had me worried." Sonic said warmly. He rubbed Tails's head with his finger, still smiling. Tails scooted away a little, causing Sonic to look more upset than earlier.

Tails blinked, noticing the sad look on Sonic's face.he reached out and grabbed Sonic's finger. "Hey, Sonic, what's wrong?" he asked quietly.

Sonic looked at Tails, then looked away again. "I'm sorry."

"What?"

"I'm sorry."

"What's the matter?"

"I'm not trying to scare you."

"Sonic…I'm just not used to you being so big. It's a little overwhelming." Tails said.

Sonic snatches Tails off the ground and pulled him into a hug. "Please don't be scared of me."

Tails sighed. "It's okay. I got ya', bro, I got ya'." Tails murmured.
12511211.title: Compassion of a Big Hedgehog

choices: Hogwarts Letters Arrive - The Koi who Lived gets a bigger bedroom
Harry works out his cupboard lock - The Koi who Lived starts sneaking food
The magic starts to work - The Koi who Lived thinks his cupboard is shrinking
142.content:
Little Harry Potter thought that nothing could possibly ruin his day. For the first time in his life, he was on a proper outing, and to the zoo even! True, Dudley didn't want him there, and Aunt Petunia and Uncle Vernon didn't buy him very much for lunch (they wouldn't have bought him anything if not for the funny looks they'd get otherwise). And he supposed he looked silly in the small circus tent of a shirt he'd inherited from his large cousin, with his trousers cinched up underneath nearly at his chest. Even so, he was at the zoo, and nobody would ruin it for him!

Harry briefly considered heading toward the reptile house next, as like most ten (almost eleven!) year old boys, he thought snakes and lizards were almost the most brilliant animals ever. But he already saw Dudley waddling off in that direction with his ratty friend Piers slinking behind him, so he decided to give it a miss for now, and headed over toward a red, eastern-style bridge he'd heard Uncle Vernon muttering something unpleasant about earlier. To his mind, this just meant the Dursleys were likely to leave it - and him - alone.

When he reached the red painted bridge, he stood on tiptoes to try and peer over the side. Sadly, he was still too small to see much over the edge. Nearby, it sounded as though a nice sounding lady working for the zoo was talking about whatever was in the water.

"Below," the lady said, "are something called Koi fish. Koi fish are very special, and one of the most fascinating things about them is that they keep growing until they can't get enough food in their environment. So, a Koi in a small bowl that's not given much to eat is a very tiny fish, but one let into a large lake will grow to dozens, maybe a hundred times that size!"

Other kids on the bridge made noises of awe at this, and Harry decided to scramble up onto the railing of the bridge so that he could see. He wanted to see a big fish!

Not a minute after he'd clambered up, leaning further out than he probably should have, he felt a hard shove at his back. With a frightened shout, Harry toppled off the bridge and into the fishy water. Sputtering and making faces at the taste in his mouth, Harry scowled up at the bridge where he saw Dudley and Piers laughing and pointing down at them. The nice zoo lady was looking down as well, and after seeing he was alright grabbed his cousin and Piers by the arms and marched them away, asking about their parents.

Down in the muddy water, Harry glanced down at his hands to make sure he got up safely, and finally got a look at a Koi fish. It was a tiny little thing, barely as long as his pinky (and his hand was really quite small itself). He could see further away a bunch of big shapes in the water.

"We're just alike, you and me," he muttered at the tiny fish. "I bet those big fish over there hog all the food and pick on you all the time right?"

The fish, being a fish, didn't answer. Harry nodded anyway, and stuck his pinky out at the fish.

"But we'll show them one day, right? It's a promise."

Inexplicably, the tiny fish swam forward and rubbed his pinky, like it was agreeing with the plan. Harry grinned a bit, and slopped his way over out of the muck. He couldn't explain it, but when the fish touched him, he'd felt a tingle seem to zip through his entire body. Almost the same thing that he'd felt when he somehow traveled to the roof of his school, or turned his teacher's hair blue.

The Dursleys were, after the zoo lady found him again, asked to leave because of the disruption. Dudley blamed Harry entirely, of course, and the Dursleys sided with him as usual. While Dudley was comforted with new toys and more sweets, Harry spent a sad few weeks mostly locked up in his tiny cupboard with little food, for "ruining Diddy's outing."

Harry sighed to himself in the tiny room, thinking of what the zoo lady said, and picturing a tiny black Koi fish with a lightning scar in a tiny, tiny bowl.
142.title: Harry Potter

choices: Harry finds a children's growth chart rolled up under the bed
Harry heads downstairs and sees there's news on TV about the zoo
Harry wakes up to an owl at his window, carrying a familiar letter
1421.content:
Harry had been off restriction for some time when that mysterious letter arrived for him, and he was still confused at how he'd found himself and his few things scooped out of his cupboard and shoved into Dudley's second room. Confused, but pleased.

He didn't buy the Dursleys' excuse of him "getting a bit big" for his cupboard for one second. Something in that letter had spooked them. Still, even if he really wanted to know what the letter said, at least it had gotten him out of that tiny prison he'd been calling his room. For some reason, ever since the zoo visit, he'd been more bothered by being forced into such a tight space all the time.

Harry looked around at his new room, slowly getting used to having a lot of open space around him. He frowned as he looked at the clutter of old and broken toys and clothing scattered on the floor. Setting his face in determination, he took his already-rolled-up sleeves and gave them a few more rolls for good measure to clear his elbows and set to work. Completely broken things were piled in a corner by the small trash basket he'd been allowed. Less broken things he eyed speculatively. Dudley would likely whine about him keeping any of it, even if Dudley himself had thrown them in here and forgotten about them. In the end, Harry kept things he thought would be useful, but weren't very colorful or shiny, thinking Dudley might not care much about them. The rest was piled up near the door for Dudley to inspect.

In the end, Harry was left with an old bed that creaked a bit (but was at least longer than his cupboard's floor cot), a dresser with the finish peeling up and sticking drawers, a writing desk with a broken leg (he'd splinted it to a lone croquet mallet), a desk chair with no backrest, and a slightly bent floor lamp. Among some of the piles near the closet he'd found a few more sets of Dudley's old clothes that were, of course, too big on him, but looked much newer as Dudley apparently didn't like the way they looked and had chucked them unworn into this room, as well as a set of jogging trainers about 3 sizes too big. Harry kept these anyway; they weren't worse than he had, and they looked nicer. Maybe he'd eventually grow into them.

Sighing with happy accomplishment, Harry fell back onto his new (sort of) mattress. {Creak/i}.

It felt good; he had a room with real furniture, and it was all his! And with the clutter taken care of it felt like even more space opened up around him. Harry grinned, spreading out his arms until his fingers could barely curl around the sides of his bigger mattress, and flexed his feet which were at least a foot from the end of the bed.

Ah, wide open spaces. And all his!
1421.title: A Room with Room

choices: The next week, Harry wonders if his fitted clothes are still shrinking
